atk-s0501a:125_4: Evamettha sādhāraṇānaṃ padānaṃ sādhāraṇā byañjanato atthato ca vibhāvanā kātabbā.
atk-s0501a:127_5: pāṇātipātoti ettha tāva pāṇoti jīvitindriyappaṭibaddhā khandhasantati,
atk-s0501a:127_7: Tasmiṃ pana pāṇe pāṇasaññino tassa pāṇassa jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto.
atk-s0501a:127_9: yattha paro yathākāmakāritaṃ āpajjanto adaṇḍāraho anupavajjo ca hoti,
atk-s0501a:127_10: tasmiṃ parapariggahite parapariggahitasaññino tadādāyakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattā eva theyyacetanā adinnādānaṃ.
atk-s0501a:127_13: Musāvādoti ettha musāti visaṃvādanapurekkhārassa atthabhañjanako vacīpayogo kāyapayogo vā,
atk-s0501a:127_14: visaṃvādanādhippāyena panassa paravisaṃvādakakāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā kāyavacīdvārānameva aññataradvārappavattā micchācetanā musāvādo.
atk-s0501a:127_15: Surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānanti ettha pana surāti pañca surā –
atk-s0501a:127_25: yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñci atthi madaniyaṃ,
atk-s0501a:127_28: Pamādaṭṭhānanti yāya cetanāya taṃ pivati ajjhoharati,
atk-s0501a:127_30: yato ajjhoharaṇādhippāyena kāyadvārappavattā surāmerayamajjānaṃ ajjhoharaṇacetanā “surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāna”nti veditabbā.
atk-s0501a:129_1: kiṃ pana vajjhavadhakappayogacetanādīnaṃ ekatāya pāṇātipātassa aññassa vā adinnādānādino ekattaṃ,
atk-s0501a:129_6: atha yadā ekaṃ vajjhaṃ bahū vadhakā vadhenti,
atk-s0501a:129_7: eko vā vadhako bahuke vajjhe vadheti,
atk-s0501a:129_8: ekena vā sāhatthikādinā payogena bahū vajjhā vadhīyanti,
atk-s0501a:129_9: ekā vā cetanā bahūnaṃ vajjhānaṃ jīvitindriyupacchedakapayogaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
atk-s0501a:129_12: Atha yadā eko vadhako ekassatthāya ekaṃ payogaṃ karonto bahū vajjhe vadheti,
atk-s0501a:129_13: bahū vā vadhakā devadattayaññadattasomadattādīnaṃ bahūnamatthāya bahū payoge karontā ekameva devadattaṃ yaññadattaṃ somadattaṃ vā vadhenti,
atk-s0501a:129_14: bahūhi vā sāhatthikādīhi payogehi eko vajjho vadhīyati.
atk-s0501a:129_15: Bahū vā cetanā ekasseva vajjhassa jīvitindriyupacchedakapayogaṃ samuṭṭhāpenti,
atk-s0501a:129_18: Atha neva etesaṃ vajjhādīnaṃ ekatāya ekattaṃ,
atk-s0501a:130_1: tattha tāva pāṇātipātassa na vajjhavadhakādīnaṃ paccekamekatāya ekatā,
atk-s0501a:130_6: Tathā hi bahūsu vadhakesu bahūhi sarakkhepādīhi ekena vā opātakhaṇanādinā payogena bahū vajjhe vadhentesupi bahū pāṇātipātā honti.
atk-s0501a:130_8: bahūhi vā payogehi tappayogasamuṭṭhāpikāya ca ekāya,
atk-s0501a:130_9: bahūhi vā cetanāhi bahū vajjhe vadhentepi bahū pāṇātipātā honti,
atk-s0501a:130_11: ekena vā payogena ekaṃ vajjhaṃ vadhentesupi bahū pāṇātipātā honti.
atk-s0501a:132_0: Ādānatoti pāṇātipātāveramaṇisikkhāpadādīni cetāni sāmaṇerena bhikkhusantike samādinnāneva samādinnāni honti,
atk-s0501a:132_1: upāsakena pana attanā samādiyantenāpi samādinnāni honti,
atk-s0501a:132_5: Kintu nānaṃ ekajjhaṃ samādiyato ekāyeva virati,
atk-s0501a:133_0: Bhedatoti sāmaṇerānañcettha ekasmiṃ bhinne sabbānipi bhinnāni honti.
atk-s0501a:133_4: Gahaṭṭhānaṃ pana ekasmiṃ bhinne ekameva bhinnaṃ hoti,
atk-s0501a:133_5: yato tesaṃ taṃsamādāneneva puna pañcaṅgikattaṃ sīlassa sampajjati.
atk-s0501a:133_7: “visuṃ visuṃ samādinnesu ekasmiṃ bhinne ekameva bhinnaṃ hoti,
atk-s0501a:133_8: ‘pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ sīlaṃ samādiyāmī’ti evaṃ pana ekato samādinnesu ekasmiṃ bhinne sesānipi sabbāni bhinnāni honti. Kasmā?
atk-s0501a:134_0: Mahāsāvajjatoti guṇavirahitesu tiracchānagatādīsu pāṇesu khuddake pāṇe pāṇātipāto appasāvajjo,
atk-s0501a:134_4: Guṇavantesu pana manussādīsu appaguṇe pāṇātipāto appasāvajjo,
atk-s0501a:134_6: Sarīraguṇānantu samabhāve sati kilesānaṃ upakkamānañca mudutāya appasāvajjatā,
atk-s0501a:135_0: Payogatoti ettha ca pāṇātipātassa sāhatthiko, āṇattiko,
atk-s0501a:135_4: Tattha kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena vā paharaṇaṃ sāhatthiko payogo,
atk-s0501a:135_8: “Yo koci maratū”ti evaṃ anuddissake pahārapaccayā yassa kassaci maraṇena.
atk-s0501a:135_12: Maraṇādhippāyena ca pahāraṃ datvā tena amatassa puna aññena cittena pahāre dinne pacchāpi yadi paṭhamapahāreneva marati,
atk-s0501a:135_18: Esa nayo bahukehipi ekassa pahāre dinne.
atk-s0501a:136_1: Tatthapi sāhatthike payoge vuttanayeneva kammabaddho anussaritabbo.
atk-s0501a:139_3: Okāsoti gāmo vā nigamo vā vanaṃ vā racchā vā siṅghāṭakaṃ vāti evamādi.
atk-s0501a:139_4: Āvudhanti asi vā usu vā satti vāti evamādi.
atk-s0501a:139_5: Iriyāpathoti māretabbassa mārakassa ca ṭhānaṃ vā nisajjā vāti evamādi.
atk-s0501a:140_0: Kiriyāvisesoti vijjhanaṃ vā chedanaṃ vā bhedanaṃ vā saṅkhamuṇḍikaṃ vāti evamādi.
atk-s0501a:140_1: Yadi hi vatthuṃ visaṃvādetvā “yaṃ mārehī”ti āṇatto,
atk-s0501a:140_5: āṇāpakassa āṇattikkhaṇe āṇattassa māraṇakkhaṇeti ubhayesampi kammabaddho.
atk-s0501a:141_0: Māraṇatthantu kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena vā paharaṇanissajjanaṃ nissaggiyo payogo.
atk-s0501a:142_4: yato tatthapi pubbe vuttanayeneva kammabaddho veditabbo.
atk-s0501a:142_6: mūlaṭṭhena opātādīsu paresaṃ mūlena vā mudhā vā dinnesupi yadi tappaccayā koci marati,
atk-s0501a:142_8: Yadipi ca tena aññena vā tattha opāte vināsetvā bhūmisame katepi paṃsudhovakā vā paṃsuṃ gaṇhantā,
atk-s0501a:142_9: mūlakhaṇakā vā mūlāni khaṇantā āvāṭaṃ karonti,
atk-s0501a:142_11: tattha ca koci otaritvā vā laggitvā vā marati,
atk-s0501a:142_14: so añño vā taṃ vitthaṭataraṃ gambhīrataraṃ vā karoti,
atk-s0501a:143_1: Dāṭhāvudhādīnaṃ dāṭhākoṭanādimiva māraṇatthaṃ kammavipākajiddhivikārakaraṇaṃ iddhimayo payogoti.
atk-s0501a:143_4: Abrahmacariyādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi sāhatthiko eva payogo labbhatīti.
atk-s0501a:144_0: Aṅgatoti ettha ca pāṇātipātassa pañca aṅgāni bhavanti –
atk-s0501a:144_16: Tattha musāvādassa tāva musā ca hoti taṃ vatthu,
atk-s0501a:144_19: paravisaṃvādanañca viññāpayamānā viññatti pavattatīti cattāri aṅgāni veditabbāni.
atk-s0501a:144_20: Surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānassa pana surādīnañca aññataraṃ hoti madanīyapātukamyatācittañca paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0501a:144_22: pīte ca pavisatīti imāni cattāri aṅgānīti.
atk-s0501a:146_3: Itarāni dve sukhāya vā adukkhamasukhāya vā vedanāya sampayuttānīti.
atk-s0501a:148_0: Kammatoti pāṇātipātaadinnādānaabrahmacariyāni cettha kāyakammameva kammapathappattāneva ca,
atk-s0501a:149_0: Viramatoti ettha āha “pāṇātipātādīhi viramanto kuto viramatī”ti? Vuccate –
atk-s0501a:149_1: samādānavasena tāva viramanto attano vā paresaṃ vā pāṇātipātādiakusalato viramati.
atk-s0501a:149_7: Keci pana bhaṇanti “surāmerayamajjasaṅkhāte saṅkhāre ārabhitvā surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā viramati,
atk-s0501a:149_13: taṃ na jāneyyā’ti evaṃdiṭṭhikā hutvā anicchamānā yadeva pajahati,
atk-s0501a:149_19: siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”ti evaṃ pavattamāne vissajjane “paccuppannārammaṇā”ti ca “bahiddhārammaṇā”ti
atk-s0501a:149_21: taṃ attano pāṇātipātādiakusalaṃ ārabhitvā viramantassa na yujjati.
atk-s0501a:149_27: na kiccasādhanavasena pavattento aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ karotīti vā,
atk-s0501a:153_0: Phalatoti sabbe eva cete pāṇātipātādayo duggatiphalanibbattakā honti,
atk-s0501a:153_3: Apica “yo sabbalahuso pāṇātipātassa vipāko manussabhūtassa appāyukasaṃvattaniko hotī”ti evamādinā nayenettha phalatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-s0501a:154_0: Api cettha pāṇātipātādiveramaṇīnampi samuṭṭhānavedanāmūlakammaphalato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-s0501a:154_2: sabbā eva cetā veramaṇiyo catūhi samuṭṭhahanti kāyato,
atk-s0501a:155_0: Pāṇātipātā veramaṇiyā cettha aṅgapaccaṅgasampannatā ārohapariṇāhasampattitā javasampattitā suppatiṭṭhitapādatā
atk-s0501a:155_1: cārutā mudutā sucitā sūratā mahabbalatā vissatthavacanatā lokapiyatā nelatā abhejjaparisatā acchambhitā
atk-s0501a:155_2: duppadhaṃsitā parūpakkamena amaraṇatā anantaparivāratā surūpatā susaṇṭhānatā appābādhatā asokitā piyehi
atk-s0501a:155_3: manāpehi saddhiṃ avippayogatā dīghāyukatāti evamādīni phalāni.
atk-s0501a:156_0: Adinnādānā veramaṇiyā mahaddhanatā pahūtadhanadhaññatā anantabhogatā anuppannabhoguppattitā uppannabhogathāvaratā
atk-s0501a:156_1: icchitānaṃ bhogānaṃ khippappaṭilābhitā rājacorudakaggiappiyadāyādehi asādhāraṇabhogatā asādhāraṇadhanappaṭilābhitā
atk-s0501a:157_0: Abrahmacariyā veramaṇiyā vigatapaccatthikatā sabbajanapiyatā annapānavatthasayanādīnaṃ lābhitā sukhasayanatā
atk-s0501a:157_1: sukhappaṭibujjhanatā apāyabhayavinimuttatā itthibhāvappaṭilābhassa vā napuṃsakabhāvappaṭilābhassa vā
atk-s0501a:157_2: abhabbatā akkodhanatā paccakkhakāritā apatitakkhandhatā anadhomukhatā itthipurisānaṃ aññamaññapiyatā
atk-s0501a:157_3: paripuṇṇindriyatā paripuṇṇalakkhaṇatā nirāsaṅkatā appossukkatā sukhavihāritā akutobhayatā piyavippayogābhāvatāti
atk-s0501a:158_0: Musāvādā veramaṇiyā vippasannindriyatā vissaṭṭhamadhurabhāṇitā samasitasuddhadantatā nātithūlatā nātikisatā
atk-s0501a:158_1: nātirassatā nātidīghatā sukhasamphassatā uppalagandhamukhatā sussūsakaparijanatā ādeyyavacanatā kamaluppalasadisamudulohitatanujivhatā
atk-s0501a:159_0: Surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇiyā atītānāgatapaccuppannesu sabbakiccakaraṇīyesu khippaṃ paṭijānanatā
atk-s0501a:159_1: sadā upaṭṭhitasatitā anummattakatā ñāṇavantatā analasatā ajaḷatā anelamūgatā amattatā appamattatā asammohatā
atk-s0501a:159_2: acchambhitā asārambhitā anussaṅkitā saccavāditā apisuṇāpharusāsamphapalāpavāditā rattindivamatanditatā
atk-s0501a:159_3: kataññutā kataveditā amaccharitā cāgavantatā sīlavantatā ujutā akkodhanatā hirimanatā ottappitā ujudiṭṭhikatā
atk-s0501a:159_4: mahāpaññatā medhāvitā paṇḍitatā atthānatthakusalatāti evamādīni phalāni.
atk-s0501a:164_2: taṃ tato gahetvā pacchimesvapi pañcasu sikkhāpadesu yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:164_4: yatheva hi purimasikkhāpadesu ārammaṇato ca surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānaṃ rūpāyatanādiaññatarasaṅkhārārammaṇaṃ,
atk-s0501a:164_7: Ādānato ca yathā purimāni sāmaṇerena vā upāsakena vā samādiyantena samādinnāni honti,
atk-s0501a:164_9: Aṅgatopi yathā tattha pāṇātipātādīnaṃ aṅgabhedo vutto,
atk-s0501a:164_15: Yathā ca tattha samuṭṭhānato surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānaṃ kāyato ca kāyacittato cāti dvisamuṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0501a:164_18: Yathā ca tattha vedanāto adinnādānaṃ tīsu vedanāsu aññataravedanāsampayuttaṃ,
atk-s0501a:164_23: Aparāni ca dve etena nayena sabbesaṃ mūlabhedo veditabbo.
atk-s0501a:164_26: Jātarūparajatappaṭiggahaṇaṃ pana kāyakammaṃ vā siyā vacīkammaṃ vā kāyadvārādīhi pavattisabbhāvapariyāyena,
atk-s0501a:164_28: Viramatoti yathā ca tattha viramanto attano vā paresaṃ vā pāṇātipātādiakusalato viramati,
atk-s0501a:164_31: Yathā ca purimā pañca veramaṇiyo catusamuṭṭhānā kāyato,
atk-s0501a:167_4: Naccagītavāditavisūkadassananti ettha naccaṃ nāma yaṃkiñci naccaṃ,
atk-s0501a:167_9: Naccā ca gītā ca vāditā ca visūkadassanā ca naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā.
atk-s0501a:168_0: “Yathā vā paneke bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saddhādeyyāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā te evarūpaṃ visūkadassanamanuyuttā viharanti,
atk-s0501a:168_2: naccaṃ gītaṃ vāditaṃ pekkhaṃ akkhānaṃ pāṇissaraṃ vetālaṃ kumbhathūṇaṃ sobhanakaṃ caṇḍālaṃ vaṃsaṃ dhovanaṃ
atk-s0501a:168_3: hatthiyuddhaṃ assayuddhaṃ mahiṃsayuddhaṃ usabhayuddhaṃ ajayuddhaṃ meṇḍayuddhaṃ kukkuṭayuddhaṃ vaṭṭakayuddhaṃ
atk-s0501a:168_4: daṇḍayuddhaṃ muṭṭhiyuddhaṃ nibbuddhaṃ uyyodhikaṃ balaggaṃ senābyūhaṃ anīkadassanaṃ iti vā,
atk-s0501a:168_5: iti evarūpā visūkadassanā paṭivirato samaṇo gotamo”ti.
atk-s0501a:169_0: Atha vā yathāvuttenatthena naccagītavāditāni eva visūkāni naccagītavāditavisūkāni,
atk-s0501a:169_3: “Dassanasavanā”ti vattabbe yathā “so ca hoti micchādiṭṭhiko viparītadassano”ti evamādīsu acakkhudvārappavattampi visayaggahaṇaṃ “dassana”nti vuccati,
atk-s0501a:169_5: Dassanakamyatāya upasaṅkamitvā passato eva cettha vītikkamo hoti.
atk-s0501a:169_6: Ṭhitanisinnasayanokāse pana āgataṃ gacchantassa vā āpāthagataṃ passato siyā saṃkileso,
atk-s0501a:170_6: pūjanatthañca abhihaṭaṃ sādiyato na kenaci pariyāyena na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0501a:170_9: Tadubhayampi sādiyato na kenaci pariyāyena vaṭṭati.
atk-s0501a:170_12: lohamāsakadārumāsakajatumāsakādi yaṃ yaṃ tattha tattha vohāraṃ gacchati,
atk-s0501a:170_14: Tassa yena kenaci pakārena sādiyanaṃ paṭiggaho nāma,
atk-s0501a:170_15: so na yena kenaci pariyāyena vaṭṭatīti evaṃ āveṇikaṃ vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:171_0: Dasapi cetāni sikkhāpadāni hīnena chandena cittavīriyavīmaṃsāhi vā samādinnāni hīnāni,
atk-s0501a:171_8: asaṅkhārikena paṇītānīti evaṃ ñeyyā hīnāditāpi cāti.
atk-s0501a:172_0: Ettāvatā ca yā pubbe “yena yattha yadā yasmā”tiādīhi chahi gāthāhi sikkhāpadapāṭhassa vaṇṇanatthaṃ mātikā nikkhittā,
atk-s0501a:177_0: Idāni yadidaṃ evaṃ dasahi sikkhāpadehi parisuddhapayogassa sīle patiṭṭhitassa kulaputtassa āsayaparisuddhatthaṃ
atk-s0501a:177_1: cittabhāvanatthañca aññatra buddhuppādā appavattapubbaṃ sabbatitthiyānaṃ avisayabhūtaṃ tesu tesu suttantesu –
atk-s0501a:180_2: kāyagatāsati kathaṃ bahulīkatā mahabbalā hoti mahānisaṃsā? Idha,
atk-s0501a:181_0: Ādinā nayena ānāpānapabbaṃ iriyāpathapabbaṃ catusampajaññapabbaṃ paṭikūlamanasikārapabbaṃ dhātumanasikārapabbaṃ
atk-s0501a:181_1: nava sivathikapabbānīti imesaṃ cuddasannaṃ pabbānaṃ vasena kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0501a:181_3: Tattha yasmā iriyāpathapabbaṃ catusampajaññapabbaṃ dhātumanasikārapabbanti imāni tīṇi vipassanāvasena vuttāni.
atk-s0501a:181_6: sā visuddhimagge vitthārato asubhabhāvanāniddese pakāsitā eva.
atk-s0501a:181_7: Ānāpānapabbaṃ pana paṭikūlamanasikārapabbañceti imānettha dve samādhivasena vuttāni.
atk-s0501a:182_2: bhikkhu imameva kāyaṃ uddhaṃ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā tacapariyantaṃ pūraṃ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati ‘atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā, lomā…pe…
atk-s0501a:183_0: Evaṃ tattha tattha matthaluṅgaṃ aṭṭhimiñjena saṅgahetvā desitaṃ kāyagatāsatikoṭṭhāsabhāvanāpariyāyaṃ dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhānaṃ āraddhaṃ,
atk-s0501a:184_1: Imasminti yvāyaṃ uddhaṃ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā tacapariyanto pūro nānappakārassa asucinoti vuccati, tasmiṃ.
atk-s0501a:184_4: kucchitānaṃ vā kesādīnañceva cakkhurogādīnañca rogasatānaṃ āyabhūtato kāyoti vuccati. Kesā…pe…
atk-s0501a:184_6: tattha “atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā atthi lomā”ti evaṃ sambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0501a:184_10: tacato paṭṭhāya paritoti ettake byāmamatte kaḷevare sabbākārenāpi vicinanto na koci kiñci muttaṃ vā maṇiṃ
atk-s0501a:184_11: vā veḷuriyaṃ vā agaruṃ vā candanaṃ vā kuṅkumaṃ vā kappūraṃ vā vāsacuṇṇādiṃ vā aṇumattampi sucibhāvaṃ passati,
atk-s0501a:184_12: atha kho paramaduggandhajegucchaṃ assirikadassanaṃ nānappakāraṃ kesalomādibhedaṃ asucimeva passatīti.
atk-s0501a:187_1: evametasmiṃ pāṇātipātāveramaṇisikkhāpadādibhede sīle patiṭṭhitena payogasuddhena ādikammikena kulaputtena
atk-s0501a:187_3: āvāsakulalābhagaṇakammaddhānañātigantharogaiddhipalibodhena kittipalibodhena vā saha dasa palibodhā honti.
atk-s0501a:187_6: rogassa tikicchāyāti evaṃ te dasa palibodhā upacchinditabbā,
atk-s0501a:187_8: khuddānukhuddakampi vinayācāraṃ appajahantena āgamādhigamasamannāgato tato aññataraṅgasamannāgato vā
atk-s0501a:187_10: vattasampadāya ca ārādhitacittassa tassa attano adhippāyo nivedetabbo.
atk-s0501a:187_11: Tena tassa nimittajjhāsayacariyādhimuttibhedaṃ ñatvā yadi etaṃ kammaṭṭhānamanurūpaṃ,
atk-s0501a:187_16: tato pahātabbapariggahetabbādikathanavasena sapurekkhāraṃ rāgacaritānukulādikathanavasena sappabhedaṃ vitthārena kathetabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:187_17: Tena taṃ sapurekkhāraṃ sappabhedaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetvā ācariyaṃ āpucchitvā yāni tāni –
atk-s0501a:189_0: Soṇḍiṃ paṇṇañca pupphañca, phalaṃ patthitameva ca.
atk-s0501a:194_0: Evaṃ aṭṭhārasa senāsanāni parivajjetabbānīti vuccanti. Tāni vajjetvā, yaṃ taṃ –
atk-s0501a:195_9: Tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane viharantassa appakasirena uppajjanti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā.
atk-s0501a:195_10: Tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane therā bhikkhū viharanti bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā,
atk-s0501a:195_11: te kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paripucchati paripañhati ‘idaṃ, bhante, kathaṃ,
atk-s0501a:195_15: anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭhāniyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti. Evaṃ kho,
atk-s0501a:196_1: Tathārūpaṃ senāsanaṃ upagamma katasabbakiccena kāmesu ādīnavaṃ,
atk-s0501a:196_2: nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ paccavekkhitvā buddhasubuddhatāya dhammasudhammatāya saṅghasuppaṭipannatāya ca anussaraṇena cittaṃ pasādetvā yaṃ taṃ –
atk-s0501a:199_7: tayo ca suttantāti evaṃ dasavidhaṃ manasikārakosallañca vuttaṃ.
atk-s0501a:199_9: Evañhi ārabhato sabbākārena dvattiṃsākārabhāvanā sampajjati no aññathā.
atk-s0501a:200_0: Tattha āditova tacapañcakaṃ tāva gahetvā api tepiṭakena “kesā lomā”tiādinā nayena anulomato,
atk-s0501a:200_1: tasmiṃ paguṇībhūte “taco dantā”ti evamādinā nayena paṭilomato,
atk-s0501a:200_2: tasmimpi paguṇībhūte tadubhayanayeneva anulomappaṭilomato bahi visaṭavitakkavicchedanatthaṃ pāḷipaguṇībhāvatthañca
atk-s0501a:200_3: vacasā koṭṭhāsasabhāvapariggahatthaṃ manasā ca addhamāsaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:200_4: Vacasā hissa bhāvanā bahi visaṭavitakke vicchinditvā manasā bhāvanāya pāḷipaguṇatāya ca paccayo hoti,
atk-s0501a:200_10: atha ante avuttampi matthaluṅgaṃ pathavīdhātuākārehi saddhiṃ ekato bhāvanatthaṃ idha pakkhipitvā matthaluṅgapañcakaṃ addhamāsaṃ,
atk-s0501a:200_15: tato sabbameva dvattiṃsākāramaddhamāsanti evaṃ cha māse vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedato vavatthapentena bhāvetabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:200_17: Mandapaññena tu yāvajīvaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ tikkhapaññassa na cireneva bhāvanā sampajjatīti.
atk-s0501a:201_2: Ayañhi “atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā”ti evamādinā nayena tacapañcakādivibhāgato dvattiṃsākāraṃ bhāvento kesā tāva vaṇṇato kāḷakāti vavatthapeti,
atk-s0501a:201_5: Disato pana yasmā imasmiṃ kāye nābhito uddhaṃ uparimā disā adho heṭṭhimāti vuccati,
atk-s0501a:201_6: tasmā imassa kāyassa uparimāya disāya jātāti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:201_8: Tattha yathā vammikamatthake jātāni kuṇṭhatiṇāni na jānanti “mayaṃ vammikamatthake jātānī”ti;
atk-s0501a:201_10: evameva na kesā jānanti “mayaṃ sīsacamme jātā”ti,
atk-s0501a:201_12: Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā acetanā abyākatā suññā paramaduggandhajegucchappaṭikūlā,
atk-s0501a:201_15: Tattha kesā heṭṭhā patiṭṭhitacammatalena tattha vīhaggamattaṃ pavisitvā patiṭṭhitena attano mūlatalena
atk-s0501a:201_16: ca upari ākāsena tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnāti evaṃ sabhāgaparicchedato,
atk-s0501a:201_18: Avasesā ekatiṃsā na kesāti evaṃ visabhāgaparicchedato ca vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:202_0: Avasesesu lomā vaṇṇato yebhuyyena nīlavaṇṇāti vavatthapeti,
atk-s0501a:202_5: okāsato hatthatalapādatale ṭhapetvā yebhuyyena avasesasarīracamme jātāti.
atk-s0501a:203_0: Tattha yathā purāṇagāmaṭṭhāne jātāni dabbatiṇāni na jānanti “mayaṃ purāṇagāmaṭṭhāne jātānī”ti,
atk-s0501a:203_1: na ca purāṇagāmaṭṭhānaṃ jānāti “mayi dabbatiṇāni jātānī”ti,
atk-s0501a:203_2: evameva na lomā jānanti “mayaṃ sarīracamme jātā”ti,
atk-s0501a:203_4: Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā acetanā abyākatā suññā paramaduggandhajegucchapaṭikūlā,
atk-s0501a:203_6: Paricchedato heṭṭhā patiṭṭhitacammatalena tattha likkhāmattaṃ pavisitvā patiṭṭhitena attano mūlena ca
atk-s0501a:203_7: upari ākāsena tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnāti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:203_9: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ lome vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:205_0: Tattha yathā nāma gāmadārakehi daṇḍakaggesu madhukaphalaṭṭhikā ṭhapitā na jānanti “mayaṃ daṇḍakaggesu ṭhapitā”ti,
atk-s0501a:205_2: evameva nakhā na jānanti “mayaṃ aṅgulīnaṃ aggesu patiṭṭhitā”ti,
atk-s0501a:205_3: napi aṅguliyo jānanti “amhākaṃ aggesu nakhā patiṭṭhitā”ti.
atk-s0501a:205_7: tattha patiṭṭhitatalena vā upari agge ca ākāsena,
atk-s0501a:205_10: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ nakhe vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:206_4: tassa kharapattacchinnasaṅkhapaṭalamiva samaganthitasetakusumamakuḷamālā viya ca khāyanti.
atk-s0501a:206_6: tassa jiṇṇaāsanasālāpīṭhakapaṭipāṭi viya nānāsaṇṭhānāti saṇṭhānato vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:206_7: Tesañhi ubhayadantapantipariyosānesu heṭṭhato uparito ca dve dve katvā aṭṭha dantā catukoṭikā catumūlikā āsandikasaṇṭhānā,
atk-s0501a:206_8: tesaṃ orato teneva kamena sanniviṭṭhā aṭṭha dantā tikoṭikā timūlikā siṅghāṭakasaṇṭhānā.
atk-s0501a:206_9: Tesampi orato teneva kamena heṭṭhato uparito ca ekamekaṃ katvā cattāro dantā dvikoṭikā dvimūlikā yānakūpatthambhinīsaṇṭhānā.
atk-s0501a:206_10: Tesampi orato teneva kamena sanniviṭṭhā cattāro dāṭhādantā ekakoṭikā ekamūlikā mallikāmakuḷasaṇṭhānā.
atk-s0501a:206_11: Tato ubhayadantapantivemajjhe heṭṭhā cattāro upari cattāro katvā aṭṭha dantā ekakoṭikā ekamūlikā tumbabījasaṇṭhānā.
atk-s0501a:207_0: Tattha yathā navakammikapurisena heṭṭhā silātale patiṭṭhāpitā uparimatale pavesitā thambhā na jānanti “mayaṃ heṭṭhāsilātale patiṭṭhāpitā,
atk-s0501a:207_4: evameva dantā na jānanti “mayaṃ heṭṭhāhanukaṭṭhike patiṭṭhitā,
atk-s0501a:207_10: Paricchedato heṭṭhā hanukaṭṭhikūpena hanukaṭṭhikaṃ pavisitvā patiṭṭhitena attano mūlatalena ca upari
atk-s0501a:207_13: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ dante vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:208_0: Tato paraṃ antosarīre nānākuṇapasañcayappaṭicchādakaṃ taco vaṇṇato setoti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:208_1: So hi yadipi chavirāgarañjitattā kāḷakodātādivaṇṇavasena nānāvaṇṇo viya dissati,
atk-s0501a:208_3: So panassa setabhāvo aggijālābhighātapaharaṇapahārādīhi viddhaṃsitāya chaviyā pākaṭo hoti.
atk-s0501a:209_0: Tacapariggaṇhakena ca yogāvacarena uttaroṭṭhato paṭṭhāya tacassa maṃsassa ca antarena cittaṃ pesentena paṭhamaṃ tāva mukhattaco vavatthapetabbo,
atk-s0501a:210_0: Tattha yathā allacammapariyonaddhāya peḷāya na allacammaṃ jānāti “mayā peḷā pariyonaddhā”ti,
atk-s0501a:210_2: evameva na taco jānāti “mayā idaṃ cātumahābhūtikaṃ sarīraṃ onaddha”nti,
atk-s0501a:210_3: napi idaṃ cātumahābhūtikaṃ sarīraṃ jānāti “ahaṃ tacena onaddha”nti.
atk-s0501a:213_0: Paricchedato heṭṭhā maṃsena tattha patiṭṭhitatalena vā upari chaviyā paricchinnoti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:213_2: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ tacaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:214_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre navapesisatappabhedaṃ maṃsaṃ vaṇṇato rattaṃ pālibhaddakapupphasannibhanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:214_9: dvebāhumaṃsaṃ naṅguṭṭhasīsapāde chetvā niccammaṃ katvā ṭhapitamahāmūsikasaṇṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0501a:214_17: Maṃsapariggaṇhakena ca yogāvacarena etāneva oḷārikamaṃsāni saṇṭhānato vavatthapetabbāni.
atk-s0501a:214_18: Evañhi vavatthāpayato sukhumāni maṃsāni ñāṇassa āpāthaṃ āgacchantīti.
atk-s0501a:214_20: Okāsato sādhikāni tīṇi aṭṭhisatāni anulimpitvā ṭhitanti.
atk-s0501a:215_0: Tattha yathā thūlamattikānulittāya bhittiyā na thūlamattikā jānāti “mayā bhitti anulittā”ti,
atk-s0501a:215_2: evamevaṃ na navapesisatappabhedaṃ maṃsaṃ jānāti “mayā aṭṭhisatattayaṃ anulitta”nti,
atk-s0501a:215_3: napi aṭṭhisatattayaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ navapesisatappabhedena maṃsena anulitta”nti.
atk-s0501a:218_0: Paricchedato heṭṭhā aṭṭhisaṅghāṭena tattha patiṭṭhitatalena vā upari tacena tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:218_2: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ maṃsaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:219_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre navasatappabhedā nhārū vaṇṇato setāti vavatthapeti,
atk-s0501a:219_3: Tathā hi tattha mahantā mahantā nhārū kandalamakuḷasaṇṭhānā,
atk-s0501a:219_11: avasesā imasmiṃ sarīre taṃtaṃaṅgapaccaṅgānugatā nhārū sarīre paṭimukkajālakañcukasaṇṭhānāti.
atk-s0501a:219_13: Tesu ca dakkhiṇakaṇṇacūḷikato paṭṭhāya pañca kaṇḍaranāmakā mahānhārū purato ca pacchato ca vinandhamānā vāmapassaṃ gatā,
atk-s0501a:219_14: vāmakaṇṇacūḷikato paṭṭhāya pañca purato ca pacchato ca vinandhamānā dakkhiṇapassaṃ gatā,
atk-s0501a:219_15: dakkhiṇagalavāṭakato paṭṭhāya pañca purato ca pacchato ca vinandhamānā vāmapassaṃ gatā,
atk-s0501a:219_16: vāmagalavāṭakato paṭṭhāya pañca purato ca pacchato ca vinandhamānā dakkhiṇapassaṃ gatā,
atk-s0501a:219_17: dakkhiṇahatthaṃ vinandhamānā purato ca pacchato ca pañca pañcāti dasa kaṇḍaranāmakā eva mahānhārū āruḷhā.
atk-s0501a:219_20: vāmapādañcāti evamete saṭṭhi mahānhārū sarīradhārakā sarīraniyāmakātipi vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:219_21: Okāsato sakalasarīre aṭṭhicammānaṃ aṭṭhimaṃsānañca antare aṭṭhīni ābandhamānā ṭhitāti.
atk-s0501a:220_0: Tattha yathā vallisantānabaddhesu kuṭṭadārūsu na vallisantānā jānanti “amhehi kuṭṭadārūni ābaddhānī”ti,
atk-s0501a:220_2: evameva na nhārū jānanti “amhehi tīṇi aṭṭhisatāni ābaddhānī”ti,
atk-s0501a:220_3: napi tīṇi aṭṭhisatāni jānanti “mayaṃ nhārūhi ābaddhānī”ti.
atk-s0501a:223_0: Paricchedato heṭṭhā tīhi aṭṭhisatehi tattha patiṭṭhitatalehi vā upari tacamaṃsehi tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnāti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:223_2: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ nhārū vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:224_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre dvattiṃsadantaṭṭhikānaṃ visuṃ gahitattā sesāni catusaṭṭhi hatthaṭṭhikāni catusaṭṭhi
atk-s0501a:224_1: pādaṭṭhikāni catusaṭṭhi mudukaṭṭhikāni maṃsanissitāni dve paṇhikaṭṭhīni ekekasmiṃ pāde dve dve gopphakaṭṭhikāni
atk-s0501a:224_2: dve jaṅghaṭṭhikāni ekaṃ jaṇṇukaṭṭhi ekaṃ ūruṭṭhi dve kaṭiṭṭhīni aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhīni catuvīsati
atk-s0501a:224_3: phāsukaṭṭhīni cuddasa uraṭṭhīni ekaṃ hadayaṭṭhi dve akkhakaṭṭhīni dve piṭṭhibāhaṭṭhīni dve bāhaṭṭhīni
atk-s0501a:224_4: dve dve aggabāhaṭṭhīni satta gīvaṭṭhīni dve hanukaṭṭhīni ekaṃ nāsikaṭṭhi dve akkhiṭṭhīni dve kaṇṇaṭṭhīni
atk-s0501a:224_5: ekaṃ nalāṭaṭṭhi ekaṃ muddhaṭṭhi nava sīsakapālaṭṭhīnīti evamādinā nayena vuttappabhedāni aṭṭhīni sabbāneva
atk-s0501a:225_10: jaṅghaṭṭhikassa jaṇṇukaṭṭhike patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ mudiṅgamatthakasaṇṭhānaṃ jaṇṇukaṭṭhi ekapassato ghaṭṭitapheṇasaṇṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0501a:225_14: kaṭiṭṭhīni dvepi ekābaddhāni hutvā kumbhakārehi katacullisaṇṭhānāni,
atk-s0501a:225_17: sattaṭṭhaṭṭhānesu chiddāvachiddāni aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhīni abbhantarato uparūpari ṭhapitasīsakapaṭṭaveṭhakasaṇṭhānāni,
atk-s0501a:225_19: tesaṃ antarantarā kakacadantasadisāni dve tīṇi kaṇṭakāni honti,
atk-s0501a:225_37: satta gīvaṭṭhīni daṇḍe vijjhitvā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitavaṃsakaḷīrakhaṇḍasaṇṭhānāni,
atk-s0501a:226_11: gīvaṭṭhīni sīsaṭṭhīni ukkhipitvā ṭhitānīti etenānusārena avasesānipi aṭṭhīni veditabbāni.
atk-s0501a:227_0: Tattha yathā iṭṭhakagopānasicayādīsu na uparimā iṭṭhakādayo jānanti “mayaṃ heṭṭhimesu patiṭṭhitā”ti,
atk-s0501a:227_1: napi heṭṭhimā jānanti “mayaṃ uparimāni ukkhipitvā ṭhitā”ti;
atk-s0501a:227_2: evameva na sīsaṭṭhikāni jānanti “mayaṃ gīvaṭṭhikesu patiṭṭhitānī”ti…pe…
atk-s0501a:227_4: napi piṭṭhipādaṭṭhikāni jānanti “mayaṃ gopphakaṭṭhīni ukkhipitvā ṭhitānī”ti.
atk-s0501a:227_7: Kevalaṃ tu imāni sādhikāni tīṇi aṭṭhisatāni navahi nhārusatehi navahi ca maṃsapesisatehi ābaddhānulittāni,
atk-s0501a:227_12: yaṃ sabhāvato upaparikkhanto yogāvacaro na kiñci gayhūpagaṃ passati,
atk-s0501a:227_13: kevalaṃ tu nhārusambandhaṃ nānākuṇapasaṅkiṇṇaṃ aṭṭhisaṅghāṭameva passati.
atk-s0501a:227_14: Yaṃ disvā dasabalassa puttabhāvaṃ upeti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:233_0: Duggandhe cāpi duggandhaṃ, bhedanamhi ca vayadhammaṃ.
atk-s0501a:235_0: Tamhi ca vinetha chandaṃ, hessatha puttā dasabalassā”ti ca.
atk-s0501a:236_0: Paricchedato anto aṭṭhimiñjena uparito maṃsena agge mūle ca aññamaññena paricchinnānīti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:236_2: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ aṭṭhīni vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:237_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre yathāvuttappabhedānaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantaragataṃ aṭṭhimiñjaṃ vaṇṇato setanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:237_3: mahantamahantānaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantaragataṃ sedetvā vaṭṭetvā mahantesu vaṃsanaḷakapabbesu pakkhittamahāvettaṅkurasaṇṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0501a:237_4: khuddānukhuddakānaṃ abbhantaragataṃ sedetvā vaṭṭetvā khuddānukhuddakesu vaṃsanaḷakapabbesu pakkhittatanuvettaṅkurasaṇṭhānanti.
atk-s0501a:238_0: Tattha yathā veḷunaḷakādīnaṃ antogatāni dadhiphāṇitāni na jānanti “mayaṃ veḷunaḷakādīnaṃ antogatānī”ti,
atk-s0501a:238_2: evameva na aṭṭhimiñjaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ antogata”nti,
atk-s0501a:238_6: Paricchedato aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantaratalehi aṭṭhimiñjabhāgena ca paricchinnanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:238_8: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ aṭṭhimiñjaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:239_0: Tato paraṃ sarīrassa abbhantare dvigoḷakappabhedaṃ vakkaṃ vaṇṇato mandarattaṃ pāḷibhaddakaṭṭhivaṇṇanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:239_4: Okāsato galavāṭakā vinikkhantena ekamūlena thokaṃ gantvā dvidhā bhinnena thūlanhārunā vinibaddhaṃ hutvā hadayamaṃsaṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitanti.
atk-s0501a:240_0: Tattha yathā vaṇṭūpanibaddhaṃ sahakāradvayaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ vaṇṭena upanibaddha”nti,
atk-s0501a:240_2: evameva na vakkaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ thūlanhārunā upanibaddha”nti,
atk-s0501a:240_8: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ vakkaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:241_0: Tato paraṃ sarīrassa abbhantare hadayaṃ vaṇṇato rattaṃ rattapadumapattapiṭṭhivaṇṇanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:241_2: tañca aggacchinnapunnāgaphalamiva vivaṭekapassaṃ bahi maṭṭhaṃ anto kosātakīphalassa abbhantarasadisaṃ.
atk-s0501a:241_5: Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca pavattanti,
atk-s0501a:241_6: taṃ apanetvā avasesamaṃsapiṇḍasaṅkhātahadayabbhantare addhapasatamattaṃ lohitaṃ saṇṭhāti,
atk-s0501a:241_15: Okāsato sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ majjhe patiṭṭhitanti.
atk-s0501a:242_0: Tattha yathā dvinnaṃ vātapānakavāṭakānaṃ majjhe ṭhito aggaḷatthambhako na jānāti “ahaṃ dvinnaṃ vātapānakavāṭakānaṃ majjhe ṭhito”ti,
atk-s0501a:242_1: napi vātapānakavāṭakāni jānanti “amhākaṃ majjhe aggaḷatthambhako ṭhito”ti;
atk-s0501a:242_2: evamevaṃ na hadayaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ majjhe ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:242_3: napi thanāni jānanti “hadayaṃ amhākaṃ majjhe ṭhita”nti.
atk-s0501a:242_8: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ hadayaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:243_0: Tato paraṃ sarīrassa abbhantare yakanasaññitaṃ yamakamaṃsapiṇḍaṃ vaṇṇato rattaṃ rattakumudabāhirapattapiṭṭhivaṇṇanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:243_1: Saṇṭhānato ekamūlaṃ hutvā agge yamakaṃ koviḷārapattasaṇṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0501a:243_3: paññavantānaṃ dve vā tīṇi vā khuddakānīti.
atk-s0501a:243_5: Okāsato dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ abbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitanti.
atk-s0501a:244_0: Tattha yathā piṭharakapasse laggā maṃsapesi na jānāti “ahaṃ piṭharakapasse laggā”ti,
atk-s0501a:244_2: evameva na yakanaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ abbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ nissāya ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:244_3: napi thanānaṃ abbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ jānāti “maṃ nissāya yakanaṃ ṭhita”nti.
atk-s0501a:244_6: Paricchedato pana yakanaṃ yakanabhāgena paricchinnanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:244_8: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ yakanaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:245_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre paṭicchannāpaṭicchannabhedato duvidhaṃ kilomakaṃ vaṇṇato setaṃ dukūlapilotikavaṇṇanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:245_4: appaṭicchannakilomakaṃ sakalasarīre cammassa heṭṭhato maṃsaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitanti.
atk-s0501a:246_0: Tattha yathā pilotikāya paliveṭhite maṃse na pilotikā jānāti “mayā maṃsaṃ paliveṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:246_2: evameva na kilomakaṃ jānāti “mayā hadayavakkāni sakalasarīre ca cammassa heṭṭhato maṃsaṃ paliveṭhita”nti.
atk-s0501a:246_3: Napi hadayavakkāni sakalasarīre ca maṃsaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ kilomakena paliveṭhita”nti.
atk-s0501a:246_6: Paricchedato heṭṭhā maṃsena upari cammena tiriyaṃ kilomakabhāgena paricchinnanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:246_8: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ kilomakaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:247_0: Tato paraṃ sarīrassa abbhantare pihakaṃ vaṇṇato nīlaṃ mīlātanigguṇḍīpupphavaṇṇanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:247_3: Okāsato hadayassa vāmapasse udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0501a:247_4: yamhi paharaṇapahārena bahi nikkhante sattānaṃ jīvitakkhayo hotīti.
atk-s0501a:248_0: Tattha yathā koṭṭhakamatthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitā na gomayapiṇḍi jānāti “ahaṃ koṭṭhakamatthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitā”ti,
atk-s0501a:248_1: napi koṭṭhakamatthakapassaṃ jānāti “gomayapiṇḍi maṃ nissāya ṭhitā”ti;
atk-s0501a:248_2: evameva na pihakaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:248_3: napi udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ jānāti “pihakaṃ maṃ nissāya ṭhita”nti.
atk-s0501a:248_8: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ pihakaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:249_0: Tato paraṃ sarīrassa abbhantare dvattiṃsamaṃsakhaṇḍappabhedaṃ papphāsaṃ vaṇṇato rattaṃ nātiparipakkaudumbaravaṇṇanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:249_3: Tadetaṃ abbhantare asitapītādīnaṃ abhāve uggatena kammajatejusmanā abbhāhatattā saṅkhāditapalālapiṇḍamiva nirasaṃ nirojaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:249_5: Okāsato sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ abbhantare hadayañca yakanañca upari chādetvā olambantaṃ ṭhitanti.
atk-s0501a:250_0: Tattha yathā jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantare lambamāno sakuṇakulāvako na jānāti “ahaṃ jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantare lambamāno ṭhito”ti,
atk-s0501a:250_1: napi jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantaraṃ jānāti “sakuṇakulāvako mayi lambamāno ṭhito”ti;
atk-s0501a:250_2: evameva na papphāsaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ antare lambamānaṃ ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:250_3: napi sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ antaraṃ jānāti “mayi papphāsaṃ lambamānaṃ ṭhita”nti.
atk-s0501a:250_8: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ papphāsaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:251_2: ekavīsatiyā ṭhānesu obhaggaṃ antaṃ vaṇṇato setaṃ sakkharasudhāvaṇṇanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:251_3: Saṇṭhānato sīsaṃ chinditvā lohitadoṇiyaṃ saṃvelletvā ṭhapitadhammanisaṇṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0501a:251_5: Okāsato upari galavāṭake heṭṭhā ca karīsamagge vinibandhattā galavāṭakakarīsamaggapariyante sarīrabbhantare ṭhitanti.
atk-s0501a:252_0: Tattha yathā lohitadoṇiyaṃ ṭhapitaṃ chinnasīsaṃ dhammanikaḷevaraṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ lohitadoṇiyaṃ ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:252_1: napi lohitadoṇi jānāti “mayi chinnasīsaṃ dhammanikaḷevaraṃ ṭhita”nti;
atk-s0501a:252_2: evameva na antaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ sarīrabbhantare ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:252_8: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ antaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:253_0: Tato paraṃ antosarīre antantare antaguṇaṃ vaṇṇato setaṃ dakasītalikamūlavaṇṇanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:253_4: Okāsato kudālapharasukammādīni karontānaṃ yantākaḍḍhanakāle yantasuttakamiva yantaphalakāni antabhoge
atk-s0501a:253_5: ekato aggaḷante ābandhitvā pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakassa antarā taṃ sibbitvā ṭhitarajjukā viya ekavīsatiyā
atk-s0501a:254_0: Tattha yathā pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakaṃ sibbitvā ṭhitarajjukā na jānāti “mayā pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakaṃ sibbita”nti,
atk-s0501a:254_1: napi pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakaṃ jānāti “rajjukā maṃ sibbitvā ṭhitā”ti,
atk-s0501a:254_2: evameva antaguṇaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ antaṃ ekavīsatibhogabbhantare ābandhitvā ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:254_3: napi antaṃ jānāti “antaguṇaṃ maṃ ābandhitvā ṭhita”nti.
atk-s0501a:254_8: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ antaguṇaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:255_0: Tato paraṃ antosarīre udariyaṃ vaṇṇato ajjhohaṭāhāravaṇṇanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:255_4: Udaraṃ nāma ubhato nippīḷiyamānassa allasāṭakassa majjhe sañjātaphoṭakasadisaṃ antapaṭalaṃ,
atk-s0501a:255_11: ye pānabhojanādimhi avijjamāne ullaṅghitvā viravantā hadayamaṃsaṃ abhitudanti pānabhojanādīni ajjhoharaṇavelāyañca
atk-s0501a:255_12: uddhaṃmukhā hutvā paṭhamajjhohaṭe dve tayo ālope turitaturitā vilumpanti.
atk-s0501a:255_13: Yaṃ etesaṃ kimīnaṃ pasūtigharaṃ vaccakuṭi gilānasālā susānañca hoti,
atk-s0501a:255_14: yattha seyyathāpi nāma caṇḍālagāmadvāre candanikāya saradasamaye thūlaphusitake deve vassante udakena
atk-s0501a:255_16: sañjātakimikulākulaṃ hutvā dvīhatīhaccayena sūriyātapasantāpavegakuthitaṃ upari pheṇapupphuḷake muñcantaṃ
atk-s0501a:255_17: abhinīlavaṇṇaṃ paramaduggandhajegucchaṃ upagantuṃ vā daṭṭhuṃ vā anaraharūpataṃ āpajjitvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0501a:255_21: hutvā udaraggisantāpavegakuthitaṃ kimikulākulaṃ uparūpari pheṇapupphuḷakāni muñcantaṃ paramakasambuduggandhajegucchabhāvamāpajjitvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0501a:255_24: Yattha ca patitaṃ pānabhojanādi pañcadhā vivekaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0501a:255_29: eko bhāgo rasabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā soṇitamaṃsādīni upabrūhayatīti.
atk-s0501a:256_0: Tattha yathā paramajegucchāya suvānadoṇiyā ṭhito suvānavamathu na jānāti “ahaṃ suvānadoṇiyā ṭhito”ti;
atk-s0501a:256_2: Evameva na udariyaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ imasmiṃ paramaduggandhajegucche udare ṭhita”nti;
atk-s0501a:256_8: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ udariyaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:257_0: Tato paraṃ antosarīre karīsaṃ vaṇṇato yebhuyyena ajjhohaṭāhāravaṇṇanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:257_4: Pakkāsayo nāma heṭṭhā nābhipiṭṭhikaṇṭakamūlānaṃ antare antāvasāne ubbedhena aṭṭhaṅgulamatto vaṃsanaḷakabbhantarasadiso padeso,
atk-s0501a:257_5: yattha seyyathāpi nāma uparibhūmibhāge patitaṃ vassodakaṃ ogaḷitvā heṭṭhābhūmibhāgaṃ pūretvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0501a:257_6: evameva yaṃkiñci āmāsaye patitaṃ pānabhojanādikaṃ udaragginā pheṇuddehakaṃ pakkaṃ pakkaṃ saṇhakaraṇiyā
atk-s0501a:257_7: piṭṭhamiva saṇhabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā antabilena ogaḷitvā omadditvā vaṃsanaḷake pakkhittapaṇḍumattikā viya
atk-s0501a:258_0: Tattha yathā vaṃsanaḷake omadditvā pakkhittapaṇḍumattikā na jānāti “ahaṃ vaṃsanaḷake ṭhitā”ti,
atk-s0501a:258_2: evameva na karīsaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ pakkāsaye ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:258_8: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ karīsaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:259_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre sīsakaṭāhabbhantare matthaluṅgaṃ vaṇṇato setaṃ ahichattakapiṇḍivaṇṇanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:259_4: Okāsato sīsakaṭāhassa abbhantare cattāro sibbinimagge nissāya samodhāya ṭhapitā cattāro piṭṭhapiṇḍikā
atk-s0501a:260_0: Tattha yathā purāṇalābukaṭāhe pakkhittapiṭṭhapiṇḍi pakkuthitaduddhaṃ vā na jānāti “ahaṃ purāṇalābukaṭāhe ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:260_1: napi purāṇalābukaṭāhaṃ jānāti “mayi piṭṭhapiṇḍi pakkuthitaduddhaṃ vā ṭhita”nti;
atk-s0501a:260_2: evameva na matthaluṅgaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ sīsakaṭāhabbhantare ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:260_8: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ matthaluṅgaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:261_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre baddhābaddhabhedato duvidhampi pittaṃ vaṇṇato bahalamadhukatelavaṇṇanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:261_4: Okāsato abaddhapittaṃ kesalomanakhadantānaṃ maṃsavinimuttaṭṭhānaṃ thaddhasukkhacammañca vajjetvā udakamiva telabindu avasesasarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0501a:261_5: yamhi kupite akkhīni pītakāni honti bhamanti,
atk-s0501a:261_7: Baddhapittaṃ hadayapapphāsānamantare yakanamaṃsaṃ nissāya patiṭṭhite mahākosātakikosakasadise pittakosake ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0501a:262_0: Tattha yathā udakaṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ telaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ udakaṃ byāpetvā ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:262_1: napi udakaṃ jānāti “telaṃ maṃ byāpetvā ṭhita”nti;
atk-s0501a:262_2: evameva na abaddhapittaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ sarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:262_3: napi sarīraṃ jānāti “abaddhapittaṃ maṃ byāpetvā ṭhita”nti.
atk-s0501a:262_4: Yathā ca kosātakikosake ṭhitaṃ vassodakaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ kosātakikosake ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:262_6: evameva na baddhapittaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ pittakosake ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:262_12: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ pittaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:263_0: Tato paraṃ sarīrabbhantare ekapattapūrappamāṇaṃ semhaṃ vaṇṇato setaṃ kacchakapaṇṇarasavaṇṇanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:263_4: Yaṃ pānabhojanādiajjhoharaṇakāle seyyathāpi nāma udake sevālapaṇakaṃ kaṭṭhe vā kathale vā patante chijjitvā
atk-s0501a:263_6: evameva pānabhojanādimhi nipatante chijjitvā dvidhā hutvā puna ajjhottharitvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0501a:263_7: yamhi ca mandībhūte pakkamiva gaṇḍaṃ pūtikamiva kukkuṭaṇḍaṃ udarapaṭalaṃ paramajegucchakuṇapagandhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:263_8: Tato uggatena ca gandhena uggāropi mukhampi duggandhaṃ pūtikuṇapasadisaṃ hoti,
atk-s0501a:263_9: so ca puriso “apehi duggandhaṃ vāyasī”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati,
atk-s0501a:263_10: yañca abhivaḍḍhitaṃ bahalattamāpannaṃ paṭikujjanaphalakamiva vaccakuṭiyā udarapaṭalabbhantare eva kuṇapagandhaṃ sannirumbhitvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0501a:264_0: Tattha yathā candanikāya uparipheṇapaṭalaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ candanikāya ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:264_2: evameva na semhaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ udarapaṭale ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:264_8: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ semhaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:265_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre pubbo vaṇṇato paṇḍupalāsavaṇṇoti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:265_3: Okāsato pubbassa okāso nāma nibaddho natthi.
atk-s0501a:265_5: yatra yatra khāṇukaṇṭakappaharaṇaggijālādīhi abhihate sarīrappadese lohitaṃ saṇṭhahitvā paccati,
atk-s0501a:266_0: Tattha yathā rukkhassa tattha tattha pharasudhārādīhi pahatappadese avagaḷitvā ṭhito niyyāso na jānāti “ahaṃ rukkhassa pahatappadese ṭhito”ti,
atk-s0501a:266_1: napi rukkhassa pahatappadeso jānāti “mayi niyyāso ṭhito”ti;
atk-s0501a:266_2: evameva na pubbo jānāti “ahaṃ sarīrassa tattha tattha khāṇukaṇṭakādīhi abhihatappadese gaṇḍapiḷakādīnaṃ uṭṭhitappadese vā ṭhito”ti,
atk-s0501a:266_8: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ pubbaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:267_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre sannicitalohitaṃ saṃsaraṇalohitanti evaṃ duvidhe lohite sannicitalohitaṃ tāva vaṇṇato bahalakuthitalākhārasavaṇṇanti vavatthapeti,
atk-s0501a:267_5: Okāsato saṃsaraṇalohitaṃ kesalomanakhadantānaṃ maṃsavinimuttaṭṭhānañceva thaddhasukkhacammañca vajjetvā
atk-s0501a:267_7: Sannicitalohitaṃ yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgaṃ pūretvā ekapattapūraṇamattaṃ vakkahadayapapphāsānaṃ upari thokaṃ
atk-s0501a:267_8: thokaṃ binduṃ pātentaṃ vakkahadayayakanapapphāse tementaṃ ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0501a:267_9: yamhi vakkahadayādīni atemente sattā pipāsitā honti.
atk-s0501a:268_0: Tattha yathā jajjarakapāle ṭhitaṃ udakaṃ heṭṭhā leḍḍukhaṇḍādīni tementaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ jajjarakapāle ṭhitaṃ heṭṭhā leḍḍukhaṇḍādīni tememī”ti,
atk-s0501a:268_1: napi jajjarakapālaṃ heṭṭhā leḍḍukhaṇḍādīni vā jānanti “mayi udakaṃ ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0501a:268_3: evameva na lohitaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ yakanassa heṭṭhābhāge vakkahadayādīni tementaṃ ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:268_4: napi yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgaṭṭhānaṃ vakkahadayādīni vā jānanti “mayi lohitaṃ ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0501a:268_10: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ lohitaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:269_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre sedo vaṇṇato pasannatilatelavaṇṇoti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:269_3: Okāsato sedassa okāso nāma nibaddho natthi,
atk-s0501a:269_4: yattha sedo lohitaṃ viya sadā tiṭṭheyya.
atk-s0501a:269_5: Yasmā vā yadā aggisantāpasūriyasantāpautuvikārādīhi sarīraṃ santapati,
atk-s0501a:269_7: Tasmā tesaṃ kesalomakūpavivarānaṃ vasena taṃ saṇṭhānato vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:269_8: “Sedapariggaṇhakena ca yogāvacarena kesalomakūpavivare pūretvā ṭhitavaseneva sedo manasikātabbo”ti vuttaṃ pubbācariyehi.
atk-s0501a:270_0: Tattha yathā bhisamuḷālakumudanālakalāpavivarehi paggharantaṃ udakaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ bhisamuḷālakumudanālakalāpavivarehi paggharāmī”ti,
atk-s0501a:270_2: evameva na sedo jānāti “ahaṃ kesalomakūpavivarehi paggharāmī”ti,
atk-s0501a:270_8: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ sedaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:271_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre cammamaṃsantare medo vaṇṇato phālitahaliddivaṇṇoti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:271_2: Tathā hi sukhino thūlasarīrassa cammamaṃsantare pharitvā ṭhito haliddirattadukūlapilotikasaṇṭhāno,
atk-s0501a:271_6: Okāsato thūlasarīrassa sakalasarīraṃ pharitvā kisassa jaṅghāmaṃsādīni nissāya ṭhito,
atk-s0501a:271_7: yo sinehasaṅkhātopi hutvā paramajegucchattā na matthakatelatthaṃ na gaṇḍūsatelatthaṃ na dīpajālanatthaṃ saṅgayhati.
atk-s0501a:272_0: Tattha yathā maṃsapuñjaṃ nissāya ṭhitā haliddirattadukūlapilotikā na jānāti “ahaṃ maṃsapuñjaṃ nissāya ṭhitā”ti,
atk-s0501a:272_1: napi maṃsapuñjo jānāti “haliddirattadukūlapilotikā maṃ nissāya ṭhitā”ti;
atk-s0501a:272_2: evameva na medo jānāti “ahaṃ sakalasarīraṃ jaṅghādīsu vā maṃsaṃ nissāya ṭhito”ti,
atk-s0501a:272_3: napi sakalasarīraṃ jānāti jaṅghādīsu vā maṃsaṃ “medo maṃ nissāya ṭhito”ti.
atk-s0501a:272_10: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ medaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:273_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre assu vaṇṇato pasannatilatelavaṇṇanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:273_4: Na cetaṃ pittakosake pittamiva akkhikūpakesu sadā sannicitaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0501a:273_5: kintu yadā somanassajātā sattā mahāhasitaṃ hasanti,
atk-s0501a:273_8: yadā ca tesaṃ akkhīni dhūmarajapaṃsukādīhi abhihaññanti,
atk-s0501a:273_9: tadā etehi somanassadomanassavisamāhārādīhi samuṭṭhahitvā assu akkhikūpakesu pūretvā tiṭṭhati paggharati ca.
atk-s0501a:273_10: “Assupariggaṇhakena ca yogāvacarena akkhikūpake pūretvā ṭhitavaseneva taṃ manasikātabba”nti pubbācariyā vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0501a:274_0: Tattha yathā matthakacchinnataruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakesu ṭhitaṃ udakaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ matthakacchinnataruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakesu ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:274_2: evameva na assu jānāti “ahaṃ akkhikūpakesu ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:274_8: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ assuṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:275_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre vilīnasinehasaṅkhātā vasā vaṇṇato ācāme āsittatelavaṇṇāti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:275_4: Na cesā etesu okāsesu sadā vilīnā eva hutvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0501a:275_5: kintu yadā aggisantāpasūriyasantāpautuvisabhāgadhātuvisabhāgehi te padesā usmājātā honti,
atk-s0501a:275_6: tadā tattha vilīnāva hutvā pasannasalilāsu udakasoṇḍikāsu nīhāro viya sarati.
atk-s0501a:276_0: Tattha yathā udakasoṇḍiyo ajjhottharitvā ṭhito nīhāro na jānāti “ahaṃ udakasoṇḍiyo ajjhottharitvā ṭhito”ti,
atk-s0501a:276_1: napi udakasoṇḍiyo jānanti “nīhāro amhe ajjhottharitvā ṭhito”ti;
atk-s0501a:276_2: evameva na vasā jānāti “ahaṃ hatthatalādīni ajjhottharitvā ṭhitā”ti,
atk-s0501a:276_3: napi hatthatalādīni jānanti “vasā amhe ajjhottharitvā ṭhitā”ti.
atk-s0501a:276_8: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ vasaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:277_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre mukhassabbhantare kheḷo vaṇṇato seto pheṇavaṇṇoti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:277_4: Okāsato ubhohi kapolapassehi orohitvā jivhāya ṭhitoti.
atk-s0501a:277_5: Na ceso ettha sadā sannicito hutvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0501a:277_6: kintu yadā sattā tathārūpaṃ āhāraṃ passanti vā saranti vā,
atk-s0501a:277_10: tadā kheḷo uppajjitvā ubhohi kapolapassehi orohitvā jivhāya saṇṭhāti.
atk-s0501a:277_13: mukhe pakkhittañca puthukaṃ vā taṇḍulaṃ vā aññaṃ vā kiñci khādanīyaṃ nadipuline khatakūpasalilamiva parikkhayamagacchantova sadā temanasamattho hoti.
atk-s0501a:278_0: Tattha yathā nadipuline khatakūpatale saṇṭhitaṃ udakaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ kūpatale saṇṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:278_2: evameva na kheḷo jānāti “ahaṃ ubhohi kapolapassehi orohitvā jivhātale saṇṭhito”ti,
atk-s0501a:278_3: napi jivhātalaṃ jānāti “mayi ubhohi kapolapassehi orohitvā kheḷo saṇṭhito”ti.
atk-s0501a:278_8: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ kheḷaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:279_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre siṅghāṇikā vaṇṇato setā taruṇatālamiñjavaṇṇāti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:279_2: sedetvā sedetvā nāsāpuṭe nirantaraṃ pakkhittavettaṅkurasaṇṭhānātipi eke.
atk-s0501a:279_5: Na cesā ettha sadā sannicitā hutvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0501a:279_6: kintu seyyathāpi nāma puriso paduminipatte dadhiṃ bandhitvā heṭṭhā paduminipattaṃ kaṇṭakena vijjheyya,
atk-s0501a:279_7: atha tena chiddena dadhipiṇḍaṃ gaḷitvā bahi papateyya;
atk-s0501a:279_10: tadā antosīsato pūtisemhabhāvaṃ āpannaṃ matthaluṅgaṃ gaḷitvā tālumatthakavivarena otaritvā nāsāpuṭe pūretvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0501a:280_0: Tattha yathā sippikāya pakkhittaṃ pūtidadhi na jānāti “ahaṃ sippikāya ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:280_1: napi sippikā jānāti “mayi pūtikaṃ dadhi ṭhita”nti;
atk-s0501a:280_2: evameva na siṅghāṇikā jānāti “ahaṃ nāsāpuṭesu ṭhitā”ti,
atk-s0501a:280_8: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ siṅghāṇikaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:281_0: Tato paraṃ antosarīre lasikāti sarīrasandhīnaṃ abbhantare picchilakuṇapaṃ.
atk-s0501a:281_4: Okāsato aṭṭhisandhīnaṃ abbhañjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā asītisatasandhīnaṃ abbhantare ṭhitāti.
atk-s0501a:281_6: tassa uṭṭhahantassa nisīdantassa abhikkamantassa paṭikkamantassa samiñjantassa pasārentassa aṭṭhikāni kaṭakaṭāyanti,
atk-s0501a:281_9: gattāni dukkhanti yassa pana cesā bahukā hoti,
atk-s0501a:281_11: dīghampi addhānaṃ gatassa na vāyodhātu kuppati,
atk-s0501a:282_0: Tattha yathā abbhañjanatelaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ akkhaṃ abbhañjitvā ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:282_1: napi akkho jānāti “maṃ telaṃ abbhañjitvā ṭhita”nti;
atk-s0501a:282_2: evameva na lasikā jānāti “ahaṃ asītisatasandhiyo abbhañjitvā ṭhitā”ti,
atk-s0501a:282_3: napi asītisatasandhiyo jānanti “lasikā amhe abbhañjitvā ṭhitā”ti.
atk-s0501a:282_8: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ lasikaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:283_0: Tato paraṃ antosarīre muttaṃ vaṇṇato māsakhārodakavaṇṇanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:283_5: yattha seyyathāpi nāma candanikāya pakkhitte amukhe peḷāghaṭe candanikāraso pavisati,
atk-s0501a:283_8: na cassa pavisanamaggo paññāyati nikkhamanamaggo eva tu pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0501a:283_9: yamhi ca muttassa bharite “passāvaṃ karomā”ti sattānaṃ āyūhanaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:283_10: Tattha yathā candanikāya pakkhitte amukhe peḷāghaṭe ṭhito candanikāraso na jānāti “ahaṃ amukhe peḷāghaṭe ṭhito”ti,
atk-s0501a:283_12: evameva muttaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ vatthimhi ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:283_16: Paricchedato vatthiabbhantarena ceva muttabhāgena ca paricchinnanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:283_18: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ muttaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:284_0: Tassevaṃ imaṃ dvattiṃsākāraṃ vaṇṇādivasena vavatthapentassa taṃ taṃ bhāvanānuyogaṃ āgamma kesādayo paguṇā honti,
atk-s0501a:284_2: Tato pabhuti seyyathāpi nāma cakkhumato purisassa dvattiṃsavaṇṇānaṃ pupphānaṃ ekasuttaganthitaṃ mālaṃ
atk-s0501a:284_4: evameva “atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā”ti imaṃ kāyaṃ satiyā olokentassa sabbe te dhammā apubbāpariyamiva pākaṭā honti.
atk-s0501a:284_5: Kesesu āvajjitesu asaṇṭhahamānāva sati yāva muttaṃ,
atk-s0501a:284_7: Tato pabhuti tassa āhiṇḍantā manussatiracchānādayo ca sattākāraṃ vijahitvā koṭṭhāsarāsivaseneva upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0501a:284_8: tehi ca ajjhohariyamānaṃ pānabhojanādi koṭṭhāsarāsimhi pakkhippamānamiva upaṭṭhātīti.
atk-s0501a:285_0: Etthāha “athānena tato paraṃ kiṃ kātabba”nti? Vuccate –
atk-s0501a:285_1: tadeva nimittaṃ āsevitabbaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ bahulīkātabbaṃ suvavatthitaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:285_2: Kathaṃ panāyaṃ taṃ nimittaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti suvavatthitaṃ vavatthapetīti?
atk-s0501a:285_3: Ayañhi taṃ kesādīnaṃ koṭṭhāsabhāvena upaṭṭhānanimittaṃ āsevati,
atk-s0501a:285_6: Tattha laddhaṃ vā satiṃ vaḍḍhento taṃ bhāvetīti vuccati.
atk-s0501a:285_8: Suvavatthitaṃ vavatthapetīti yathā suṭṭhu vavatthitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0501a:286_7: tayo ca suttantāti evaṃ dasavidhaṃ manasikārakosallaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0501a:287_0: Etthāha “kathaṃ panāyaṃ anupubbādivasena ete dhamme manasi karotī”ti? Vuccate –
atk-s0501a:287_1: ayañhi kese manasi karitvā tadanantaraṃ lome manasi karoti, na nakhe.
atk-s0501a:287_2: Tathā lome manasi karitvā tadanantaraṃ nakhe manasi karoti, na dante.
atk-s0501a:287_4: Uppaṭipāṭiyā hi manasikaronto seyyathāpi nāma akusalo puriso dvattiṃsapadaṃ nisseṇiṃ uppaṭipāṭiyā ārohanto kilantakāyo tato nisseṇito papatati,
atk-s0501a:287_6: evameva bhāvanāsampattivasena adhigantabbassa assādassa anadhigamanato kilantacitto dvattiṃsākārabhāvanāto papatati,
atk-s0501a:288_0: Anupubbato manasikarontopi ca kesā lomāti nātisīghatopi manasi karoti.
atk-s0501a:288_1: Atisīghato hi manasikaronto seyyathāpi nāma addhānaṃ gacchanto puriso samavisamarukkhathalaninnadvedhāpathādīni
atk-s0501a:288_5: evameva vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīni dvattiṃsākāranimittāni upalakkhetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0501a:289_2: Atisaṇikato hi manasikaronto seyyathāpi nāma puriso addhānamaggaṃ paṭipanno antarāmagge rukkhapabbatataḷākādīsu
atk-s0501a:289_3: vilambamāno icchitappadesaṃ apāpuṇanto antarāmaggeyeva sīhabyagghādīhi anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇāti;
atk-s0501a:289_4: evameva dvattiṃsākārabhāvanāsampadaṃ apāpuṇanto bhāvanāvicchedena antarāyeva kāmavitakkādīhi anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0501a:290_0: Nātisaṇikato manasikarontopi ca vikkhepappahānatopi manasi karoti.
atk-s0501a:290_1: Vikkhepappahānato nāma yathā aññesu navakammādīsu cittaṃ na vikkhipati,
atk-s0501a:290_3: Bahiddhā vikkhepamānacitto hi kesādīsveva asamāhitacetovitakko bhāvanāsampadaṃ apāpuṇitvā antarāva anayabyasanaṃ
atk-s0501a:290_5: Avikkhipamānacitto pana kesādīsveva samāhitacetovitakko bhāvanāsampadaṃ pāpuṇāti bodhisatto viya takkasilarajjasampadanti.
atk-s0501a:290_6: Tassevaṃ vikkhepappahānato manasikaroto adhikāracariyādhimuttīnaṃ vasena te dhammā asubhato vā vaṇṇato vā suññato vā upaṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0501a:291_0: Atha paṇṇattisamatikkamanato te dhamme manasi karoti.
atk-s0501a:291_1: Paṇṇattisamatikkamanatoti kesā lomāti evamādivohāraṃ samatikkamitvā vissajjetvā yathūpaṭṭhitānaṃ asubhādīnaṃyeva vasena manasi karoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0501a:291_2: Yathā araññanivāsūpagatā manussā aparicitabhūmibhāgattā udakaṭṭhānasañjānanatthaṃ sākhābhaṅgādinimittaṃ
atk-s0501a:291_5: atha taṃ nimittaṃ vissajjetvā amanasikatvāva udakaṭṭhānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā udakaṃ paribhuñjanti,
atk-s0501a:291_6: evamevāyaṃ kesā lomātiādinā taṃtaṃvohārassa vasena paṭhamaṃ te dhamme manasākāsi,
atk-s0501a:291_7: tesu dhammesu asubhādīnaṃ aññataravasena upaṭṭhahantesu taṃ vohāraṃ samatikkamitvā vissajjetvā asubhāditova manasi karoti.
atk-s0501a:292_0: Etthāha “kathaṃ panassa ete dhammā asubhādito upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0501a:292_6: Kesā tāvassa vaṇṇasaṇṭhānagandhāsayokāsavasena pañcadhā asubhato upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0501a:292_7: pañcadhā eva ayamete asubhato manasi karoti.
atk-s0501a:292_10: Tathā hi manussā divā pānabhojane patitaṃ kesavaṇṇaṃ vākaṃ vā suttaṃ vā disvā kesasaññāya manoramampi pānabhojanaṃ chaḍḍenti vā jigucchanti vā.
atk-s0501a:292_12: Tathā hi rattiṃ pānabhojane patitaṃ kesasaṇṭhānaṃ vākaṃ vā suttaṃ vā phusitvā kesasaññāya manoramampi pānabhojanaṃ chaḍḍenti vā jigucchanti vā.
atk-s0501a:292_14: Tathā hi telamakkhanapupphadhūmādisaṅkhārehi virahitānaṃ kesānaṃ gandho paramajeguccho hoti,
atk-s0501a:292_15: aggīsu pakkhittassa kesassa gandhaṃ ghāyitvā sattā nāsikaṃ pidhenti,
atk-s0501a:292_18: Tathā hi nānāvidhena manussāsucinissandena saṅkāraṭṭhāne taṇḍuleyyakādīni viya pittasemhapubbalohitanissandena
atk-s0501a:292_19: te ācitā vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ gamitāti.
atk-s0501a:292_21: Tathā hi saṅkāraṭṭhāne viya taṇḍuleyyakādīni paramajegucche lomādiekatiṃsakuṇaparāsimatthake manussānaṃ sīsapaliveṭhake allacamme jātāti.
atk-s0501a:292_23: Evaṃ tāva ayamete dhamme asubhato upaṭṭhahante asubhato manasi karoti.
atk-s0501a:293_5: evaṃ vaṇṇato upaṭṭhahante vaṇṇato manasi karoti.
atk-s0501a:293_11: Evaṃ suññato upaṭṭhahante suññato manasi karoti.
atk-s0501a:294_0: Evaṃ manasikaronto ayamete dhamme anupubbamuñcanato manasi karoti.
atk-s0501a:294_1: Anupubbamuñcanatoti asubhādīnaṃ aññataravasena upaṭṭhite kese muñcitvā lome manasikaronto seyyathāpi
atk-s0501a:294_2: nāma jalūkā naṅguṭṭhena gahitappadese sāpekkhāva hutvā tuṇḍena aññaṃ padesaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0501a:294_4: evameva kesesu sāpekkhova hutvā lome manasi karoti,
atk-s0501a:294_5: lomesu ca patiṭṭhite manasikāre kese muñcati.
atk-s0501a:294_7: Evaṃ hissa anupubbamuñcanato manasikaroto asubhādīsu aññataravasena te dhammā upaṭṭhahantā anavasesato upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0501a:295_0: Atha yassa te dhammā asubhato upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0501a:295_2: tassa seyyathāpi nāma makkaṭo dvattiṃsatālake tālavane byādhena paripātiyamāno ekarukkhepi asaṇṭhahanto paridhāvitvā yadā nivatto hoti kilanto,
atk-s0501a:295_3: atha ekameva ghanatālapaṇṇapariveṭhitaṃ tālasuciṃ nissāya tiṭṭhati;
atk-s0501a:295_4: evameva cittamakkaṭo dvattiṃsakoṭṭhāsake imasmiṃ kāye teneva yoginā paripātiyamāno ekakoṭṭhāsakepi asaṇṭhahanto
atk-s0501a:295_5: paridhāvitvā yadā anekārammaṇavidhāvane abhilāsābhāvena nivatto hoti kilanto.
atk-s0501a:295_6: Atha yvāssa kesādīsu dhammo paguṇataro caritānurūpataro vā,
atk-s0501a:295_9: Atha tameva nimittaṃ punappunaṃ takkāhataṃ vitakkāhataṃ karitvā yathākkamaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0501a:296_0: Yassa pana te dhammā vaṇṇato upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0501a:296_2: atha yvāssa kesādīsu dhammo paguṇataro caritānurūpataro vā,
atk-s0501a:296_5: Atha tameva nimittaṃ punappunaṃ takkāhataṃ vitakkāhataṃ karitvā yathākkamaṃ nīlakasiṇavasena pītakasiṇavasena vā pañcapi rūpāvacarajjhānāni uppādeti,
atk-s0501a:296_6: tesañca yattha katthaci patiṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā ariyabhūmiṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0501a:297_0: Yassa pana te dhammā suññato upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0501a:297_2: lakkhaṇato manasikaronto tattha catudhātuvavatthānavasena upacārajjhānaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0501a:297_3: Atha manasikaronto te dhamme aniccadukkhānattasuttattayavasena manasi karoti.
atk-s0501a:297_5: So imaṃ vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā yathākkamañca paṭipajjitvā ariyabhūmiṃ pāpuṇātīti.
atk-s0501a:298_1: “kathaṃ panāyaṃ anupubbādivasena ete dhamme manasi karotī”ti,
atk-s0501a:300_0: Idāni imasmiṃyeva dvattiṃsākāre vaṇṇanāparicayapāṭavatthaṃ ayaṃ pakiṇṇakanayo veditabbo –
atk-s0501a:303_0: Tattha nimittatoti evaṃ vuttappakāre imasmiṃ dvattiṃsākāre saṭṭhisataṃ nimittāni honti,
atk-s0501a:303_1: yesaṃ vasena yogāvacaro dvattiṃsākāraṃ koṭṭhāsato pariggaṇhāti.
atk-s0501a:304_1: yesaṃ vasena yogāvacaro dvattiṃsākāraṃ lakkhaṇato manasi karoti.
atk-s0501a:305_2: ayaṃ purisapuggalo”ti ettha vuttāsu dhātūsu aṭṭhavīsatisataṃ dhātuyo honti,
atk-s0501a:305_3: yāsaṃ vasena yogāvacaro dvattiṃsākāraṃ dhātuto pariggaṇhāti.
atk-s0501a:306_1: yāsaṃ vasena yogāvacaro dvattiṃsākāraṃ suññato vipassati.
atk-s0501a:306_4: tathā āpodhātvādayo pathavīdhātvādīhīti catasso suññatā honti.
atk-s0501a:307_0: Khandhāditoti dvattiṃsākāre kesādīsu khandhādivasena saṅgayhamānesu “kesā kati khandhā honti,
atk-s0501a:307_4: kati satipaṭṭhānānī”ti evamādinā nayena vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-s0501a:307_5: Evañcassa vijānato tiṇakaṭṭhasamūho viya kāyo khāyati. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:312_0: Amānusī rati hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato”ti. –
atk-s0501a:313_0: Evaṃ amānusī rati vuttā, sā adūratarā hoti. Tato yaṃ taṃ –
atk-s0501a:316_1: Taṃ anubhavanto na cireneva ariyajanasevitaṃ ajarāmaraṃ nibbānāmataṃ sacchikarotīti.
atk-s0501a:321_0: Idāni ekaṃ nāma kinti evamādīnaṃ kumārapañhānaṃ atthavaṇṇanākkamo anuppatto.
atk-s0501a:321_1: Tesaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ idha nikkhepappayojanañca vatvā vaṇṇanaṃ karissāma –
atk-s0501a:322_0: Aṭṭhuppatti tāva nesaṃ sopāko nāma bhagavato mahāsāvako ahosi.
atk-s0501a:322_2: tassa bhagavā pañhabyākaraṇena upasampadaṃ anuññātukāmo attanā adhippetatthānaṃ pañhānaṃ byākaraṇasamatthataṃ
atk-s0501a:322_3: passanto “ekaṃ nāma ki”nti evamādinā pañhe pucchi.
atk-s0501a:322_5: Tena ca byākaraṇena bhagavato cittaṃ ārādhesi.
atk-s0501a:325_3: tasmā idāni nānappakārato paññābhāvanāmukhadassanatthaṃ ime pañhabyākaraṇā idha nikkhittā.
atk-s0501a:325_8: tasmā sikkhāpadehi sīlaṃ dvattiṃsākārena taṃgocaraṃ samādhiñca dassetvā samāhitacittassa nānādhammaparikkhārāya
atk-s0501a:329_1: ekaṃ nāma kinti bhagavā yasmiṃ ekadhammasmiṃ bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti,
atk-s0501a:329_4: “Sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti thero puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya vissajjeti.
atk-s0501a:329_9: bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”ti evamādīni cettha suttāni evaṃ vissajjanayuttisambhave sādhakāni.
atk-s0501a:329_11: so āhāro taṃ vā nesaṃ āhāraṭṭhitikattaṃ “ekaṃ nāma ki”nti puṭṭhena therena niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:329_13: na tu sāsane loke vā aññaṃ ekaṃ nāma natthīti ñāpetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0501a:330_2: bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno sammā virajjamāno sammā vimuccamāno sammā pariyantadassāvī sammattaṃ abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a:330_9: ‘Eko pañho eko uddeso ekaṃ veyyākaraṇa’nti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0501a:331_4: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāyā”ti evamādīsu paccayo āhāroti vuccati,
atk-s0501a:331_5: evaṃ paccayaṃ āhārasaddena gahetvā paccayaṭṭhitikā “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti vuttā.
atk-s0501a:331_7: “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti vuccamāne “asaññasattā devā ahetukā anāhārā aphassakā avedanakā”ti vacanato “sabbe”ti vacanamayuttaṃ bhaveyya.
atk-s0501a:332_6: Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0501a:332_11: Seyyathāpi hi gehāni upādāya paññāpetabbattā gāmassa ekasmimpi dvīsu tīsupi vā gehesu daḍḍhesu “gāmo daḍḍho”ti evaṃ gehe gāmopacāro siddho,
atk-s0501a:332_12: evameva khandhesu paccayaṭṭhena āhāraṭṭhitikesu “sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti ayaṃ upacāro siddhoti veditabbo.
atk-s0501a:332_13: Paramatthato ca khandhesu jāyamānesu jīyamānesu mīyamānesu ca “khaṇe khaṇe tvaṃ bhikkhu jāyase ca jīyase
atk-s0501a:332_14: ca mīyase cā”ti vadatā bhagavatā tesu sattesu khandhopacāro siddhoti dassito evāti veditabbo.
atk-s0501a:332_15: Yato yena paccayākhyena āhārena sabbe sattā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0501a:332_16: so āhāro taṃ vā nesaṃ āhāraṭṭhitikattaṃ ekanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:332_17: Āhāro hi āhāraṭṭhitikattaṃ vā aniccatākāraṇato nibbidāṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:332_18: Atha tesu sabbasattasaññitesu saṅkhāresu aniccatādassanena nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti,
atk-s0501a:334_0: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā”ti. ;
atk-s0501a:335_0: Ettha ca “ekaṃ nāma ki”nti ca “kihā”ti ca duvidho pāṭho,
atk-s0501a:335_5: theriyānampi ayameva pāṭho”ti ubhayathāpi pana ekova attho.
atk-s0501a:335_8: Yathā pana “sukhena phuṭṭho atha vā dukhena,
atk-s0501a:335_9: dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedetī”ti evamādīsu katthaci dukhanti ca katthaci dukkhanti ca vuccati,
atk-s0501a:335_12: Idha pana ekaṃ nāmāti ayameva pāṭho.
atk-s0501a:337_0: Evaṃ iminā pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati dve nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a:337_1: Thero dveti paccanubhāsitvā “nāmañca rūpañcā”ti dhammādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya vissajjeti.
atk-s0501a:337_3: cittassa ca natihetuto sabbampi arūpaṃ “nāma”nti vuccati.
atk-s0501a:337_4: Idha pana nibbidāhetuttā sāsavadhammameva adhippetaṃ ruppanaṭṭhena cattāro ca mahābhūtā,
atk-s0501a:337_7: Adhippāyavaseneva cettha “dve nāma nāmañca rūpañcā”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0501a:338_12: dve veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0501a:339_0: Ettha ca nāmarūpamattadassanena attadiṭṭhiṃ pahāya anattānupassanāmukheneva nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti,
atk-s0501a:341_0: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā”ti. ;
atk-s0501a:343_0: Idāni imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati tīṇi nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a:343_1: Thero tīṇīti paccanubhāsitvā puna byākaritabbassa atthassa liṅgānurūpaṃ saṅkhyaṃ dassento “tisso vedanā”ti vissajjeti.
atk-s0501a:343_3: imāsamatthamahaṃ tīṇīti paccemī”ti dassento āhāti evampettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0501a:344_12: tīṇi veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0501a:345_0: Ettha ca “yaṃkiñci vedayitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhasminti vadāmī”ti vuttasuttānusārena vā. –
atk-s0501a:348_1: sukhasaññaṃ pahāya dukkhānupassanāmukhena nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti,
atk-s0501a:350_0: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā”ti. ;
atk-s0501a:352_0: Evaṃ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati cattāri nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a:352_1: Tattha imassa pañhassa byākaraṇapakkhe katthaci purimanayeneva cattāro āhārā adhippetā. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:353_10: ‘Cattāro pañhā cattāro uddesā cattāri veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0501a:354_0: Katthaci yesu subhāvitacitto anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti,
atk-s0501a:355_1: dhammesu bhikkhu sammā subhāvitacitto sammā pariyantadassāvī sammattaṃ abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a:355_7: ‘Cattāro pañhā cattāro uddesā cattāri veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā,
atk-s0501a:356_0: Idha pana yesaṃ catunnaṃ anubodhappaṭivedhato bhavataṇhāchedo hoti,
atk-s0501a:356_2: Yasmā vā iminā pariyāyena byākataṃ subyākatameva hoti,
atk-s0501a:358_0: Yasmā vā sadevakena lokena araṇīyato abhigamanīyatoti vuttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0501a:360_0: Apica ariyassa bhagavato saccānītipi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:361_0: “Sadevake, bhikkhave…pe… sadevamanussāya tathāgato ariyo, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti.
atk-s0501a:362_0: Atha vā etesaṃ abhisambuddhattā ariyabhāvasiddhitopi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:363_2: catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddhoti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0501a:364_0: Ayametesaṃ padattho. Etesaṃ pana ariyasaccānaṃ anubodhappaṭivedhato bhavataṇhāchedo hoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:367_0: Imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati pañca nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a:368_12: pañca veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0501a:369_0: Ettha ca pañcakkhandhe udayabbayavasena sammasanto vipassanāmataṃ laddhā anupubbena nibbānāmataṃ sacchikaroti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:373_0: Evaṃ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati “cha nāma ki”nti?
atk-s0501a:374_10: ‘Cha pañhā cha uddesā cha veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0501a:375_3: channetaṃ ajjhattikānaṃ āyatanānaṃ adhivacana”nti vacanato suññato pubbuḷakamarīcikādīni viya aciraṭṭhitikato
atk-s0501a:375_4: tucchato vañcanato ca samanupassaṃ nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantaṃ katvā maccurājassa adassanaṃ upeti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:377_0: Evaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantaṃ, maccurājā na passatī”ti. ;
atk-s0501a:379_0: Imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati satta nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a:379_1: Thero kiñcāpi mahāpañhabyākaraṇe satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo vuttā,
atk-s0501a:379_2: apica kho pana yesu dhammesu subhāvitacitto bhikkhu dukkhassantakaro hoti,
atk-s0501a:379_4: Ayampi cattho bhagavatā anumato eva. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:380_2: mañcepi tumhe gahapatayo upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyātha,
atk-s0501a:382_8: ‘Satta pañhā satta uddesā satta veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā,
atk-s0501a:384_4: anekupaddavappaṭipakkhabhūtāya satidhammavicayavīriyapītippassaddhisamādhupekkhāsaṅkhātāya dhammasāmaggiyā ariyasāvako bujjhatīti katvā bodhi,
atk-s0501a:384_7: nibbānameva vā sacchikarotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:384_9: Yathāvuttappakārāya vā etāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvakopi bodhi.
atk-s0501a:384_10: Iti tassā dhammasāmaggisaṅkhātāya bodhiyā aṅgabhūtattā bojjhaṅgā jhānaṅgamaggaṅgāni viya,
atk-s0501a:384_11: tassa vā bodhīti laddhavohārassa ariyasāvakassa aṅgabhūtattāpi bojjhaṅgā senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya.
atk-s0501a:385_5: sambujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā”ti imināpi paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttena vidhinā bojjhaṅgānaṃ bojjhaṅgaṭṭho veditabbo.
atk-s0501a:385_6: Evamime satta bojjhaṅge bhāvento bahulīkaronto na cirasseva ekantanibbidādiguṇapaṭilābhī hoti,
atk-s0501a:385_7: tena diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotīti vuccati.
atk-s0501a:386_2: bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
atk-s0501a:388_0: Evaṃ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati aṭṭha nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a:388_1: Thero kiñcāpi mahāpañhabyākaraṇe aṭṭha lokadhammā vuttā,
atk-s0501a:388_2: apica kho pana yesu dhammesu subhāvitacitto bhikkhu dukkhassantakaro hoti,
atk-s0501a:388_3: te dassento “ariyāni aṭṭha maggaṅgānī”ti avatvā yasmā aṭṭhaṅgavinimutto maggo nāma natthi,
atk-s0501a:388_5: tasmā tamatthaṃ sādhento desanāvilāsena ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti vissajjeti.
atk-s0501a:388_6: Bhagavatāpi cāyamattho desanānayo ca anumato eva. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:391_5: aṭṭha veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā,
atk-s0501a:392_0: Evamayaṃ attho ca desanānayo ca bhagavatā anumato evāti veditabbo.
atk-s0501a:393_6: pañcaṅgikaṃ viya ca tūriyaṃ aṅgavinibbhogena anupalabbhasabhāvato aṅgamattamevāti veditabbo.
atk-s0501a:394_0: Evamaṭṭhappabhedañcimaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvento bhikkhu avijjaṃ bhindati,
atk-s0501a:394_3: tena diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotīti vuccati.
atk-s0501a:395_2: sālisūkaṃ vā yavasūkaṃ vā sammā paṇihitaṃ hatthena vā pādena vā akkantaṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā bhecchati,
atk-s0501a:395_9: so vata bhikkhu sammā paṇihitāya diṭṭhiyā sammā paṇihitāya maggabhāvanāya avijjaṃ bhecchati,
atk-s0501a:397_0: Imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati nava nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a:397_3: Sattāti jīvitindriyappaṭibaddhe khandhe upādāya paññattā pāṇino paṇṇatti vā.
atk-s0501a:397_7: atthato pana navavidhānaṃ sattānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:398_2: seyyathāpi manussā ekacce ca devā ekacce ca vinipātikā,
atk-s0501a:399_0: Purimanayeneva cettha “nava sattāvāsā”ti vuttaṃ, na aññesaṃ navannamabhāvato. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:400_12: nava veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0501a:401_2: Nava sattāvāsā”ti vacanato navasu sattāvāsesu ñātapariññāya dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvadassanaṃ pahāya suddhasaṅkhārapuñjamattadassanena
atk-s0501a:401_3: nibbindamāno tīraṇapariññāya aniccānupassanena virajjamāno dukkhānupassanena vimuccamāno anattānupassanena
atk-s0501a:401_4: sammā pariyantadassāvī pahānapariññāya sammattamabhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a:404_0: Evaṃ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati dasa nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a:404_1: Tattha kiñcāpi imassa pañhassa ito aññatra veyyākaraṇesu dasa akusalakammapathā vuttā. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:405_10: ‘Dasa pañhā dasa uddesā dasa veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0501a:406_0: Idha pana yasmā ayamāyasmā attānaṃ anupanetvā aññaṃ byākātukāmo,
atk-s0501a:406_1: yasmā vā iminā pariyāyena byākataṃ subyākatameva hoti,
atk-s0501a:406_2: tasmā yehi dasahi aṅgehi samannāgato arahāti pavuccati,
atk-s0501a:406_3: tesaṃ adhigamaṃ dīpento dasahaṅgehi samannāgato arahāti pavuccatīti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya vissajjeti.
atk-s0501a:406_4: Yato ettha yehi dasahi aṅgehi samannāgato arahāti pavuccati,
atk-s0501a:406_5: tāni dasaṅgāni “dasa nāma ki”nti puṭṭhena therena niddiṭṭhānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0501a:407_13: asekhāya sammāvimuttiyā samannāgato hoti. Evaṃ kho,
atk-s0501a:413_0: Idāni kumārapañhānantaraṃ nikkhittassa maṅgalasuttassa atthavaṇṇanākkamo anuppatto,
atk-s0501a:413_1: tassa idha nikkhepappayojanaṃ vatvā atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma.
atk-s0501a:413_3: idañhi suttaṃ iminā anukkamena bhagavatā avuttampi yvāyaṃ saraṇagamanehi sāsanotāro,
atk-s0501a:413_7: so cassa maṅgalabhāvo iminā suttānusārena veditabboti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0501a:416_0: Evaṃ nikkhittassa panassa atthavaṇṇanatthaṃ ayaṃ mātikā –
atk-s0501a:417_0: “Vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmā, cetaṃ vatvā imaṃ vidhiṃ;
atk-s0501a:421_1: cetaṃ vatvā imaṃ vidhi”nti ayaṃ tāva addhagāthā yadidaṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā…pe…
atk-s0501a:421_6: tasmā nedaṃ tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
atk-s0501a:421_7: Yato vattabbametaṃ “idaṃ vacanaṃ kena vuttaṃ, kadā,
atk-s0501a:422_0: Paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti cesā sabbasuttanidānakosallatthamādito pabhuti evaṃ veditabbā.
atk-s0501a:422_2: katabuddhakicce kusinārāyaṃ upavattane mallānaṃ sālavane yamakasālānamantare visākhapuṇṇamadivase paccūsasamaye
atk-s0501a:422_4: bhagavati lokanāthe bhagavato parinibbāne sannipatitānaṃ sattannaṃ bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ saṅghatthero
atk-s0501a:422_5: āyasmā mahākassapo sattāhaparinibbute bhagavati subhaddena vuḍḍhapabbajitena “alaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0501a:422_9: upaddutā ca homa ‘idaṃ vo kappati idaṃ vo na kappatī’ti,
atk-s0501a:422_10: idāni pana mayaṃ yaṃ icchissāma taṃ karissāma,
atk-s0501a:422_11: yaṃ na icchissāma na taṃ karissāmā”ti vuttavacanamanussaranto “ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati yaṃ pāpabhikkhū
atk-s0501a:422_12: ‘atītasatthukaṃ pāvacana’nti maññamānā pakkhaṃ labhitvā na cirasseva saddhammaṃ antaradhāpeyyuṃ.
atk-s0501a:423_0: “Yo vo, ānanda, mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto, so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti.
atk-s0501a:424_0: “Yaṃnūnāhaṃ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyaṃ, yathayidaṃ sāsanaṃ addhaniyaṃ assa ciraṭṭhitikaṃ”.
atk-s0501a:426_1: sāṇāni paṃsukūlāni nibbasanānī”ti vatvā cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogena ceva –
atk-s0501a:428_0: Evamādinā nayena navānupubbavihārachaḷabhiññāppabhede uttarimanussadhamme attanā samasamaṭṭhapanena ca anuggahito,
atk-s0501a:428_2: “Nanu maṃ bhagavā rājā viya sakakavacaissariyānuppadānena attano kulavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpakaṃ puttaṃ ‘saddhammavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpako
atk-s0501a:428_3: me ayaṃ bhavissatī’ti mantvā iminā asādhāraṇena anuggahena anuggahesī”ti cintayanto dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ
atk-s0501a:429_2: samayaṃ pāvāya kusināraṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehī”ti sabbaṃ subhaddakaṇḍaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:432_3: anekasate anekasahasse ca vajjetvā tipiṭakasabbapariyattippabhedadhare paṭisambhidāppatte mahānubhāve
atk-s0501a:432_4: yebhuyyena bhagavatā etadaggaṃ āropite tevijjādibhede khīṇāsavabhikkhūyeva ekūnapañcasate pariggahesi.
atk-s0501a:432_5: Ye sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo ekenūnapañcaarahantasatāni uccinī”ti.
atk-s0501a:433_2: Tena hāyasmatā sahāpi vināpi na sakkā dhammasaṅgīti kātuṃ.
atk-s0501a:433_5: yasmā panassa kiñci dasabaladesitaṃ suttageyyādikaṃ bhagavato asammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0501a:433_7: Yadi evaṃ sekhopi samāno dhammasaṅgītiyā bahūkārattā therena uccinitabbo assa,
atk-s0501a:433_10: Thero hi āyasmante ānande ativiya vissattho ahosi.
atk-s0501a:433_11: Tathā hi naṃ sirasmiṃ palitesu jātesupi “na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”ti kumārakavādena ovadati.
atk-s0501a:433_12: Sakyakulappasuto cāyaṃ āyasmā tathāgatassa bhātā cūḷapitu putto,
atk-s0501a:433_13: tatra bhikkhū chandāgamanaṃ viya maññamānā “bahū asekhapaṭisambhidāppatte bhikkhū ṭhapetvā ānandaṃ sekhapaṭisambhidāppattaṃ
atk-s0501a:433_15: Taṃ parūpavādaṃ parivivajjento “ānandaṃ vinā saṅgīti na sakkā kātuṃ,
atk-s0501a:434_0: Atha sayameva bhikkhū ānandassatthāya theraṃ yāciṃsu. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:435_2: abhabbo chandā dosā mohā bhayā agatiṃ gantuṃ,
atk-s0501a:435_3: bahu cānena bhagavato santike dhammo ca vinayo ca pariyatto, tena hi, bhante,
atk-s0501a:435_5: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantampi ānandaṃ uccinī”ti.
atk-s0501a:436_0: Evaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anumatiyā uccinitena tenāyasmatā saddhiṃ pañcatherasatāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0501a:437_1: “kattha nu kho mayaṃ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0501a:437_2: Atha kho therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi “rājagahaṃ kho mahāgocaraṃ pahūtasenāsanaṃ,
atk-s0501a:437_3: yaṃnūna mayaṃ rājagahe vassaṃ vasantā dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyāma,
atk-s0501a:438_0: Atha tathāgatassa parinibbānato sattasu sādhukīḷanadivasesu sattasu ca dhātupūjādivasesu vītivattesu “aḍḍhamāso atikkanto,
atk-s0501a:438_3: gacchāmā”ti upaḍḍhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gahetvā ekaṃ maggaṃ gato.
atk-s0501a:438_4: Anuruddhattheropi upaḍḍhaṃ gahetvā ekaṃ maggaṃ gato,
atk-s0501a:438_5: ānandatthero pana bhagavato pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto sāvatthiṃ gantvā rājagahaṃ gantukāmo yena sāvatthi,
atk-s0501a:438_10: Anupubbena sāvatthiṃ anuppatte there bhagavato parinibbānasamaye viya mahāparidevo ahosi.
atk-s0501a:439_0: Tatra sudaṃ āyasmā ānando aniccatādipaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya taṃ mahājanaṃ saññāpetvā jetavanaṃ
atk-s0501a:439_1: pavisitvā dasabalena vasitagandhakuṭiyā dvāraṃ vivaritvā mañcapīṭhaṃ nīharitvā papphoṭetvā gandhakuṭiṃ
atk-s0501a:439_2: sammajjitvā milātamālākacavaraṃ chaḍḍetvā mañcapīṭhaṃ atiharitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā bhagavato ṭhitakāle
atk-s0501a:439_4: Atha thero bhagavato parinibbānato pabhuti ṭhānanisajjabahulattā ussannadhātukaṃ kāyaṃ samassāsetuṃ dutiyadivase
atk-s0501a:439_6: yaṃ sandhāya subhena māṇavena pahitaṃ māṇavakaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0501a:440_0: “Akālo kho, māṇavaka, atthi me ajja bhesajjamattā pītā, appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0501a:441_0: Dutiyadivase cetakattherena pacchāsamaṇena gantvā subhena māṇavena puṭṭho dīghanikāye subhasuttaṃ nāma dasamaṃ suttamabhāsi.
atk-s0501a:442_0: Atha kho thero jetavane vihāre khaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ kārāpetvā upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya rājagahaṃ gato.
atk-s0501a:442_1: Tathā mahākassapatthero anuruddhatthero ca sabbaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gahetvā rājagahameva gatā.
atk-s0501a:443_0: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahe aṭṭhārasa mahāvihārā honti.
atk-s0501a:443_2: Bhagavato hi parinibbāne sabbe bhikkhū attano attano pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vihāre ca pariveṇe ca chaḍḍetvā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0501a:443_3: Tattha therā bhagavato vacanapūjanatthaṃ titthiyavādaparimocanatthañca “paṭhamaṃ māsaṃ khaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ karomā”ti cintesuṃ.
atk-s0501a:443_4: Titthiyā hi vadeyyuṃ “samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā satthari ṭhiteyeva vihāre paṭijaggiṃsu,
atk-s0501a:444_5: majjhimaṃ māsaṃ sannipatitvā dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyissāmā”ti.
atk-s0501a:446_16: supariniṭṭhitabhūmikammaṃ brahmavimānasadisaṃ alaṅkaritvā tasmiṃ mahāmaṇḍape pañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0501a:446_17: anagghāni pañcakappiyapaccattharaṇasatāni paññāpetvā dakkhiṇabhāgaṃ nissāya uttarābhimukhaṃ therāsanaṃ,
atk-s0501a:446_18: maṇḍapamajjhe puratthābhimukhaṃ buddhassa bhagavato āsanārahaṃ dhammāsanaṃ paññāpetvā dantakhacitaṃ cittabījaniñcettha
atk-s0501a:447_4: tena te na yuttaṃ sannipātaṃ gantuṃ,
atk-s0501a:447_8: yvāhaṃ sekho samāno sannipātaṃ gaccheyya”nti bahudeva rattiṃ kāyagatāya satiyā vītināmetvā rattiyā paccūsasamaye
atk-s0501a:447_9: caṅkamā orohitvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā “nipajjissāmī”ti kāyaṃ āvajjesi.
atk-s0501a:447_12: etasmiṃ antare anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucci.
atk-s0501a:447_13: Ayañhi āyasmā caṅkamena bahi vītināmetvā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto cintesi “nanu maṃ bhagavā etadavoca –
atk-s0501a:447_20: handāhaṃ vīriyasamataṃ yojemī”ti caṅkamā orohitvā pādadhovanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā pāde dhovitvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0501a:447_21: mañcake nisīditvā “thokaṃ vissamissāmī”ti kāyaṃ mañcake upanāmesi.
atk-s0501a:447_24: etasmiṃ antare anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucci.
atk-s0501a:447_26: Tena “imasmiṃ sāsane anisinno anipanno aṭṭhito acaṅkamanto ko bhikkhu arahattaṃ patto”ti vutte “ānandatthero”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0501a:448_0: Atha therā bhikkhū dutiyadivase bhattakiccaṃ katvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitā.
atk-s0501a:448_1: Ānandatthero pana attano arahattappattiṃ ñāpetukāmo bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ na gato.
atk-s0501a:448_2: Bhikkhū yathāvuḍḍhaṃ attano attano pattāsane nisīdantā ānandattherassa āsanaṃ ṭhapetvā nisinnā.
atk-s0501a:448_5: Tasmiṃ samaye thero cintesi “idāni mayhaṃ gamanakālo”ti.
atk-s0501a:448_6: Tato attano ānubhāvaṃ dassento pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā attano āsaneyeva attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0501a:449_0: Evaṃ nisinne tasmiṃ āyasmante mahākassapatthero bhikkhū āmantesi, “āvuso,
atk-s0501a:449_1: kiṃ paṭhamaṃ saṅgāyāma dhammaṃ vā vinayaṃ vā”ti?
atk-s0501a:449_11: apica kho pana sammāsambuddho dharamānoyeva vinayapariyattiṃ nissāya āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ etadagge ṭhapesi –
atk-s0501a:449_14: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ upālī”’ti.
atk-s0501a:449_16: Tato thero vinayaṃ pucchanatthāya attanāva attānaṃ sammanni.
atk-s0501a:450_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo saṅghaṃ ñāpesi –
atk-s0501a:451_0: “Suṇātu me, āvuso, saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ upāliṃ vinayaṃ puccheyya”nti.
atk-s0501a:453_2: ahaṃ āyasmatā mahākassapena vinayaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyya”nti.
atk-s0501a:454_0: Evaṃ attanāva attānaṃ sammannitvā āyasmā, upāli,
atk-s0501a:454_1: uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā there bhikkhū vanditvā dhammāsane nisīdi dantakhacitaṃ bījaniṃ gahetvā.
atk-s0501a:454_2: Tato mahākassapatthero upālittheraṃ paṭhamapārājikaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ vinayaṃ pucchi,
atk-s0501a:454_4: Sabbe pañcasatā bhikkhū paṭhamapārājikasikkhāpadaṃ sanidānaṃ katvā ekato gaṇasajjhāyamakaṃsu.
atk-s0501a:454_6: Etena nayena saubhatovibhaṅgaṃ sakhandhakaparivāraṃ sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ saṅgāyitvā upālitthero dantakhacitaṃ
atk-s0501a:454_7: bījaniṃ nikkhipitvā dhammāsanā orohitvā vuḍḍhe bhikkhū vanditvā attano pattāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0501a:455_0: Vinayaṃ saṅgāyitvā dhammaṃ saṅgāyitukāmo āyasmā mahākassapatthero bhikkhū pucchi –
atk-s0501a:455_1: “dhammaṃ saṅgāyantehi kaṃ puggalaṃ dhuraṃ katvā dhammo saṅgāyitabbo”ti?
atk-s0501a:456_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo saṅghaṃ ñāpesi –
atk-s0501a:457_0: “Suṇātu me, āvuso, saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ ānandaṃ dhammaṃ puccheyya”nti.
atk-s0501a:458_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando saṅghaṃ ñāpesi –
atk-s0501a:459_2: ahaṃ āyasmatā mahākassapena dhammaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyya”nti.
atk-s0501a:460_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā there bhikkhū vanditvā dhammāsane nisīdi dantakhacitaṃ bījaniṃ gahetvā.
atk-s0501a:460_6: rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷandaṃ rājāgārake ambalaṭṭhikāya”nti.
atk-s0501a:460_9: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ brahmajālassa nidānampi pucchi,
atk-s0501a:460_18: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ sāmaññaphalassa nidānampi pucchi,
atk-s0501a:463_0: Imissā paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyā vattamānāya sabbaṃ dīghanikāyaṃ majjhimanikāyādiñca pucchitvā anupubbena
atk-s0501a:463_4: puggalampi pucchī”ti ettha nidāne pucchite taṃ nidānaṃ vitthāretvā yathā ca bhāsitaṃ,
atk-s0501a:463_10: taṃ sabbaṃ kathetukāmena “evaṃ bhāsitaṃ mayā sutaṃ,
atk-s0501a:463_14: devatāya bhāsita”nti etamatthaṃ dassentena āyasmatā ānandena vuttaṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ –
atk-s0501a:463_15: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme…pe…
atk-s0501a:464_2: tasmānena taṃ nidānaṃ ādito pabhuti vitthāretuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0501a:464_3: Yasmā vā ānandaṃ dhammāsane nisinnaṃ vasīgaṇaparivutaṃ disvā ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ cittamuppannaṃ “ayamāyasmā
atk-s0501a:464_8: idāni maññe bhagavato dhammarajjadāyajjaṃ patvā buddho jāto”ti.
