atk-s0501a:850_18: tasmiṃ ajjhogāhante udakaṃ yojanappamāṇaṃ apagantvā bhittīkataṃ viya tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0501a:850_20: Puna rājā suvaṇṇabhiṅkāraṃ gahetvā “ito paṭṭhāya mama rajja”nti udakena abbhukkiritvā nivattati.
atk-s0501a:851_0: Evaṃ catuddisaṃ anusaṃyāyitvā cakkaratanaṃ tiyojanappamāṇaṃ ākāsaṃ ārohati.
atk-s0501a:851_1: Tattha ṭhito rājā cakkaratanānubhāvena vijitavijayo pañcasataparittadīpapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ sattayojanasahassaparimaṇḍalaṃ pubbavidehaṃ,
atk-s0501a:851_4: dasayojanasahassaparimaṇḍalaṃ jambudīpañcāti evaṃ catumahādīpadvisahassaparittadīpapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ suphullapuṇḍarīkavanaṃ viya oloketi.
atk-s0501a:851_5: Evaṃ olokayato cassa anappakā rati uppajjati.
atk-s0501a:851_6: Evampi taṃ cakkaratanaṃ rañño ratiṃ janeti,
atk-s0501a:851_11: Tathāgato hi yassā dibbāya ratiyā cakkaratanādīhi sabbehipi janitā cakkavattirati saṅkhampi kalampi kalabhāgampi na upeti,
atk-s0501a:851_12: tatopi ratito uttaritarañca paṇītatarañca attano ovādappaṭikarānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānampi devamanussānaṃ paṭhamajjhānaratiṃ
atk-s0501a:852_0: Apica ratanaṃ nāmetaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti saviññāṇakamaviññāṇakañca.
atk-s0501a:852_5: Evaṃ duvidhe cettha saviññāṇakaratanaṃ aggamakkhāyati. Kasmā?
atk-s0501a:852_6: Yasmā aviññāṇakaṃ suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādiratanaṃ saviññāṇakānaṃ hatthiratanādīnaṃ alaṅkāratthāya upanīyati.
atk-s0501a:853_11: Yasmā agārikaratanesu aggo cakkavattipi sīlādiguṇayuttaṃ anagārikaratanaṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā
atk-s0501a:853_12: upaṭṭhahitvā payirupāsitvā dibbamānusikā sampattiyo pāpuṇitvā ante nibbānasampattiṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0501a:854_8: Sāriputtamoggallānasadisāpi hi anekasatā sāvakā ekassa paccekabuddhassa guṇānaṃ satabhāgampi na upenti.
atk-s0501a:854_11: Sakalampi hi jambudīpaṃ pūretvā pallaṅkena pallaṅkaṃ ghaṭentā nisinnā paccekabuddhā ekassa sammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0501a:854_12: guṇānaṃ neva saṅkhaṃ na kalaṃ na kalabhāgaṃ upenti.
atk-s0501a:854_17: Evaṃ kenaci pariyāyena tathāgatasamaṃ ratanaṃ natthi.
atk-s0501a:855_0: Evaṃ bhagavā buddharatanassa aññehi ratanehi asamataṃ vatvā idāni tesaṃ sattānaṃ uppannaupaddavavūpasamatthaṃ
atk-s0501a:855_1: neva jātiṃ na gottaṃ na kolaputtiyaṃ na vaṇṇapokkharatādiṃ nissāya,
atk-s0501a:855_2: apica kho avīcimupādāya bhavaggapariyante loke sīlasamādhikkhandhādīhi guṇehi buddharatanassa asadisabhāvaṃ
atk-s0501a:855_3: nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ,
atk-s0501a:856_1: idampi idha vā huraṃ vā saggesu vā yaṃkiñci atthi vittaṃ vā ratanaṃ vā,
atk-s0501a:856_2: tena saddhiṃ tehi tehi guṇehi asamattā buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ.
atk-s0501a:856_4: atha etena saccena imesaṃ pāṇīnaṃ suvatthi hotu,
atk-s0501a:856_7: suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā”ti evamādīsu attabhāvena vā attaniyabhāvena vāti attho.
atk-s0501a:856_8: Itarathā hi cakkhu attā vā attaniyaṃ vāti appaṭisiddhameva siyā.
atk-s0501a:856_11: Itarathā hi buddho neva ratananti sijjheyya.
atk-s0501a:856_14: Yattha pana cittīkatādiatthasaṅkhātaṃ yena vā tena vā vidhinā sambandhagataṃ ratanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0501a:856_16: tasmā tassa ratanassa atthitāya ratananti sijjhati.
atk-s0501a:856_17: Atha vā idampi buddhe ratananti imināpi pakārena buddhova ratananti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0501a:856_18: Vuttamattāya ca bhagavatā imāya gāthāya rājakulassa sotthi jātā,
atk-s0501a:856_20: Imissā gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a:858_1: Evaṃ buddhaguṇena saccaṃ vatvā idāni nibbānadhammaguṇena vattumāraddho “khayaṃ virāga”nti.
atk-s0501a:858_2: Tattha yasmā nibbānasacchikiriyāya rāgādayo khīṇā honti parikkhīṇā,
atk-s0501a:858_4: yasmā ca taṃ rāgādivippayuttaṃ sampayogato ca ārammaṇato ca,
atk-s0501a:858_5: yasmā vā tamhi sacchikate rāgādayo accantaṃ virattā honti vigatā viddhastā,
atk-s0501a:858_6: tasmā khayanti ca virāganti ca vuccati.
atk-s0501a:858_7: Yasmā panassa na uppādo paññāyati, na vayo,
atk-s0501a:858_8: na ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ tasmā taṃ na jāyati na jīyati na mīyatīti katvā amatanti vuccati.
atk-s0501a:858_16: Na tena dhammena samatthi kiñcīti tena khayādināmakena sakyamuninā adhigatena dhammena samaṃ kiñci dhammajātaṃ natthi.
atk-s0501a:859_0: Evaṃ bhagavā nibbānadhammassa aññehi dhammehi asamataṃ vatvā idāni tesaṃ sattānaṃ uppannaupaddavavūpasamatthaṃ
atk-s0501a:859_1: khayavirāgāmatapaṇītatāguṇehi nibbānadhammaratanassa asadisabhāvaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi
atk-s0501a:859_5: Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a:861_1: Evaṃ nibbānadhammaguṇena saccaṃ vatvā idāni maggadhammaguṇena vattumāraddho “yaṃ buddhaseṭṭho”ti.
atk-s0501a:861_4: buddho ca so seṭṭho cāti buddhaseṭṭho,
atk-s0501a:861_9: sammāsamādhiṃ desissāmi saupanisaṃ saparikkhāra”nti ca evamādinā nayena tattha tattha pasaṃsi pakāsayi.
atk-s0501a:861_11: Samādhimānantarikaññamāhūti yañca attano pavattisamanantaraṃ niyameneva phalapadānato “ānantarikasamādhī”ti āhu.
atk-s0501a:861_12: Na hi maggasamādhimhi uppanne tassa phaluppattinisedhako koci antarāyo atthi. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:863_0: Samādhinā tena samo na vijjatīti tena buddhaseṭṭhaparivaṇṇitena sucinā ānantarikasamādhinā samo rūpāvacarasamādhi
atk-s0501a:863_1: vā arūpāvacarasamādhi vā koci na vijjati. Kasmā?
atk-s0501a:863_2: Tesaṃ bhāvitattā tattha tattha brahmaloke upapannassāpi puna nirayādīsupi upapattisambhavato,
atk-s0501a:863_3: imassa ca arahattasamādhissa bhāvitattā ariyapuggalassa sabbūpapattisamugghātasambhavato.
atk-s0501a:864_0: Evaṃ bhagavā ānantarikasamādhissa aññehi samādhīhi asamataṃ vatvā idāni purimanayeneva maggadhammaratanassa
atk-s0501a:864_1: asadisabhāvaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi dhamme…pe… hotū”ti.
atk-s0501a:864_3: Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a:866_1: Evaṃ maggadhammaguṇenāpi saccaṃ vatvā idāni saṅghaguṇenāpi vattumāraddho “ye puggalā”ti.
atk-s0501a:866_5: Te hi cattāro ca paṭipannā cattāro ca phale ṭhitāti aṭṭha honti.
atk-s0501a:866_6: Sataṃ pasatthāti sappurisehi buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakehi aññehi ca devamanussehi pasatthā. Kasmā?
atk-s0501a:866_8: Tesañhi campakavakulakusumādīnaṃ sahajātavaṇṇagandhādayo viya sahajātā sīlasamādhiādayo guṇā,
atk-s0501a:866_9: tena te vaṇṇagandhādisampannāni viya pupphāni devamanussānaṃ sataṃ piyā manāpā pasaṃsanīyā ca honti.
atk-s0501a:867_3: Te hi ekabījī kolaṃkolo sattakkhattuparamoti tayo sotāpannā.
atk-s0501a:867_5: Te sabbepi catunnaṃ paṭipadānaṃ vasena catuvīsati.
atk-s0501a:867_13: Akaniṭṭhesu pana uddhaṃsotavajjā cattāroti catuvīsati anāgāmino.
atk-s0501a:867_16: Te sabbepi saddhādhurapaññādhurānaṃ vasena diguṇā hutvā aṭṭhasataṃ honti.
atk-s0501a:868_0: Cattāri etāni yugāni hontīti te sabbepi aṭṭha vā aṭṭhasataṃ vāti vitthāravasena uddiṭṭhapuggalā saṅkhepavasena
atk-s0501a:868_2: evaṃ yāva arahattamaggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti ekaṃ yuganti cattāri yugāni honti.
atk-s0501a:868_3: Te dakkhiṇeyyāti ettha teti pubbe aniyametvā uddiṭṭhānaṃ niyametvā niddeso.
atk-s0501a:868_8: Dakkhiṇā nāma kammañca kammavipākañca saddahitvā “esa me idaṃ vejjakammaṃ vā jaṅghapesanikaṃ vā karissatī”ti
atk-s0501a:869_0: Sugatassa sāvakāti bhagavā sobhanena gamanena yuttattā,
atk-s0501a:869_8: ime pana sutvā kattabbaṃ dhammānudhammappaṭipattiṃ katvā maggaphalāni pattā,
atk-s0501a:869_10: Etesu dinnāni mahapphalānīti etesu sugatasāvakesu appakānipi dānāni dinnāni paṭiggāhakato dakkhiṇāvisuddhibhāvaṃ upagatattā mahapphalāni honti.
atk-s0501a:871_0: Evaṃ bhagavā sabbesampi maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhānaṃ vasena saṅgharatanassa guṇaṃ vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi saṅghe”ti.
atk-s0501a:871_2: Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a:873_1: Evaṃ maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhānaṃ vasena saṅghaguṇena saccaṃ vatvā idāni tato ekaccānaṃ phalasamāpattisukhamanubhavantānaṃ
atk-s0501a:873_5: anekavihitaṃ anesanaṃ pahāya suddhājīvitaṃ nissāya vipassanāya attānaṃ payuñjitumāraddhāti attho.
atk-s0501a:873_11: Nikkāminoti kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhā hutvā paññādhurena vīriyena sabbakilesehi katanikkamanā.
atk-s0501a:874_1: Tena ito bahiddhā nānappakārampi amaratapaṃ karontānaṃ suppayogādiguṇābhāvato kilesehi nikkamanābhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0501a:874_18: te imāya sammāpaṭipadāya amataṃ vigayha mudhā laddhā phalasamāpattisaññitaṃ nibbutiṃ bhuñjamānā pattipattā nāma hontīti.
atk-s0501a:875_0: Evaṃ bhagavā phalasamāpattisukhamanubhavantānaṃ khīṇāsavapuggalānameva vasena saṅgharatanassa guṇaṃ vatvā
atk-s0501a:875_1: idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi saṅghe”ti.
atk-s0501a:875_3: Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a:877_1: Evaṃ khīṇāsavapuggalānaṃ guṇena saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vatvā idāni bahujanapaccakkhena sotāpannasseva guṇena vattumāraddho “yathindakhīlo”ti.
atk-s0501a:877_3: Indakhīloti nagaradvāravinivāraṇatthaṃ ummārabbhantare aṭṭha vā dasa vā hatthe pathaviṃ khaṇitvā ākoṭitassa sāradārumayathambhassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0501a:877_7: Catubbhi vātehīti catūhi disāhi āgatehi vātehi.
atk-s0501a:877_8: Asampakampiyoti kampetuṃ vā cāletuṃ vā asakkuṇeyyo.
atk-s0501a:877_12: Yo ariyasaccāni avecca passatīti yo cattāri ariyasaccāni paññāya ajjhogāhetvā passati.
atk-s0501a:878_1: yathā hi indakhīlo gambhīranematāya pathavissito catubbhi vātehi asampakampiyo siyā,
atk-s0501a:878_4: Yasmā sopi indakhīlo viya catūhi vātehi sabbatitthiyavādavātehi asampakampiyo hoti,
atk-s0501a:878_5: tamhā dassanā kenaci kampetuṃ vā cāletuṃ vā asakkuṇeyyo.
atk-s0501a:879_2: ayokhīlo vā indakhīlo vā gambhīranemo sunikhāto acalo asampakampī,
atk-s0501a:879_3: puratthimāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi,
atk-s0501a:879_4: neva naṃ saṅkampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampacāleyya.
atk-s0501a:879_15: ye ca kho keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ‘idaṃ dukkhanti…pe…
atk-s0501a:879_17: te na aññassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā mukhaṃ olokenti ‘ayaṃ nūna bhavaṃ jānaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0501a:880_0: Evaṃ bhagavā bahujanapaccakkhassa sotāpannasseva vasena saṅgharatanassa guṇaṃ vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ
atk-s0501a:880_3: Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a:882_1: Evaṃ avisesato sotāpannassa guṇena saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vatvā idāni ye te tayo sotāpannā ekabījī kolaṃkolo sattakkhattuparamoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:883_0: “Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti…pe…
atk-s0501a:883_1: so ekaṃyeva bhavaṃ nibbattitvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti,
atk-s0501a:883_3: Tathā dve vā tīṇi vā kulāni sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti,
atk-s0501a:883_5: Tathā sattakkhattuṃ devesu ca manussesu ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti,
atk-s0501a:884_0: Tesaṃ sabbakaniṭṭhassa sattakkhattuparamassa guṇena vattumāraddho “ye ariyasaccānī”ti.
atk-s0501a:884_2: Vibhāvayantīti paññāobhāsena saccappaṭicchādakaṃ kilesandhakāraṃ vidhamitvā attano pakāsāni pākaṭāni karonti.
atk-s0501a:884_3: Gambhīrapaññenāti appameyyapaññatāya sadevakassa lokassa ñāṇena alabbhaneyyappatiṭṭhapaññena,
atk-s0501a:884_5: Sudesitānīti samāsabyāsasākalyavekalyādīhi tehi tehi nayehi suṭṭhu desitāni.
atk-s0501a:884_6: Kiñcāpi te honti bhusaṃ pamattāti te vibhāvitaariyasaccā puggalā kiñcāpi devarajjacakkavattirajjādippamādaṭṭhānaṃ āgamma bhusaṃ pamattā honti,
atk-s0501a:884_7: tathāpi sotāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena ṭhapetvā satta bhave anamatagge saṃsāre ye uppajjeyyuṃ nāmañca rūpañca,
atk-s0501a:884_8: tesaṃ niruddhattā atthaṅgatattā na aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ ādiyanti,
atk-s0501a:884_9: sattamabhave eva pana vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0501a:885_0: Evaṃ bhagavā sattakkhattuparamavasena saṅgharatanassa guṇaṃ vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi saṅghe”ti.
atk-s0501a:885_2: Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a:887_1: Evaṃ sattakkhattuparamassa aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ anādiyanaguṇena saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vatvā idāni tasseva
atk-s0501a:887_2: satta bhave ādiyatopi aññehi appahīnabhavādānehi puggalehi visiṭṭhena guṇena vattumāraddho “sahāvassā”ti.
atk-s0501a:887_4: Assāti “na te bhavaṃ aṭṭhamamādiyantī”ti vuttesu aññatarassa.
atk-s0501a:887_6: Sotāpattimaggo hi nibbānaṃ disvā kattabbakiccasampadāya sabbapaṭhamaṃ nibbānadassanato “dassana”nti vuccati,
atk-s0501a:887_9: Tayassu dhammā jahitā bhavantīti ettha assu-
atk-s0501a:887_13: Yato sahāvassa dassanasampadāya tayo dhammā jahitā bhavanti pahīnā hontīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0501a:888_2: Tattha sati kāye vijjamāne upādānakkhandhapañcakākhye kāye vīsativatthukā diṭṭhi sakkāyadiṭṭhi,
atk-s0501a:888_3: satī vā tattha kāye diṭṭhītipi sakkāyadiṭṭhi,
atk-s0501a:888_6: yathāvuttappakāre kāye vijjamāne rūpādisaṅkhāto attāti evaṃ pavattā diṭṭhīti attho.
atk-s0501a:888_7: Tassā ca pahīnattā sabbadiṭṭhigatāni pahīnāneva honti.
atk-s0501a:888_11: tato vā paññācikicchitā idaṃ vigatanti vicikicchitaṃ.
atk-s0501a:888_12: “Satthari kaṅkhatī”tiādinā nayena vuttāya aṭṭhavatthukāya vimatiyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0501a:888_13: Tassā pahīnattā sabbānipi vicikicchitāni pahīnāni honti.
atk-s0501a:888_15: “Ito bahiddhā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sīlena suddhi vatena suddhī”ti evamādīsu āgataṃ gosīlakukkurasīlādikaṃ
atk-s0501a:888_17: tassa pahīnattā sabbampi naggiyamuṇḍikādiamaratapaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:890_1: Evamassa kilesavaṭṭappahānaṃ dassetvā idāni tasmiṃ kilesavaṭṭe sati yena vipākavaṭṭena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0501a:890_2: tappahānā tassāpi pahānaṃ dīpento āha “catūhapāyehi ca vippamutto”ti.
atk-s0501a:890_4: Tehi esa satta bhave ādiyantopi vippamuttoti attho.
atk-s0501a:891_0: Evamassa vipākavaṭṭappahānaṃ dassetvā idāni yamassa vipākavaṭṭassa mūlabhūtaṃ kammavaṭṭaṃ,
atk-s0501a:891_1: tassāpi pahānaṃ dassento āha “chaccābhiṭhānāni abhabba kātu”nti.
atk-s0501a:891_7: yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo mātaraṃ jīvitā voropeyyā”tiādinā nayena ekakanipāte vuttāni mātughātapitughātaarahantaghātalohituppādasaṅghabhedaaññasatthāruddesakammānīti
atk-s0501a:891_9: Tāni hi kiñcāpi diṭṭhisampanno ariyasāvako kunthakipillikampi jīvitā na voropeti,
atk-s0501a:891_10: apica kho pana puthujjanabhāvassa vigarahaṇatthaṃ vuttāni.
atk-s0501a:891_11: Puthujjano hi adiṭṭhisampannattā evaṃmahāsāvajjāni abhiṭhānānipi karoti,
atk-s0501a:891_14: Bhavantarepi hi esa attano ariyasāvakabhāvaṃ ajānantopi dhammatāya eva etāni vā cha pakatipāṇātipātādīni
atk-s0501a:891_15: vā pañca verāni aññasatthāruddesena saha cha ṭhānāni na karoti,
atk-s0501a:892_0: Evaṃ bhagavā satta bhave ādiyatopi ariyasāvakassa aññehi appahīnabhavādānehi puggalehi visiṭṭhaguṇavasena
atk-s0501a:892_1: saṅgharatanassa guṇaṃ vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi saṅghe”ti.
atk-s0501a:892_3: Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a:894_1: Evaṃ satta bhave ādiyatopi aññehi appahīnabhavādānehi puggalehi visiṭṭhaguṇena saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ
atk-s0501a:894_2: vatvā idāni na kevalaṃ dassanasampanno cha abhiṭhānāni abhabbo kātuṃ,
atk-s0501a:894_3: kintu appamattakampi pāpakammaṃ katvā tassa paṭicchādanāyapi abhabboti pamādavihārinopi dassanasampannassa
atk-s0501a:894_4: katappaṭicchādanābhāvaguṇena vattumāraddho “kiñcāpi so kamma karoti pāpaka”nti.
atk-s0501a:895_1: so dassanasampanno kiñcāpi satisammosena pamādavihāraṃ āgamma yaṃ taṃ bhagavatā lokavajjaṃ sañciccātikkamanaṃ
atk-s0501a:895_2: sandhāya vuttaṃ “yaṃ mayā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
atk-s0501a:895_3: taṃ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamantī”ti taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ kuṭikārasahaseyyādiṃ paṇṇattivajjavītikkamasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0501a:895_6: uda cetasā vā katthaci lobhadosuppādanaṃ jātarūpādisādiyanaṃ cīvarādiparibhogesu apaccavekkhaṇādiṃ vā pāpakammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0501a:895_7: Abhabbo so tassa paṭicchadāya na so taṃ “idaṃ akappiyamakaraṇīya”nti jānitvā muhuttampi paṭicchādeti,
atk-s0501a:895_8: taṃkhaṇaṃ eva pana satthari vā viññūsu vā sabrahmacārīsu āvi katvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaroti,
atk-s0501a:895_9: “na puna karissāmī”ti evaṃ saṃvaritabbaṃ vā saṃvarati. Kasmā?
atk-s0501a:895_11: evarūpampi pāpakammaṃ katvā tassa paṭicchādāya diṭṭhanibbānapadassa dassanasampannassa puggalassa abhabbatā vuttāti attho.
atk-s0501a:897_2: daharo kumāro mando uttānaseyyako hatthena vā pādena vā aṅgāraṃ akkamitvā khippameva paṭisaṃharati,
atk-s0501a:897_8: Atha kho naṃ khippameva satthari vā viññūsu vā sabrahmacārīsu deseti vivarati uttānīkaroti,
atk-s0501a:897_9: desetvā vivaritvā uttānīkatvā āyatiṃ saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti.
atk-s0501a:898_0: Evaṃ bhagavā pamādavihārinopi dassanasampannassa katappaṭicchādanābhāvaguṇena saṅgharatanassa guṇaṃ vatvā
atk-s0501a:898_1: idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi saṅghe”ti.
atk-s0501a:898_3: Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a:900_1: Evaṃ saṅghapariyāpannānaṃ puggalānaṃ tena tena guṇappakārena saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vatvā idāni yvāyaṃ
atk-s0501a:900_2: bhagavatā ratanattayaguṇaṃ dīpentena idha saṅkhepena aññatra ca vitthārena pariyattidhammo desito,
atk-s0501a:900_3: tampi nissāya puna buddhādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vattumāraddho “vanappagumbe yathā phussitagge”ti.
atk-s0501a:900_15: Gimhānamāse paṭhamasmiṃ gimheti ye cattāro gimhānaṃ māsā,
atk-s0501a:901_1: yathā paṭhamagimhanāmake bālavasante nānāvidharukkhagahane vane supupphitaggasākho taruṇarukkhagacchapariyāyanāmo pagumbo ativiya sassiriko hoti,
atk-s0501a:901_2: evameva khandhāyatanādīhi satipaṭṭhānasammappadhānādīhi sīlasamādhikkhandhādīhi vā nānappakārehi atthappabhedapupphehi
atk-s0501a:901_3: ativiya sassirikattā tathūpamaṃ nibbānagāmimaggadīpanato nibbānagāmiṃ pariyattidhammavaraṃ neva lābhahetu
atk-s0501a:901_5: kevalantu mahākaruṇāya abbhussāhitahadayo sattānaṃ paramahitāya adesayīti.
atk-s0501a:901_6: Paramaṃ hitāyāti ettha ca gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ anunāsiko.
atk-s0501a:902_0: Evaṃ bhagavā imaṃ supupphitaggavanappagumbasadisaṃ pariyattidhammaṃ vatvā idāni tameva nissāya buddhādhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0501a:902_3: Kevalaṃ pana idampi yathāvuttapakārapariyattidhammasaṅkhātaṃ buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītanti evaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:902_4: Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a:904_1: Evaṃ bhagavā pariyattidhammena buddhādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vatvā idāni lokuttaradhammena vattumāraddho “varo varaññū”ti.
atk-s0501a:904_2: Tattha varoti paṇītādhimuttikehi icchito “aho vata mayampi evarūpā assāmā”ti,
atk-s0501a:904_3: varaguṇayogato vā varo uttamo seṭṭhoti attho.
atk-s0501a:904_8: Varāharoti varassa maggassa āhaṭattā varāharoti vuccati.
atk-s0501a:904_9: So hi bhagavā dīpaṅkarato pabhuti samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūrento pubbakehi sammāsambuddhehi anuyātaṃ purāṇamaggavaramāhari,
atk-s0501a:905_4: Etehi lokuttaraguṇehi adhikassa kassaci guṇassa abhāvato anuttaro.
atk-s0501a:906_11: attanā vā anācariyako hutvā paresaṃ ācariyabhāvena,
atk-s0501a:906_12: dhammavaraṃ adesayi sāvakabhāvatthikānaṃ tadatthāya svākkhātatādiguṇayuttassa dhammavarassa desanato.
atk-s0501a:907_0: Evaṃ bhagavā navavidhena lokuttaradhammena attano guṇaṃ vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya buddhādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi buddhe”ti.
atk-s0501a:907_2: Kevalaṃ pana yaṃ varaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ esa aññāsi,
atk-s0501a:907_6: idampi buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītanti evaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:907_7: Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a:909_1: Evaṃ bhagavā pariyattidhammañca navalokuttaradhammañca nissāya dvīhi gāthāhi buddhādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vatvā idāni ye taṃ pariyattidhammaṃ assosuṃ,
atk-s0501a:909_2: sutānusārena ca paṭipajjitvā navappakārampi lokuttaradhammaṃ adhigamiṃsu,
atk-s0501a:909_3: tesaṃ anupādisesanibbānapattiguṇaṃ nissāya puna saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vattumāraddho “khīṇaṃ purāṇa”nti.
atk-s0501a:909_10: Teti yesaṃ khīṇaṃ purāṇaṃ navaṃ natthi sambhavaṃ,
atk-s0501a:910_1: Yaṃ taṃ sattānaṃ uppajjitvā niruddhampi purāṇaṃ atītakālikaṃ kammaṃ taṇhāsinehassa appahīnattā paṭisandhiāharaṇasamatthatāya akhīṇaṃyeva hoti,
atk-s0501a:910_2: taṃ purāṇaṃ kammaṃ yesaṃ arahattamaggena taṇhāsinehassa sositattā agginā daḍḍhabījamiva āyatiṃ vipākadānāsamatthatāya khīṇaṃ.
atk-s0501a:910_3: Yañca nesaṃ buddhapūjādivasena idāni pavattamānaṃ kammaṃ navanti vuccati,
atk-s0501a:910_4: tañca taṇhāpahāneneva chinnamūlapādapapupphamiva āyatiṃ phaladānāsamatthatāya yesaṃ natthi sambhavaṃ,
atk-s0501a:910_5: ye ca taṇhāpahāneneva āyatike bhavasmiṃ virattacittā,
atk-s0501a:910_6: te khīṇāsavā bhikkhū “kammaṃ khettaṃ viññāṇaṃ bīja”nti ettha vuttassa paṭisandhiviññāṇassa kammakkhayeneva khīṇattā khīṇabījā.
atk-s0501a:910_7: Yopi pubbe punabbhavasaṅkhātāya virūḷhiyā chando ahosi.
atk-s0501a:910_8: Tassapi samudayappahāneneva pahīnattā pubbe viya cutikāle asambhavena avirūḷhichandā dhitisampannattā
atk-s0501a:910_11: puna “rūpino vā arūpino vā”ti evamādiṃ paññattipathaṃ accentīti.
atk-s0501a:910_12: Tasmiṃ kira samaye nagaradevatānaṃ pūjanatthāya jālitesu padīpesu eko padīpo vijjhāyi,
atk-s0501a:911_0: Evaṃ bhagavā ye taṃ purimāhi dvīhi gāthāhi vuttaṃ pariyattidhammaṃ assosuṃ,
atk-s0501a:911_1: sutānusārena ca paṭipajjitvā navappakārampi lokuttaradhammaṃ adhigamiṃsu,
atk-s0501a:911_2: tesaṃ anupādisesanibbānapattiguṇaṃ vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccavacanaṃ payuñjanto desanaṃ samāpesi “idampi saṅghe”ti.
atk-s0501a:911_4: Kevalaṃ pana idampi yathāvuttena pakārena khīṇāsavabhikkhūnaṃ nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ saṅghe ratanaṃ paṇītanti evaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:911_5: Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a:914_1: Atha sakko devānamindo “bhagavatā ratanattayaguṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjamānena nāgarassa sotthi katā,
atk-s0501a:914_2: mayāpi nāgarassa sotthitthaṃ ratanattayaguṇaṃ nissāya kiñci vattabba”nti cintetvā avasāne gāthāttayaṃ
atk-s0501a:914_3: abhāsi “yānīdha bhūtānī”ti tattha yasmā buddho yathā lokahitatthāya ussukkaṃ āpannehi āgantabbaṃ,
atk-s0501a:914_4: tathā āgatato yathā ca tehi gantabbaṃ,
atk-s0501a:914_5: tathā gatato yathā ca tehi ājānitabbaṃ,
atk-s0501a:914_11: Yasmā ca so devamanussehi pupphagandhādinā bahi nibbattena upakārakena,
atk-s0501a:914_12: dhammānudhammapaṭipattādinā ca attani nibbattena ativiya pūjito,
atk-s0501a:914_13: tasmā sakko devānamindo sabbaṃ devaparisaṃ attanā saddhiṃ sampiṇḍetvā āha “tathāgataṃ devamanussapūjitaṃ,
atk-s0501a:915_1: Yasmā pana dhamme maggadhammo yathā yuganaddhasamathavipassanābalena gantabbaṃ kilesapakkhaṃ samucchindantena,
atk-s0501a:915_3: Nibbānadhammopi yathā gato paññāya paṭividdho sabbadukkhappaṭivighātāya sampajjati,
atk-s0501a:915_6: Yasmā ca saṅghopi yathā attahitāya paṭipannehi gantabbaṃ tena tena maggena,
atk-s0501a:915_8: Tasmā avasesagāthādvayepi tathāgataṃ dhammaṃ namassāma suvatthi hotu,
atk-s0501a:915_9: tathāgataṃ saṅghaṃ namassāma suvatthi hotūti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0501a:916_0: Evaṃ sakko devānamindo imaṃ gāthāttayaṃ bhāsitvā bhagavantaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā devapurameva gato saddhiṃ devaparisāya.
atk-s0501a:916_1: Bhagavā pana tadeva ratanasuttaṃ dutiyadivasepi desesi,
atk-s0501a:916_5: Bhagavā aḍḍhamāsameva vesāliyaṃ viharitvā rājūnaṃ “gacchāmā”ti paṭivedesi.
atk-s0501a:916_6: Tato rājāno diguṇena sakkārena puna tīhi divasehi bhagavantaṃ gaṅgātīraṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0501a:916_7: Gaṅgāya nibbattā nāgarājāno cintesuṃ “manussā tathāgatassa sakkāraṃ karonti,
atk-s0501a:916_8: mayaṃ kiṃ na karissāmā”ti suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimayā nāvāyo māpetvā suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimaye eva pallaṅke paññapetvā
atk-s0501a:916_9: pañcavaṇṇapadumasañchannaṃ udakaṃ karitvā “amhākaṃ anuggahaṃ karothā”ti bhagavantaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0501a:916_11: pañca ca bhikkhusatāni pañcasataṃ nāvāyo abhirūḷhā.
atk-s0501a:916_12: Nāgarājāno bhagavantaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena nāgabhavanaṃ pavesesuṃ.
atk-s0501a:916_13: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā sabbarattiṃ nāgaparisāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0501a:917_0: Bhūmaṭṭhā devā “manussā ca nāgā ca tathāgatassa sakkāraṃ karonti,
atk-s0501a:917_1: mayaṃ kiṃ na karissāmā”ti cintetvā vanappagumbarukkhapabbatādīsu chattātichattāni ukkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0501a:917_5: Pubbe vuttanayeneva pañcahi divasehi bhagavantaṃ rājagahaṃ ānesi.
atk-s0501a:918_0: Rājagahamanuppatte bhagavati pacchābhattaṃ maṇḍalamāḷe sannipatitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ayamantarakathā udapādi “aho buddhassa bhagavato ānubhāvo,
atk-s0501a:918_1: yaṃ uddissa gaṅgāya orato ca pārato ca aṭṭhayojano bhūmibhāgo ninnañca thalañca samaṃ katvā vālukāya okiritvā pupphehi sañchanno,
atk-s0501a:918_2: yojanappamāṇaṃ gaṅgāya udakaṃ nānāvaṇṇehi padumehi sañchannaṃ,
atk-s0501a:918_5: Bhagavā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā taṅkhaṇānurūpena pāṭihāriyena gantvā maṇḍalamāḷe paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0501a:919_4: Tassa putto susīmo nāma māṇavo soḷasavassuddesiko vayena.
atk-s0501a:919_5: So ekadivasaṃ pitaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0501a:919_9: bārāṇasiṃ gantvā sippaṃ uggahetu”nti. “Tena hi, tāta, susīma,
atk-s0501a:919_11: tassa santikaṃ gantvā uggaṇhāhī”ti kahāpaṇasahassaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0501a:919_12: So taṃ gahetvā mātāpitaro abhivādetvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ gantvā upacārayuttena vidhinā ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā abhivādetvā attānaṃ nivedesi.
atk-s0501a:919_13: Ācariyo “mama sahāyakassa putto”ti māṇavaṃ sampaṭicchitvā sabbaṃ pāhuneyyavattamakāsi.
atk-s0501a:919_14: So addhānakilamathaṃ vinodetvā taṃ kahāpaṇasahassaṃ ācariyassa pādamūle ṭhapetvā sippaṃ uggahetuṃ okāsaṃ yāci.
atk-s0501a:920_6: Atha ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha “imassa sippassa ādimajjhameva passāmi,
atk-s0501a:920_17: So isipatanaṃ gantvā paccekabuddhe upasaṅkamitvā pucchi “api, bhante,
atk-s0501a:920_22: na sakkā apabbajitena sikkhāpetunti. Sādhu, bhante,
atk-s0501a:920_26: Te taṃ pabbājetvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojetuṃ asamatthā “evaṃ te nivāsetabbaṃ,
atk-s0501a:920_28: So tattha sikkhanto upanissayasampannattā na cireneva paccekabodhiṃ abhisambujjhi.
atk-s0501a:920_30: So appāyukasaṃvattanikassa kammassa katattā na cireneva parinibbāyi.
atk-s0501a:920_31: Tassa paccekabuddhā ca mahājanakāyo ca sarīrakiccaṃ katvā dhātuyo gahetvā nagaradvāre thūpaṃ patiṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0501a:921_0: Atha kho saṅkho brāhmaṇo “putto me ciragato,
atk-s0501a:921_1: na cassa pavattiṃ jānāmī”ti puttaṃ daṭṭhukāmo takkasilāya nikkhamitvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ gantvā mahājanakāyaṃ
atk-s0501a:921_2: sannipatitaṃ disvā “addhā bahūsu ekopi me puttassa pavattiṃ jānissatī”ti cintento upasaṅkamitvā pucchi
atk-s0501a:921_4: api nu tassa pavattiṃ jānāthā”ti? Te “āma, brāhmaṇa, jānāma,
atk-s0501a:921_5: imasmiṃ nagare brāhmaṇassa santike tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū hutvā paccekabuddhānaṃ santike pabbajitvā paccekabuddho
atk-s0501a:921_8: So bhūmiṃ hatthena paharitvā roditvā ca paridevitvā ca taṃ cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā tiṇāni uddharitvā uttarasāṭakena
atk-s0501a:921_9: vālukaṃ ānetvā paccekabuddhacetiyaṅgaṇe okiritvā kamaṇḍaluto udakena samantato bhūmiṃ paripphositvā vanapupphehi
atk-s0501a:921_10: pūjaṃ katvā uttarasāṭakena paṭākaṃ āropetvā thūpassa upari attano chattaṃ bandhitvā pakkāmīti.
atk-s0501a:922_0: Evaṃ atītaṃ desetvā jātakaṃ paccuppannena anusandhento bhikkhūnaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0501a:922_3: evamassa ‘añño nūna tena samayena saṅkho brāhmaṇo ahosī’ti,
atk-s0501a:922_5: ahaṃ tena samayena saṅkho brāhmaṇo ahosiṃ,
atk-s0501a:922_6: mayā susīmassa paccekabuddhassa cetiyaṅgaṇe tiṇāni uddhaṭāni,
atk-s0501a:922_7: tassa me kammassa nissandena aṭṭhayojanamaggaṃ vigatakhāṇukaṇṭakaṃ katvā samaṃ suddhamakaṃsu.
atk-s0501a:922_9: tassa me nissandena aṭṭhayojanamagge vālukaṃ okiriṃsu.
atk-s0501a:922_11: tassa me nissandena navayojane magge thale ca udake ca nānāpupphehi pupphasantharamakaṃsu.
atk-s0501a:922_13: tassa me nissandena vesāliyaṃ pokkharavassaṃ vassi.
atk-s0501a:922_16: tassa me nissandena yāva akaniṭṭhabhavanā paṭākā ca āropitā,
atk-s0501a:922_19: ayaṃ mayhaṃ pūjāviseso neva buddhānubhāvena nibbatto,
atk-s0501a:924_0: Caje mattāsukhaṃ dhīro, sampassaṃ vipulaṃ sukha”nti. ;
atk-s0501a:929_0: Idāni “tirokuṭṭesu tiṭṭhantī”tiādinā ratanasuttānantaraṃ nikkhittassa tirokuṭṭasuttassa atthavaṇṇanākkamo anuppatto,
atk-s0501a:929_1: tassa idha nikkhepappayojanaṃ vatvā atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma.
atk-s0501a:930_0: Tattha idañhi tirokuṭṭaṃ iminā anukkamena bhagavatā avuttampi yāyaṃ ito pubbe nānappakārena kusalakammapaṭipatti dassitā,
atk-s0501a:930_1: tattha pamādaṃ āpajjamāno nirayatiracchānayonīhi visiṭṭhatarepi ṭhāne uppajjamāno yasmā evarūpesu petesu uppajjati,
atk-s0501a:930_2: tasmā na ettha pamādo karaṇīyoti dassanatthaṃ,
atk-s0501a:930_3: yehi ca bhūtehi upaddutāya vesāliyā upaddavavūpasamanatthaṃ ratanasuttaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0501a:930_4: tesu ekaccāni evarūpānīti dassanatthaṃ vā vuttanti.
atk-s0501a:936_0: Sukatā hoti tasmāhaṃ, karissāmi tatheva taṃ”.
atk-s0501a:937_3: taṃ kho pana rājagahe dutiyadivase rañño māgadhassa anumodanatthaṃ.
atk-s0501a:937_4: Imassa catthassa vibhāvanatthaṃ ayamettha vitthārakathā kathetabbā –
atk-s0501a:938_0: Ito dvānavutikappe kāsi nāma nagaraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0501a:938_3: tassā kucchiyaṃ phusso nāma bodhisatto nibbattitvā anupubbena sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhi.
atk-s0501a:938_4: Jayaseno rājā “mama putto abhinikkhamitvā buddho jāto,
atk-s0501a:938_7: mayhaṃ saṅgho”ti mamattaṃ uppādetvā sabbakālaṃ sayameva upaṭṭhahati,
atk-s0501a:939_0: Bhagavato kaniṭṭhabhātaro vemātikā tayo bhātaro cintesuṃ –
atk-s0501a:939_3: amhākañca pitā aññesaṃ okāsaṃ na deti,
atk-s0501a:939_4: kathaṃ nu mayaṃ labheyyāma bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhātu”nti.
atk-s0501a:939_8: Tato rājā “paccanto kupito”ti sutvā tayopi putte paccantavūpasamanatthaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0501a:939_17: rājā na adāsi. Evaṃ cha, pañca, cattāri, tīṇi, dve, ekaṃ,
atk-s0501a:940_0: Te varaṃ labhitvā paramatuṭṭhā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā āhaṃsu –
atk-s0501a:940_6: Tato te attano janapade niyuttakapurisassa lekhaṃ pesesuṃ “imaṃ temāsaṃ amhehi bhagavā upaṭṭhātabbo,
atk-s0501a:940_7: vihāraṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ bhagavato upaṭṭhānasambhāraṃ karohī”ti.
atk-s0501a:940_9: Te kāsāyavatthanivatthā hutvā aḍḍhateyyehi purisasahassehi veyyāvaccakarehi bhagavantaṃ sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahamānā
atk-s0501a:941_0: Tesaṃ bhaṇḍāgāriko eko gahapatiputto sapajāpatiko saddho ahosi pasanno.
atk-s0501a:941_1: So buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa dānavattaṃ sakkaccaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0501a:941_2: Janapade niyuttakapuriso taṃ gahetvā jānapadehi ekādasamattehi purisasahassehi saddhiṃ sakkaccameva dānaṃ pavattāpesi.
atk-s0501a:941_4: Te dānassa antarāyaṃ katvā deyyadhamme attanā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0501a:941_6: Pavārite rājaputtā bhagavato mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā bhagavantaṃ purakkhatvā pituno sakāsameva agamaṃsu.
atk-s0501a:941_8: Rājā ca rājaputtā ca janapade niyuttakapuriso ca bhaṇḍāgāriko ca anupubbena kālaṃ katvā saddhiṃ parisāya sagge uppajjiṃsu,
atk-s0501a:941_10: Evaṃ tesaṃ dvinnaṃ gaṇānaṃ saggato saggaṃ,
atk-s0501a:942_0: Atha imasmiṃ bhaddakappe kassapabuddhassa kāle te paṭihatacittajanā petesu uppannā.
atk-s0501a:942_1: Tadā manussā attano ñātakānaṃ petānaṃ atthāya dānaṃ datvā uddisanti “idaṃ amhākaṃ ñātīnaṃ hotū”ti.
atk-s0501a:942_3: Atha imepi petā taṃ disvā bhagavantaṃ kassapaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchiṃsu –
atk-s0501a:942_8: apica anāgate gotamo nāma buddho bhavissati,
atk-s0501a:942_9: tassa bhagavato kāle bimbisāro nāma rājā bhavissati,
atk-s0501a:942_10: so tumhākaṃ ito dvānavutikappe ñāti ahosi,
atk-s0501a:942_11: so buddhassa dānaṃ datvā tumhākaṃ uddisissati,
atk-s0501a:942_13: Evaṃ vutte kira tesaṃ petānaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ “sve labhissathā”ti vuttaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0501a:943_0: Atha ekasmiṃ buddhantare vītivatte amhākaṃ bhagavā loke uppajji.
atk-s0501a:943_1: Tepi tayo rājaputtā tehi aḍḍhateyyehi purisasahassehi saddhiṃ devalokā cavitvā magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0501a:943_2: uppajjitvā anupubbena isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā gayāsīse tayo jaṭilā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0501a:943_7: tassa pajāpati dhammadinnā nāma seṭṭhidhītā ahosi.
atk-s0501a:943_8: Evaṃ sabbāpi avasesā parisā rañño eva parivārā hutvā nibbattā.
atk-s0501a:944_0: Amhākaṃ bhagavā loke uppajjitvā sattasattāhaṃ atikkamitvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ āgamma dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā
atk-s0501a:944_1: pañcavaggiye ādiṃ katvā yāva aḍḍhateyyasahassaparivāre tayo jaṭile vinetvā rājagahaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0501a:944_2: Tattha ca tadahupasaṅkamantaṃyeva rājānaṃ bimbisāraṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpesi ekādasanavutehi māgadhakehi brāhmaṇagahapatikehi saddhiṃ.
atk-s0501a:944_3: Atha raññā svātanāya bhattena nimantito bhagavā adhivāsetvā dutiyadivase sakkena devānamindena purato purato gacchantena –
atk-s0501a:947_0: Evamādīhi gāthāhi abhitthaviyamāno rājagahaṃ pavisitvā rañño nivesane mahādānaṃ sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0501a:947_1: Te petā “idāni rājā amhākaṃ dānaṃ uddisissati,
atk-s0501a:948_0: Rājā dānaṃ datvā “kattha nu kho bhagavā vihareyyā”ti bhagavato vihāraṭṭhānameva cintesi,
atk-s0501a:948_2: Petā chinnāsā hutvā rattiṃ rañño nivesane ativiya bhiṃsanakaṃ vissaramakaṃsu.
atk-s0501a:948_11: apica kho te purāṇañātakā petesu uppannā santi,
atk-s0501a:948_12: te ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ tameva paccāsīsamānā vicaranti ‘buddhassa dānaṃ datvā amhākaṃ uddisissatī’ti,
atk-s0501a:949_7: Rājā nivesanaṃ gantvā mahādānaṃ paṭiyādetvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesi.
atk-s0501a:949_8: Bhagavā rājantepuraṃ gantvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena.
atk-s0501a:949_9: Tepi kho petā “api nāma ajja labheyyāmā”ti gantvā tirokuṭṭādīsu aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0501a:949_11: yathā te sabbeva rañño pākaṭā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0501a:949_12: Rājā dakkhiṇodakaṃ dento “idaṃ me ñātīnaṃ hotū”ti uddisi,
atk-s0501a:949_13: taṅkhaṇaññeva tesaṃ petānaṃ padumasañchannā pokkharaṇiyo nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0501a:949_14: Te tattha nhatvā ca pivitvā ca paṭippassaddhadarathakilamathapipāsā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0501a:949_20: Sāpi tesaṃ sampatti yathā sabbāva pākaṭā hoti,
atk-s0501a:949_23: Tato bhagavā bhuttāvī pavārito rañño māgadhassa anumodanatthaṃ “tirokuṭṭesu tiṭṭhantī”ti imā gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0501a:950_2: pakāsetvāna taṃ sabba”nti ayaṃ mātikā saṅkhepato vitthārato ca vibhattā hoti.
atk-s0501a:952_1: Idāni imassa tirokuṭṭassa yathākkamaṃ atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma.
atk-s0501a:952_3: paṭhamagāthāya tāva tirokuṭṭāti kuṭṭānaṃ parabhāgā vuccanti.
atk-s0501a:952_5: Tena yathā pākāraparabhāgaṃ pabbataparabhāgañca gacchantaṃ “tiropākāraṃ tiropabbataṃ asajjamāno gacchatī”ti vadanti,
atk-s0501a:952_6: evamidhāpi kuṭṭassa parabhāgesu tiṭṭhante “tirokuṭṭesu tiṭṭhantī”ti āha.
atk-s0501a:952_7: Sandhisiṅghāṭakesu cāti ettha sandhiyoti catukkoṇaracchā vuccanti gharasandhibhittisandhiālokasandhiyo cāpi.
atk-s0501a:952_9: tadekajjhaṃ katvā purimena saddhiṃ saṅghaṭento “sandhisiṅghāṭakesu cā”ti āha.
atk-s0501a:952_10: Dvārabāhāsu tiṭṭhantīti nagaradvāragharadvārānaṃ bāhā nissāya tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0501a:952_11: Āgantvāna sakaṃ gharanti ettha sakaṃ gharaṃ nāma pubbañātigharampi attanā sāmikabhāvena ajjhāvutthapubbagharampi.
atk-s0501a:954_1: Evaṃ bhagavā pubbe anajjhāvutthapubbampi pubbañātigharaṃ bimbisāranivesanaṃ sakagharasaññāya āgantvā
atk-s0501a:954_5: appekacce jighacchāpipāsāraṇinimmathanena udarato uṭṭhāya mukhato viniccharantāya aggijālāya pariḍayhamānasarīre,
atk-s0501a:954_6: appekacce sūcichiddāṇumattakaṇṭhabilatāya pabbatākārakucchitāya ca laddhampi pānabhojanaṃ yāvadatthaṃ
atk-s0501a:954_8: appekacce aññamaññassa aññesaṃ vā sattānaṃ pabhinnagaṇḍapiḷakamukhā paggharitarudhirapubbalasikādiṃ laddhā
atk-s0501a:954_9: amatamiva sāyamāne ativiya duddasikavirūpabhayānakasarīre bahū pete rañño nidassento –
atk-s0501a:957_0: Vatvā puna tehi katassa kammassa dāruṇabhāvaṃ dassento “pahūte annapānamhī”ti dutiyagāthamāha.
atk-s0501a:958_3: kāro labbhati “pahu santo na bharatī”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0501a:958_4: Keci pana “bahūte” iti ca “bahūke” iti ca paṭhanti.
atk-s0501a:958_12: sattānanti tesaṃ pettivisaye uppannānaṃ sattānaṃ koci mātā vā pitā vā putto vā na sarati.
atk-s0501a:958_16: Tañhi tesaṃ kammaṃ ñātīnaṃ sarituṃ na deti.
atk-s0501a:960_1: Evaṃ bhagavā anappakepi annapānādimhi paccupaṭṭhite “api nāma amhe uddissa kiñci dadeyyu”nti ñātī paccāsīsantānaṃ
atk-s0501a:960_2: vicarataṃ tesaṃ petānaṃ tehi katassa atikaṭukavipākakarassa kammassa paccayena kassaci ñātino anussaraṇamattābhāvaṃ
atk-s0501a:962_0: Na tesaṃ koci sarati, sattānaṃ kammapaccayā”ti. –
atk-s0501a:963_0: Vatvā puna rañño pettivisayūpapanne ñātake uddissa dinnaṃ dānaṃ pasaṃsanto “evaṃ dadanti ñātīna”nti tatiyagāthamāha.
atk-s0501a:964_2: tesaṃ sattānaṃ kammapaccayā asarantepi kismiñci dadanti, ñātīnaṃ,
atk-s0501a:964_3: ye evaṃ anukampakā hontīti ca yathā tayā, mahārāja, dinnaṃ,
atk-s0501a:964_4: evaṃ suciṃ paṇītaṃ kālena kappiyaṃ pānabhojanaṃ dadanti ñātīnaṃ,
atk-s0501a:964_7: Ñātīnanti mātito ca pitito ca sambandhānaṃ.
atk-s0501a:964_8: Yeti ye keci puttā vā dhītaro vā bhātaro vā hontīti bhavanti.
atk-s0501a:964_10: Sucinti vimalaṃ dassaneyyaṃ manoramaṃ dhammikaṃ dhammaladdhaṃ.
atk-s0501a:966_0: 4. Evaṃ bhagavā raññā māgadhena petabhūtānaṃ ñātīnaṃ anukampāya dinnaṃ pānabhojanaṃ pasaṃsanto –
atk-s0501a:969_0: Vatvā puna yena pakārena dinnaṃ tesaṃ hoti,
atk-s0501a:969_1: taṃ dassento “idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ hotū”ti catutthagāthāya pubbaddhamāha taṃ tatiyagāthāya pubbaddhena sambandhitabbaṃ –
atk-s0501a:971_0: Idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ hotu, sukhitā hontu ñātayo”ti.
atk-s0501a:972_0: Tena “idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ hotūti evaṃ dadanti,
atk-s0501a:972_1: no aññathā”ti ettha ākāratthena evaṃsaddena dātabbākāranidassanaṃ kataṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:973_1: Voti “kacci pana vo anuruddhā samaggā sammodamānā”ti ca,
atk-s0501a:973_2: “yehi vo ariyā”ti ca evamādīsu viya kevalaṃ nipātamattaṃ,
atk-s0501a:973_4: Ñātīnaṃ hotūti pettivisaye uppannānaṃ ñātakānaṃ hotu.
atk-s0501a:973_5: Sukhitā hontu ñātayoti te pettivisayūpapannā ñātayo idaṃ paccanubhavantā sukhitā hontūti.
atk-s0501a:975_1: Evaṃ bhagavā yena pakārena pettivisayūpapannānaṃ ñātīnaṃ dātabbaṃ,
atk-s0501a:975_3: sukhitā hontu ñātayo”ti vatvā puna yasmā “idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ hotū”ti vuttepi na aññena kataṃ kammaṃ aññassa phaladaṃ hoti,
atk-s0501a:975_4: kevalantu tathā uddissa diyyamānaṃ taṃ vatthu ñātīnaṃ kusalakammassa paccayo hoti.
atk-s0501a:975_5: Tasmā yathā tesaṃ tasmiṃyeva vatthusmiṃ taṅkhaṇe phalanibbattakaṃ kusalakammaṃ hoti,
atk-s0501a:975_6: taṃ dassento “te ca tatthā”ti catutthagāthāya pacchimaddhaṃ “pahūte annapānamhī”ti pañcamagāthāya pubbaddhañca āha.
atk-s0501a:976_1: te ñātipetā yattha taṃ dānaṃ dīyati,
atk-s0501a:976_3: samodhāya vā ekajjhaṃ hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0501a:976_4: sammā āgatā samāgatā “ime no ñātayo amhākaṃ atthāya dānaṃ uddisissantī”ti etadatthaṃ sammā āgatā hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:976_5: Pahūte annapānamhīti tasmiṃ attano uddissamāne pahūte annapānamhi.
atk-s0501a:976_6: Sakkaccaṃ anumodareti abhisaddahantā kammaphalaṃ avijahantā cittīkāraṃ avikkhittacittā hutvā “idaṃ no
atk-s0501a:976_7: dānaṃ hitāya sukhāya hotū”ti modanti anumodanti,
atk-s0501a:978_1: Evaṃ bhagavā yathā pettivisayūpapannānaṃ taṅkhaṇe phalanibbattakaṃ kusalaṃ kammaṃ hoti,
atk-s0501a:981_0: Vatvā puna ñātake nissāya nibbattakusalakammaphalaṃ paccanubhontānaṃ tesaṃ ñātī ārabbha thomanākāraṃ
atk-s0501a:981_1: dassento “ciraṃ jīvantū”ti pañcamagāthāya pacchimaddhaṃ “amhākañca katā pūjā”ti chaṭṭhagāthāya pubbaddhañca āha.
atk-s0501a:982_3: Yesaṃ hetūti ye nissāya yesaṃ kāraṇā.
atk-s0501a:982_8: dakkhiṇeyyasampadāya cāti tīhi aṅgehi dakkhiṇā samijjhati,
atk-s0501a:982_12: Amhākañca katā pūjāti “idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ hotū”ti evaṃ imaṃ dānaṃ uddisantehi amhākañca pūjā katā.
atk-s0501a:982_13: Dāyakā ca anipphalāti yamhi santāne pariccāgamayaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0501a:982_14: tassa tattheva phaladānato dāyakā ca anipphalāti.
atk-s0501a:983_3: bhagavatā evetaṃ byākataṃ jāṇussoṇinā brāhmaṇena puṭṭhena,
atk-s0501a:984_3: saddhāni karoma ‘idaṃ dānaṃ petānaṃ ñātisālohitānaṃ upakappatu,
atk-s0501a:984_8: kacci te petā ñātisālohitā taṃ dānaṃ paribhuñjantīti.
atk-s0501a:985_5: so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā nirayaṃ upapajjati.
atk-s0501a:985_8: tena so tattha tiṭṭhati. Idaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, aṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0501a:985_9: yattha ṭhitassa taṃ dānaṃ na upakappati.
atk-s0501a:986_3: so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā tiracchānayoniṃ upapajjati.
atk-s0501a:986_8: yattha ṭhitassa taṃ dānaṃ na upakappati.
atk-s0501a:987_3: so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā manussānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati…pe…
atk-s0501a:987_9: yattha ṭhitassa taṃ dānaṃ na upakappati.
atk-s0501a:988_3: so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā pettivisayaṃ upapajjati.
atk-s0501a:988_7: Yaṃ vā panassa ito anupavecchanti mittāmaccā vā ñātisālohitā vā,
atk-s0501a:988_9: tena so tattha tiṭṭhati. Idaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, ṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0501a:989_2: so peto ñātisālohito taṃ ṭhānaṃ anupapanno hoti,
atk-s0501a:989_5: petā ñātisālohitā taṃ ṭhānaṃ upapannā honti,
atk-s0501a:990_2: so ceva peto ñātisālohito taṃ ṭhānaṃ anupapanno hoti,
atk-s0501a:990_3: aññepissa petā ñātisālohitā taṃ ṭhānaṃ anupapannā honti,
atk-s0501a:990_6: yaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ vivittaṃ assa iminā dīghena addhunā yadidaṃ petehi ñātisālohitehi.
atk-s0501a:992_1: Evaṃ bhagavā rañño māgadhassa pettivisayūpapannānaṃ pubbañātīnaṃ sampattiṃ nissāya thomento “ete te, mahārāja,
atk-s0501a:992_2: ñātī imāya dānasampadāya attamanā evaṃ thomentī”ti dassento –
atk-s0501a:993_0: “Ciraṃ jīvantu no ñātī, yesaṃ hetu labhāmase;
atk-s0501a:994_0: Amhākañca katā pūjā, dāyakā ca anipphalā”ti. –
atk-s0501a:995_0: Vatvā puna tesaṃ pettivisayūpapannānaṃ aññassa kasigorakkhādino sampattipaṭilābhakāraṇassa abhāvaṃ ito
atk-s0501a:995_1: dinnena yāpanabhāvañca dassento “na hi tattha kasī atthī”ti chaṭṭhagāthāya pacchimaddhaṃ “vaṇijjā tādisī”ti
atk-s0501a:996_2: yaṃ nissāya te petā sampattiṃ paṭilabheyyuṃ.
atk-s0501a:996_3: Gorakkhettha na vijjatīti na kevalaṃ kasi eva,
atk-s0501a:996_6: Vaṇijjā tādisī natthīti vāṇijjāpi tādisī natthi,
atk-s0501a:996_8: Hiraññena kayākayanti hiraññena kayavikkayampi tattha tādisaṃ natthi,
atk-s0501a:996_11: petā kālagatā tahinti kevalaṃ pana ito ñātīhi vā mittāmaccehi vā dinnena yāpenti,
atk-s0501a:998_2: petā kālagatā tahi”nti vatvā idāni upamāhi tamatthaṃ pakāsento “unname udakaṃ vuṭṭha”nti idaṃ gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0501a:999_1: yathā unnate thale ussāde bhūmibhāge meghehi abhivuṭṭhaṃ udakaṃ ninnaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0501a:999_4: evameva ito dinnaṃ dānaṃ petānaṃ upakappati nibbattati,
atk-s0501a:999_6: Ninnamiva hi udakappavattiyā ṭhānaṃ petaloko dānupakappanāya. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:999_9: Yathā ca kandarapadarasākhāpasākhakusobbhamahāsobbhasannipātehi vārivahā mahānajjo pūrā hutvā sāgaraṃ paripūrenti,
atk-s0501a:999_10: evampi ito dinnadānaṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva petānaṃ upakappatīti.
atk-s0501a:1001_2: petā kālagatā tahi”nti imaṃ atthaṃ upamāhi pakāsetvā puna yasmā te petā “ito kiñci lacchāmā”ti āsābhibhūtā
atk-s0501a:1001_3: ñātigharaṃ āgantvāpi “idaṃ nāma no dethā”ti yācituṃ asamatthā,

atk-s0501a:1005_0: “Adāsi me akāsi me, ñātimittā sakhā ca me;
atk-s0501a:1007_0: Vatvā puna ye ñātimaraṇena ruṇṇasokādiparā eva hutvā tiṭṭhanti,

atk-s0501a:1010_1: Evaṃ bhagavā “ruṇṇaṃ vā soko vā yā caññā paridevanā,

atk-s0501a:1011_8: Yathā hi taṃkhaṇaññeva paṭibhantaṃ “ṭhānasovetaṃ tathāgataṃ paṭibhātī”ti vuccati,

atk-s0501a:1013_0: 13. Evaṃ bhagavā raññā dinnāya dakkhiṇāya sātthakabhāvaṃ dassento –
atk-s0501a:1016_0: Vatvā puna yasmā imaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ dentena ñātīnaṃ ñātīhi kattabbakiccakaraṇavasena ñātidhammo nidassito,

atk-s0501a:1022_0: Atha vā “so ñātidhammo ca ayaṃ nidassito”ti iminā gāthāpadena bhagavā rājānaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti.

atk-s0501a:1022_6: Tumhehi puññaṃ pasutaṃ anappakanti iminā sampahaṃseti.
atk-s0501a:1022_7: Puññappasutakittanameva hi ettha tassa yathābhuccaguṇasaṃvaṇṇanabhāvena sampahaṃsanajananato sampahaṃsananti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1023_0: Desanāpariyosāne ca pettivisayūpapattiādīnavasaṃvaṇṇanena saṃviggānaṃ yoniso padahataṃ caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.

atk-s0501a:1028_0: Idāni yadidaṃ tirokuṭṭānantaraṃ “nidhiṃ nidheti puriso”tiādinā nidhikaṇḍaṃ nikkhittaṃ, tassa –
atk-s0501a:1031_0: Tattha idha nikkhepakāraṇaṃ tāvassa evaṃ veditabbaṃ.

atk-s0501a:1031_3: Tirokuṭṭena vā puññavirahitānaṃ vipattiṃ dassetvā iminā katapuññānaṃ sampattidassanatthampi idaṃ idha nikkhittanti veditabbaṃ.

atk-s0501a:1033_13: Atha bhagavā bhuttāvī pavārito tameva puññasampadaṃ paramatthato nidhīti dassetuṃ tassa kuṭumbikassa
atk-s0501a:1033_14: anumodanatthaṃ “nidhiṃ nidheti puriso”ti imā gāthāyo abhāsi.
atk-s0501a:1038_1: Tattha nidhiṃ nidheti purisoti nidhīyatīti nidhi,
atk-s0501a:1038_5: Tattha thāvaro nāma bhūmigataṃ vā vehāsaṭṭhaṃ vā hiraññaṃ vā suvaṇṇaṃ vā khettaṃ vā vatthu vā,
atk-s0501a:1038_8: Jaṅgamo nāma dāsidāsaṃ hatthigavassavaḷavaṃ ajeḷakaṃ kukkuṭasūkaraṃ yaṃ vā panaññampi evarūpaṃ iriyāpathapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ.

atk-s0501a:1038_13: yaṃ vā panaññampi evarūpaṃ sikkhitvā gahitaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgamiva attabhāvappaṭibaddhaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1038_15: Anugāmiko nāma dānamayaṃ puññaṃ sīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ dhammassavanamayaṃ dhammadesanāmayaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1038_16: yaṃ vā panaññampi evarūpaṃ puññaṃ tattha tattha anugantvā viya iṭṭhaphalamanuppadeti,
atk-s0501a:1039_2: Kāmañca purisopi itthīpi paṇḍakopi nidhiṃ nidheti,

atk-s0501a:1041_0: Evaṃ nidhānappayojanaṃ dassento atthādhigamādhippāyaṃ dassetvā idāni anatthāpagamādhippāyaṃ dassetumāha –
atk-s0501a:1043_0: Iṇassa vā pamokkhāya, dubbhikkhe āpadāsu vā”ti.
atk-s0501a:1044_0: Tassattho “atthāya me bhavissatī”ti ca “iṇassa vā pamokkhāyā”ti ca ettha vuttehi dvīhi bhavissatipamokkhāya-
atk-s0501a:1045_1: na kevalaṃ atthāya me bhavissatīti eva puriso nidhiṃ nidheti,
atk-s0501a:1045_2: kintu “ayaṃ coro”ti vā “pāradāriko”ti vā “suṅkaghātako”ti vā evamādinā nayena paccatthikehi paccāmittehi
atk-s0501a:1045_3: duruttassa me sato rājato vā pamokkhāya bhavissati,
atk-s0501a:1045_5: “ettakaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ dehī”ti jīvaggāhena vā corehi me pīḷitassa sato corato vā pamokkhāya bhavissati.
atk-s0501a:1045_8: tehi me codiyamānassa iṇassa vā pamokkhāya bhavissati.
atk-s0501a:1045_12: tathāvidhe āgate dubbhikkhe vā me bhavissati.
atk-s0501a:1045_13: Yathārūpā āpadā uppajjanti aggito vā udakato vā appiyadāyādato vā,
atk-s0501a:1045_14: tathārūpāsu vā uppannāsu āpadāsu me bhavissatītipi puriso nidhiṃ nidhetīti.
atk-s0501a:1046_0: Evaṃ atthādhigamādhippāyaṃ anatthāpagamādhippāyañcāti dvīhi gāthāhi duvidhaṃ nidhānappayojanaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0501a:1046_1: idāni tameva duvidhaṃ payojanaṃ nigamento āha –
atk-s0501a:1048_1: yvāyaṃ “atthāya me bhavissatī”ti ca “rājato vā duruttassā”ti evamādīhi ca atthādhigamo anatthāpagamo ca dassito.
atk-s0501a:1048_2: Etadatthāya etesaṃ nipphādanatthāya imasmiṃ okāsaloke yo koci hiraññasuvaṇṇādibhedo nidhi nāma nidhīyati ṭhapīyati paṭisāmīyatīti.
atk-s0501a:1050_0: Idāni yasmā evaṃ nihitopi so nidhi puññavataṃyeva adhippetatthasādhako hoti,
atk-s0501a:1052_0: Na sabbo sabbadā eva, tassa taṃ upakappatī”ti.

atk-s0501a:1053_5: yāva gambhīre odakantike nihitoti saṅkhaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0501a:1053_8: tassa taṃ upakappatīti yena purisena nihito,

atk-s0501a:1053_13: Ettha ca nti padapūraṇamatte nipāto daṭṭhabbo “yathā taṃ appamattassa ātāpino”ti evamādīsu viya.

atk-s0501a:1055_1: tassa taṃ upakappatī”ti vatvā idāni yehi kāraṇehi na upakappati,
atk-s0501a:1056_0: 4. “Nidhi vā ṭhānā cavati, saññā vāssa vimuyhati.

atk-s0501a:1059_2: so vā nidhi tamhā ṭhānā cavati apeti vigacchati,

atk-s0501a:1059_7: assa puññakkhayacoditā nāgā vā taṃ nidhiṃ apanāmenti aññaṃ ṭhānaṃ gamenti.

atk-s0501a:1060_0: Evaṃ ṭhānā cavanādīni lokasammatāni anupakappanakāraṇāni vatvā idāni yaṃ taṃ etesampi kāraṇānaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ ekaññeva puññakkhayasaññitaṃ kāraṇaṃ,

atk-s0501a:1068_2: suvaṇṇena muttāya maṇinā vā dhanamayo nidhi tesaṃ suvaṇṇādīnaṃ ekattha pakkhipanena nidhīyati,

atk-s0501a:1070_0: Evaṃ bhagavā “yassa dānenā”ti imāya gāthāya puññasampadāya paramatthato nidhibhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni yattha nihito,

atk-s0501a:1074_2: so imesu vatthūsu sunihito hoti. Kasmā?

atk-s0501a:1078_0: Evaṃ dakkhiṇāvisuddhivelāmasuttādīsu vuttanayena saṅghādivatthūsupi dānaphalavibhāgo veditabbo.

atk-s0501a:1080_0: Evaṃ bhagavā dānādīhi nidhīyamānassa puññamayanidhino cetiyādibhedaṃ vatthuṃ dassetvā idāni etesu vatthūsu
atk-s0501a:1080_1: sunihitassa tassa nidhino gambhīre odakantike nihitanidhito visesaṃ dassento āha –
atk-s0501a:1083_0: Tattha pubbapadena taṃ dānādīhi sunihitanidhiṃ niddisati “eso nidhi sunihito”ti.
atk-s0501a:1083_1: Ajeyyoti parehi jetvā gahetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0501a:1083_3: tassa accitabbo accanāraho hitasukhatthikena upacitabboti attho.
atk-s0501a:1083_4: Etasmiñca pāṭhe eso nidhi acceyyoti sambandhitvā puna “kasmā”ti anuyogaṃ dassetvā “yasmā sunihito anugāmiko”ti sambandhitabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1083_5: Itarathā hi sunihitassa acceyyattaṃ vuttaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0501a:1083_9: paralokaṃ gacchantampi tattha tattha phaladānena na vijahatīti attho.
atk-s0501a:1084_0: Pahāya gamanīyesu etaṃ ādāya gacchatīti maraṇakāle paccupaṭṭhite sabbabhogesu pahāya gamanīyesu etaṃ
atk-s0501a:1084_1: nidhiṃ ādāya paralokaṃ gacchatīti ayaṃ kira etassa attho.
