atk-s0501a:1090_0: Kayirātha dhīro puññāni, yo nidhi anugāmiko”ti.
atk-s0501a:1091_5: Evaṃ dvīhi padehi puññanidhiguṇaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā tato dvīhi tattha ussāhaṃ janeti “kayirātha dhīro puññāni,
atk-s0501a:1091_10: Na kevalañca asādhāraṇo acorāharaṇo ca nidhi,
atk-s0501a:1091_12: ajeyyo anugāmiko”ti ettha vutto yo nidhi anugāmiko.
atk-s0501a:1091_14: tasmā kayirātha kareyya dhīro buddhisampanno dhitisampanno ca puggalo puññānīti.
atk-s0501a:1093_0: Evaṃ bhagavā guṇasaṃvaṇṇanena puññanidhimhi devamanussānaṃ ussāhaṃ janetvā idāni ye ussahitvā puññanidhikiriyāya sampādenti,
atk-s0501a:1096_0: Idāni yasmā patthanāya paṭibandhitassa sabbakāmadadattaṃ, na vinā patthanaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:1097_0: “Ākaṅkheyya ce gahapatayo dhammacārī samacārī ‘aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya’nti,
atk-s0501a:1097_1: ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati yaṃ so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya.
atk-s0501a:1098_0: Evaṃ “anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyya.
atk-s0501a:1100_2: bhikkhu saddhāya samannāgato hoti, sīlena, sutena, cāgena,
atk-s0501a:1100_4: tassa evaṃ hoti ‘aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya’nti.
atk-s0501a:1100_8: Tassa te saṅkhārā ca vihārā ca evaṃ bhāvitā evaṃ bahulīkatā tatrūpapattiyā saṃvattantī”ti evamādi.
atk-s0501a:1101_0: Tasmā taṃ tathā tathā ākaṅkhapariyāyaṃ cittapadahanādhiṭṭhānabhāvanāparikkhāraṃ patthanaṃ tassa sabbakāmadadatte hetuṃ dassento āha –
atk-s0501a:1104_1: Idāni yaṃ taṃ sabbaṃ etena labbhati,
atk-s0501a:1104_2: taṃ odhiso odhiso dassento “suvaṇṇatā susaratā”ti evamādigāthāyo āha.
atk-s0501a:1105_0: Tattha paṭhamagāthāya tāva suvaṇṇatā nāma sundaracchavivaṇṇatā kañcanasannibhattacatā,
atk-s0501a:1106_3: pubbe manussabhūto samāno akkodhano ahosi anupāyāsabahulo,
atk-s0501a:1106_4: bahumpi vutto samāno nābhisajji na kuppi na byāpajji na patitthīyi,
atk-s0501a:1106_6: dātā ca ahosi sukhumānaṃ mudukānaṃ attharaṇānaṃ pāvuraṇānaṃ khomasukhumānaṃ kappāsika…pe…
atk-s0501a:1106_10: itthattaṃ āgato samāno imaṃ mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ paṭilabhati.
atk-s0501a:1107_0: Susaratā nāma brahmassaratā karavīkabhāṇitā, sāpi etena labbhati. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:1108_3: pharusaṃ vācaṃ pahāya pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato ahosi,
atk-s0501a:1108_7: itthattaṃ āgato samāno imāni dve mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni paṭilabhati.
atk-s0501a:1108_8: Pahutajivho ca hoti brahmassaro ca karavīkabhāṇī”ti.
atk-s0501a:1109_1: samacitavaṭṭitayuttaṭṭhānesu aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ samacitavaṭṭitabhāvena sannivesoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:1110_3: pubbe manussabhūto samāno bahujanassa atthakāmo ahosi hitakāmo phāsukāmo yogakkhemakāmo ‘kinti me saddhāya vaḍḍheyyuṃ,
atk-s0501a:1110_4: sīlena sutena cāgena paññāya dhanadhaññena khettavatthunā dvipadacatuppadehi puttadārehi dāsakammakaraporisehi
atk-s0501a:1110_8: sīhapubbaḍḍhakāyo ca hoti citantaraṃso ca samavaṭṭakkhandho cā”ti evamādi.
atk-s0501a:1111_0: Iminā nayena ito paresampi iminā puññanidhinā paṭilābhasādhakāni suttapadāni tato tato ānetvā vattabbāni.
atk-s0501a:1112_0: Surūpatāti ettha sakalasarīraṃ rūpanti veditabbaṃ “ākāso parivārito rūpaṃtveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”tiādīsu viya,
atk-s0501a:1112_1: tassa rūpassa sundaratā surūpatā nātidīghatā nātirassatā nātikisatā nātithūlatā nātikāḷatā naccodātatāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:1112_12: tattha idampi tāva paṭhamaṃ odhiso vuttasuvaṇṇatādi sabbametena labbhatīti veditabbanti dasseti.
atk-s0501a:1114_1: Evamimāya gāthāya puññānubhāvena labhitabbaṃ rajjasampattito oraṃ devamanussasampattiṃ dassetvā idāni
atk-s0501a:1115_0: Tattha padesarajjanti ekadīpampi sakalaṃ apāpuṇitvā pathaviyā ekamekasmiṃ padese rajjaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1115_3: Cakkavattisukhaṃ piyanti iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpaṃ cakkavattisukhaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1115_6: etena mandhātādīnampi manussānaṃ devarajjaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:1115_7: Api dibbesūti iminā ye te divi bhavattā “dibbā”ti vuccanti,
atk-s0501a:1115_8: tesu dibbesu kāyesu uppannānampi devarajjaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0501a:1115_11: tattha idampi dutiyaṃ odhiso padesarajjādi sabbametena labbhatīti veditabbanti dasseti.
atk-s0501a:1117_1: Evamimāya gāthāya puññānubhāvena labhitabbaṃ devamanussarajjasampattiṃ dassetvā idāni dvīhi gāthāhi vuttaṃ
atk-s0501a:1117_2: sampattiṃ samāsato purakkhatvā nibbānasampattiṃ dassento “mānussikā ca sampattī”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0501a:1118_7: ramanti etāya ajjhattaṃ uppannāya bahiddhā vā upakaraṇabhūtāyāti rati,
atk-s0501a:1118_9: Yāti aniyatavacanaṃ casaddo pubbasampattiyā saha sampiṇḍanattho.
atk-s0501a:1119_1: yā esā “suvaṇṇatā”tiādīhi padehi mānussikā ca sampatti devaloke ca yā rati vuttā,
atk-s0501a:1119_4: sā cāti idaṃ tatiyampi odhiso sabbametena labbhatīti.
atk-s0501a:1120_0: Atha vā yā pubbe suvaṇṇatādīhi avuttā “sūrā satimanto idha brahmacariyavāso”ti evamādinā nayena niddiṭṭhā
atk-s0501a:1120_3: yā ca yathāvuttappakārā nibbānasampatti cāti idampi tatiyaṃ odhiso sabbametena labbhatīti.
atk-s0501a:1122_1: Evamimāya gāthāya puññānubhāvena labhitabbaṃ saddhānusārībhāvādivasena pattabbaṃ nibbānasampattimpi dassetvā
atk-s0501a:1122_2: idāni tevijjaubhatobhāgavimuttabhāvavasenapi pattabbaṃ tameva tassa upāyañca dassento “mittasampadamāgammā”ti
atk-s0501a:1124_1: yvāyaṃ mittasampadamāgamma satthāraṃ vā aññataraṃ vā garuṭṭhāniyaṃ sabrahmacāriṃ nissāya tato ovādañca
atk-s0501a:1124_2: anusāsaniñca gahetvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattiyā yoniso payuñjato pubbenivāsādīsu tīsu vijjāsu “tattha
atk-s0501a:1124_4: Cittassa ca adhimutti nibbānañcā”ti evaṃ āgatāya aṭṭhasamāpattinibbānabhedāya vimuttiyā ca tathā tathā adandhāyitattena vasībhāvo,
atk-s0501a:1126_2: pattabbaṃ nibbānasampattiṃ dassetvā idāni yasmā vijjāvimuttivasībhāvappattā tevijjā ubhatobhāgavimuttāpi
atk-s0501a:1126_4: imāya puññasampadāya ca tassā guṇavibhūtiyā padaṭṭhānavasena tathā tathā sāpi labbhati,
atk-s0501a:1126_5: tasmā tampi dassento “paṭisambhidā vimokkhā cā”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0501a:1127_0: “Yato sammā katena yā cāyaṃ dhammatthaniruttipaṭibhānesu pabhedagatā paññā paṭisambhidā”ti vuccati,
atk-s0501a:1127_1: ye cime “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādinā nayena aṭṭha vimokkhā,
atk-s0501a:1127_2: yā cāyaṃ bhagavato sāvakehi pattabbā sāvakasampattisādhikā sāvakapāramī,
atk-s0501a:1127_5: idampi pañcamaṃ odhiso sabbametena labbhatīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1129_3: taṃ imāhi pañcahi gāthāhi odhiso odhiso dassetvā idāni sabbamevidaṃ sabbakāmadadanidhisaññitaṃ puññasampadaṃ
atk-s0501a:1129_4: pasaṃsanto “evaṃ mahatthikā esā”ti imāya gāthāya desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0501a:1130_6: tena “yassa dānena sīlenā”ti ito pabhuti yāva “kayirātha dhīro puññānī”ti vuttaṃ puññasampadaṃ uddisati.
atk-s0501a:1130_8: tena esāti uddiṭṭhaṃ niddisituṃ yā esāti abhimukhaṃ karoti.
atk-s0501a:1131_1: iti bhagavā suvaṇṇatādiṃ buddhabhūmipariyosānaṃ puññasampadānubhāvena adhigantabbamatthaṃ vaṇṇayitvā
atk-s0501a:1131_2: idāni tamevatthaṃ sampiṇḍetvā dassento tenevatthena yathāvuttappakārāya puññasampadāya mahatthikattaṃ
atk-s0501a:1131_4: evaṃ mahato atthassa āvahanena mahatthikā esā,
atk-s0501a:1131_5: yadidaṃ mayā “yassa dānena sīlenā”tiādinā nayena desitā puññasampadā,
atk-s0501a:1131_6: tasmā mādisā sattānaṃ hitasukhāvahāya dhammadesanāya akilāsutāya yathābhūtaguṇena ca dhīrā paṇḍitā “asādhāraṇamaññesaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1131_14: yadidaṃ puññānī”tiādīhi vacanehi anekākāravokāraṃ katapuññataṃ pasaṃsanti,
atk-s0501a:1132_0: Desanāpariyosāne so upāsako bahujanena saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0501a:1132_1: rañño ca pasenadikosalassa santikaṃ gantvā etamatthaṃ ārocesi,
atk-s0501a:1132_4: mādisehipi anāharaṇīyaṃ nidhiṃ nidhesī”ti saṃrādhetvā mahatiṃ pūjamakāsīti.
atk-s0501a:1137_0: Idāni nidhikaṇḍānantaraṃ nikkhittassa mettasuttassa vaṇṇanākkamo anuppatto.
atk-s0501a:1137_1: Tassa idha nikkhepappayojanaṃ vatvā tato paraṃ –
atk-s0501a:1138_0: “Yena vuttaṃ yadā yattha, yasmā cetesa dīpanā;
atk-s0501a:1140_1: sā ca sattesu mettāya katāya mahapphalā hoti yāva buddhabhūmiṃ pāpetuṃ samatthā,
atk-s0501a:1140_3: yasmā vā saraṇehi sāsane otaritvā sikkhāpadehi sīle patiṭṭhitānaṃ dvattiṃsākārena rāgappahānasamatthaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1140_5: maṅgalasuttena tassa pavattiyā maṅgalabhāvo attarakkhā ca,
atk-s0501a:1140_7: tirokuṭṭena rattanasutte vuttabhūtesu ekaccabhūtadassanaṃ vuttappakārāya puññasampattiyā pamajjantānaṃ vipatti ca,
atk-s0501a:1140_8: nidhikaṇḍena tirokuṭṭe vuttavipattipaṭipakkhabhūtā sampatti ca dassitā,
atk-s0501a:1140_10: tasmā taṃ dosappahānasamatthaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ idaṃ mettasuttaṃ idha nikkhittaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1140_11: Evañhi suparipūro hoti khuddakapāṭhoti idamassa idha nikkhepappayojanaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1143_0: “Yena vuttaṃ yadā yattha, yasmā cetesa dīpanā;
atk-s0501a:1145_3: tañca pana yadā himavantapassato devatāhi ubbāḷhā bhikkhū bhagavato santikaṃ āgatā,
atk-s0501a:1145_4: tadā sāvatthiyaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ parittatthāya kammaṭṭhānatthāya ca vuttanti evaṃ tāva saṅkhepato etesaṃ padānaṃ dīpanā nidānasodhanā veditabbā.
atk-s0501a:1146_1: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya,
atk-s0501a:1146_2: tena kho pana samayena sambahulā nānāverajjakā bhikkhū bhagavato santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā tattha
atk-s0501a:1146_4: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā rāgacaritānaṃ saviññāṇakaaviññāṇakavasena ekādasavidhaṃ asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1146_9: buddhicaritānaṃ catudhātuvavatthānādīnīti iminā nayena caturāsītisahassappabhedacaritānukūlāni kammaṭṭhānāni katheti.
atk-s0501a:1147_0: Atha kho pañcamattāni bhikkhusatāni bhagavato santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetvā sappāyasenāsanañca gocaragāmañca
atk-s0501a:1147_1: pariyesamānāni anupubbena gantvā paccante himavantena saddhiṃ ekābaddhaṃ nīlakācamaṇisannibhasilātalaṃ
atk-s0501a:1147_4: Atha te bhikkhū tatthekarattiṃ vasitvā pabhātāya rattiyā sarīraparikammaṃ katvā tassa avidūre aññataraṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0501a:1147_6: manussā cettha saddhā pasannā te paccante pabbajitadassanassa dullabhatāya bhikkhū disvā eva pītisomanassajātā hutvā te bhikkhū bhojetvā “idheva, bhante,
atk-s0501a:1147_7: temāsaṃ vasathā”ti yācitvā pañca padhānakuṭisatāni kāretvā tattha mañcapīṭhapānīyaparibhojanīyaghaṭādīni sabbūpakaraṇāni paṭiyādesuṃ.
atk-s0501a:1148_0: Bhikkhū dutiyadivase aññaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0501a:1148_1: Tatthapi manussā tatheva upaṭṭhahitvā vassāvāsaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0501a:1148_2: Bhikkhū “asati antarāye”ti adhivāsetvā taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā sabbarattindivaṃ āraddhavīriyā yāmaghaṇḍikaṃ
atk-s0501a:1148_3: koṭṭetvā yonisomanasikārabahulā viharantā rukkhamūlāni upagantvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0501a:1148_4: Sīlavantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tejena vihatatejā rukkhadevatā attano attano vimānā oruyha dārake gahetvā ito cito vicaranti.
atk-s0501a:1148_5: Seyyathāpi nāma rājūhi vā rājamahāmattehi vā gāmakāvāsaṃ gatehi gāmavāsīnaṃ gharesu okāse gahite gharamanussakā
atk-s0501a:1148_6: gharā nikkhamitvā aññatra vasantā “kadā nu gamissantī”ti dūratova olokenti,
atk-s0501a:1148_7: evameva devatā attano attano vimānāni chaḍḍetvā ito cito ca vicarantiyo dūratova olokenti “kadā nu bhadantā gamissantī”ti.
atk-s0501a:1148_8: Tato evaṃ samacintesuṃ “paṭhamavassūpagatā bhikkhū avassaṃ temāsaṃ vasissanti,
atk-s0501a:1148_9: mayaṃ pana tāva ciraṃ dārake gahetvā okkamma vasituṃ na sakkoma,
atk-s0501a:1148_10: handa mayaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhayānakaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dassemā”ti.
atk-s0501a:1148_11: Tā rattiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ samaṇadhammakaraṇavelāya bhiṃsanakāni yakkharūpāni nimminitvā purato purato tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0501a:1148_13: Bhikkhūnaṃ tāni rūpāni disvā tañca saddaṃ sutvā hadayaṃ phandi,
atk-s0501a:1148_15: Tena te bhikkhū cittaṃ ekaggaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0501a:1148_16: tesaṃ anekaggacittānaṃ bhayena ca punappunaṃ saṃviggānaṃ sati sammussi,
atk-s0501a:1148_17: tato tesaṃ muṭṭhasatīnaṃ duggandhāni ārammaṇāni payojesuṃ,
atk-s0501a:1148_18: tesaṃ tena duggandhena nimmathiyamānamiva matthaluṅgaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0501a:1148_20: na ca taṃ pavattiṃ aññamaññassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0501a:1149_0: Athekadivasaṃ saṅghattherassa upaṭṭhānakāle sabbesu sannipatitesu saṅghatthero pucchi “tumhākaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0501a:1149_1: imaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ paviṭṭhānaṃ katipāhaṃ ativiya parisuddho chavivaṇṇo ahosi pariyodāto,
atk-s0501a:1149_6: rattiṃ īdisañca īdisañca bheravārammaṇaṃ passāmi ca suṇāmi ca,
atk-s0501a:1149_9: eteneva upāyena sabbeva te taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0501a:1149_15: bhagavato santikaṃ gantvā aññaṃ sappāyasenāsanaṃ pucchāmā”ti. “Sādhu,
atk-s0501a:1149_16: bhante”ti te bhikkhū therassa paṭissuṇitvā sabbeva senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya anupalittattā
atk-s0501a:1149_17: kulesu kañci anāmantetvā eva yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0501a:1149_18: Anupubbena sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhagavato santikaṃ āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0501a:1150_2: antovassaṃ cārikā caritabbāti mayā sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1150_5: Bhagavā āvajjento sakalajambudīpe antamaso catupādapīṭhakaṭṭhānamattampi tesaṃ sappāyasenāsanaṃ nāddasa.
atk-s0501a:1150_15: Etañhi vo parittañca kammaṭṭhānañca bhavissatī”ti idaṃ suttamabhāsi.
atk-s0501a:1151_3: tameva senāsanaṃ upanissāya viharathā”ti idañca vatvā bhagavā āha –
atk-s0501a:1151_6: sāyaṃ pātaṃ karaṇavasena dve mettā dve parittā dve asubhā dve maraṇassatī aṭṭhamahāsaṃvegavatthusamāvajjanañca,
atk-s0501a:1151_7: aṭṭha mahāsaṃvegavatthūni nāma jātijarābyādhimaraṇaṃ cattāri apāyadukkhānīti,
atk-s0501a:1151_13: Evaṃ bhagavā pariharaṇaṃ ācikkhitvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mettatthañca parittatthañca vipassanāpādakajjhānatthañca idaṃ suttamabhāsīti.
atk-s0501a:1151_15: yasmā ce”ti etesaṃ padānaṃ dīpanā nidānasodhanā veditabbā.
atk-s0501a:1152_0: Ettāvatā ca yā sā “yena vuttaṃ yadā yattha,
atk-s0501a:1154_1: Idāni “assa karissāmatthavaṇṇana”nti vuttattā evaṃ katanidānasodhanassa assa suttassa atthavaṇṇanā ārabbhate.
atk-s0501a:1154_2: Tattha karaṇīyamatthakusalenāti imissā paṭhamagāthāya tāva ayaṃ padavaṇṇanā –
atk-s0501a:1154_9: Atthe kusalena atthakusalena atthachekenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:1155_2: yantaṃ santaṃ padaṃ abhisameccāti ettha tāva atthi karaṇīyaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1155_11: Tattha yo imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvā na attānaṃ sammā payojeti,
atk-s0501a:1155_15: veḷudānaṃ pattadānaṃ pupphadānaṃ phaladānaṃ dantakaṭṭhadānaṃ mukhodakadānaṃ sinānadānaṃ cuṇṇadānaṃ mattikādānaṃ
atk-s0501a:1155_16: cāṭukamyataṃ muggasūpyataṃ pāribhaṭayataṃ jaṅghapesanikaṃ vejjakammaṃ dūtakammaṃ pahiṇagamanaṃ piṇḍapaṭipiṇḍaṃ
atk-s0501a:1155_21: Saṃsaṭṭho ca viharati rājūhi rājamahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi ananulomikena gihisaṃsaggena,
atk-s0501a:1155_22: yāni vā pana tāni kulāni assaddhāni appasannāni anopānabhūtāni akkosakaparibhāsakāni anatthakāmāni ahitaaphāsukayogakkhemakāmāni bhikkhūnaṃ…pe…
atk-s0501a:1156_0: Yo pana imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvā attānaṃ sammā payojeti,
atk-s0501a:1156_1: anesanaṃ pahāya catupārisuddhisīle patiṭṭhātukāmo saddhāsīsena pātimokkhasaṃvaraṃ satisīsena indriyasaṃvaraṃ vīriyasīsena ājīvapārisuddhiṃ,
atk-s0501a:1158_0: Yo vā yathā ūsodakaṃ paṭicca saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ vatthaṃ pariyodāpayati,
atk-s0501a:1158_3: tathā ñāṇaṃ paṭicca sīlaṃ vodāyatīti ñatvā ñāṇodakena dhovanto sīlaṃ pariyodāpeti.
atk-s0501a:1158_8: tathā ativiya appamatto attano sīlakkhandhaṃ rakkhati,
atk-s0501a:1158_9: sāyaṃ pātaṃ paccavekkhamāno aṇumattampi vajjaṃ na passati.
atk-s0501a:1159_0: Yo vā pana avippaṭisārakare sīle patiṭṭhāya kilesavikkhambhanapaṭipadaṃ paggaṇhāti,
atk-s0501a:1160_0: Yo vā pana samāpattito vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0501a:1160_2: Tattha ye ime yāva avippaṭisārakare sīle patiṭṭhānena yāva vā kilesavikkhambhanapaṭipadāyapaggahaṇena vaṇṇitā atthakusalā,
atk-s0501a:1160_5: Tena bhagavā te bhikkhū sandhāya ekapuggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya “karaṇīyamatthakusalenā”ti āha.
atk-s0501a:1161_0: Tato “kiṃ karaṇīya”nti tesaṃ sañjātakaṅkhānaṃ āha “yantaṃ santaṃ padaṃ abhisameccā”ti.
atk-s0501a:1161_2: taṃ buddhānubuddhehi vaṇṇitaṃ santaṃ nibbānapadaṃ paṭivedhavasena abhisamecca viharitukāmena yaṃ karaṇīyanti.
atk-s0501a:1161_3: Ettha ca yanti imassa gāthāpadassa ādito vuttameva karaṇīyanti adhikārato anuvattati,
atk-s0501a:1162_0: Atha vā santaṃ padaṃ abhisameccāti anussavādivasena lokiyapaññāya nibbānapadaṃ “santa”nti ñatvā taṃ adhigantukāmena
atk-s0501a:1162_3: Atha vā “karaṇīyamatthakusalenā”ti vutte “ki”nti cintentānaṃ āha “yantaṃ santaṃ padaṃ abhisameccā”ti.
atk-s0501a:1162_5: lokiyapaññāya santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca yaṃ karaṇīyaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1163_3: Tathā hi tassa atthavaṇṇanāyaṃ avocumhā “atthi karaṇīyaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1163_6: Atisaṅkhepena desitattā pana tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kehici viññātaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1163_9: tesaṃ viññāpanatthaṃ yaṃ visesato āraññakena bhikkhunā kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1163_10: taṃ vitthārento “sakko ujū ca suhujū ca,
atk-s0501a:1163_11: suvaco cassa mudu anatimānī”ti imaṃ tāva upaḍḍhagāthamāha.
atk-s0501a:1164_2: lokiyapaññāya vā taṃ abhisamecca tadadhigamāya paṭipajjamāno āraññako bhikkhu dutiyacatutthapadhāniyaṅgasamannāgamena
atk-s0501a:1164_3: kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkho hutvā saccappaṭivedhāya paṭipajjituṃ sakko assa,
atk-s0501a:1164_4: tathā kasiṇaparikammavattasamādānādīsu attano pattacīvarappaṭisaṅkharaṇādīsu ca yāni tāni sabrahmacārīnaṃ uccāvacāni kiṃ karaṇīyāni,
atk-s0501a:1164_5: tesu aññesu ca evarūpesu sakko assa dakkho analaso samattho.
atk-s0501a:1164_6: Sakko hontopi ca tatiyapadhāniyaṅgasamannāgamena uju assa.
atk-s0501a:1164_7: Uju hontopi ca sakiṃ ujubhāvena daharakāle vā ujubhāvena santosaṃ anāpajjitvā yāvajīvaṃ punappunaṃ asithilakaraṇena suṭṭhutaraṃ uju assa.
atk-s0501a:1164_14: Evaṃ ārammaṇalakkhaṇūpanijjhānehi purimadvayatatiyasikkhāhi payogāsayasuddhīhi ca uju ca suhuju ca assa.
atk-s0501a:1165_0: Na kevalañca uju ca suhuju ca,
atk-s0501a:1165_2: Yo hi puggalo “idaṃ na kattabba”nti vutto “kiṃ te diṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1165_5: kiṃ upajjhāyo ācariyo sandiṭṭho sambhatto vā”ti vadeti,
atk-s0501a:1165_12: punapi maṃ evarūpaṃ disvā vadeyyātha anukampaṃ upādāya,
atk-s0501a:1165_13: cirassaṃ me tumhākaṃ santikā ovādo laddho”ti vadati,
atk-s0501a:1165_16: Tasmā evaṃ parassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā karonto suvaco ca assa.
atk-s0501a:1166_2: Mudūti gahaṭṭhehi dūtagamanapahiṇagamanādīsu niyujjamāno tattha mudubhāvaṃ akatvā thaddho hutvā vattapaṭipattiyaṃ
atk-s0501a:1166_3: sakalabrahmacariye ca mudu assa suparikammakatasuvaṇṇaṃ viya tattha tattha viniyogakkhamo.
atk-s0501a:1166_4: Atha vā mudūti abhākuṭiko uttānamukho sukhasambhāso paṭisanthāravutti sutitthaṃ viya sukhāvagāho assa.
atk-s0501a:1168_1: Evaṃ bhagavā santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca viharitukāmassa tadadhigamāya vā paṭipajjamānassa visesato āraññakassa
atk-s0501a:1168_2: bhikkhuno ekaccaṃ karaṇīyaṃ vatvā puna tatuttaripi vattukāmo “santussako cā”ti dutiyagāthamāha.
atk-s0501a:1169_0: Tattha “santuṭṭhī ca kataññutā”ti ettha vuttappabhedena dvādasavidhena santosena santussatīti santussako.
atk-s0501a:1169_5: Tattha sakaṃ nāma “piṇḍiyālopabhojanaṃ nissāyā”ti evaṃ upasampadamaṇḍale uddiṭṭhaṃ attanā ca sampaṭicchitaṃ catupaccayajātaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1169_6: tena sundarena vā asundarena vā sakkaccaṃ vā asakkaccaṃ vā dinnena paṭiggahaṇakāle paribhogakāle ca vikāraṃ
atk-s0501a:1169_8: Santaṃ nāma yaṃ laddhaṃ hoti attano ‘vijjamānaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1169_9: tena santeneva tussanto tato paraṃ na patthento atricchataṃ pajahanto “santena tussako”ti vuccati.
atk-s0501a:1169_11: tena samena sabbārammaṇesu tussanto “samena tussako”ti vuccati.
atk-s0501a:1170_2: Yo hi bhikkhu manussehi sālimaṃsodanādīnaṃ patte pūretvā dinnepi dummukhabhāvaṃ anattamanabhāvameva ca dasseti,
atk-s0501a:1170_3: tesaṃ vā sammukhāva taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ “kiṃ tumhehi dinna”nti apasādento sāmaṇeragahaṭṭhādīnaṃ deti,
atk-s0501a:1170_5: Etaṃ disvā manussā dūratova parivajjenti “dubbharo bhikkhu na sakkā posetu”nti.
atk-s0501a:1170_6: Yo pana yaṃ kiñci lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā labhitvā attamano vippasannamukho hutvā yāpeti,
atk-s0501a:1170_8: Etaṃ disvā manussā ativiya vissatthā honti,
atk-s0501a:1170_11: mayameva naṃ posessāmā”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā posenti.
atk-s0501a:1171_3: attano kesanakhacchedanapattacīvarakammādiṃ katvā samaṇadhammakiccaparo hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:1172_1: Yathā ekacco bahubhaṇḍo bhikkhu disāpakkamanakāle bahuṃ pattacīvarapaccattharaṇatelaguḷādiṃ mahājanena sīsabhārakaṭibhārādīhi ubbahāpetvā pakkamati,
atk-s0501a:1172_4: disāpakkamanakāle pakkhī sakuṇo viya samādāyeva pakkamati,
atk-s0501a:1172_9: sīlānurakkhaṇapaññāya cīvarādivicāraṇapaññāya āvāsādisattasappāyaparijānanapaññāya ca samannāgatoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0501a:1173_1: aṭṭhaṭṭhānena kāyapāgabbhiyena catuṭṭhānena vacīpāgabbhiyena anekena ṭhānena manopāgabbhiyena ca virahitoti attho.
atk-s0501a:1174_2: idhekacco saṅghamajjhe pallatthikāya vā nisīdati pāde pādamodahitvā vāti evamādi.
atk-s0501a:1174_5: Bhojanasālāyaṃ pana vuḍḍhānaṃ āsanaṃ na deti,
atk-s0501a:1174_9: Nhānatitthe ca yadidaṃ “daharo vuḍḍhoti pamāṇaṃ akatvā āgatapaṭipāṭiyā nhāyitabba”nti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1174_10: tampi anādiyanto pacchā āgantvā udakaṃ otaritvā vuḍḍhe ca nave ca bādheti.
atk-s0501a:1174_11: Bhikkhācāramagge pana aggāsanaaggodakaaggapiṇḍatthaṃ vuḍḍhānaṃ purato purato yāti,
atk-s0501a:1175_3: tathā pubbe vuttappakāre gaṇe vuḍḍhatare puggale ca,
atk-s0501a:1175_4: tattha manussehi pañhaṃ puṭṭho vuḍḍhataraṃ anāpucchā vissajjeti,
atk-s0501a:1175_6: kiṃ yāgu udāhu khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā,
atk-s0501a:1176_0: Anekaṭṭhānaṃ manopāgabbhiyaṃ nāma tesu tesu ṭhānesu kāyavācāhi ajjhācāraṃ anāpajjitvāpi manasā eva kāmavitakkādinānappakāraṃ appatirūpavitakkanaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1177_1: tesu paccayataṇhāya vā ananulomikagihisaṃsaggavasena vā ananugiddho,
atk-s0501a:1177_6: na uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu attanā vā uyyogamāpajjitāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:1177_7: Imissāya ca gāthāya yaṃ “suvaco cassā”ti ettha vuttaṃ assāti vacanaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1177_8: taṃ sabbapadehi saddhiṃ santussako ca assa,
atk-s0501a:1179_1: Evaṃ bhagavā santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca viharitukāmassa tadadhigamāya vā paṭipajjitukāmassa visesato āraññakassa
atk-s0501a:1179_2: bhikkhuno taduttaripi karaṇīyaṃ ācikkhitvā idāni akaraṇīyampi ācikkhitukāmo “na ca khuddamācare kiñci,
atk-s0501a:1179_3: yena viññū pare upavadeyyu”nti imaṃ upaḍḍhagāthamāha.
atk-s0501a:1180_1: evamimaṃ karaṇīyaṃ karonto yaṃ taṃ kāyavacīmanoduccaritaṃ khuddaṃ lāmakanti vuccati,
atk-s0501a:1180_5: appamattakampi aṇumattakampi na samācareti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:1181_0: Tato tassa samācāre sandiṭṭhikamevādīnavaṃ dasseti “yena viññū pare upavadeyyu”nti.
atk-s0501a:1181_1: Ettha ca yasmā aviññū pare appamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1181_2: Te hi anavajjaṃ vā sāvajjaṃ karonti,
atk-s0501a:1181_5: Te hi anuvicca pariyogāhetvā avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti,
atk-s0501a:1182_0: Evaṃ bhagavā imāhi aḍḍhateyyāhi gāthāhi santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca viharitukāmassa tadadhigamāya vā paṭipajjitukāmassa visesato āraññakassa,
atk-s0501a:1182_1: āraññakasīsena ca sabbesampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā viharitukāmānaṃ karaṇīyākaraṇīyabhedaṃ kammaṭṭhānūpacāraṃ
atk-s0501a:1182_2: vatvā idāni tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tassa devatābhayassa paṭighātāya parittatthaṃ vipassanāpādakajjhānavasena
atk-s0501a:1182_3: kammaṭṭhānatthañca “sukhinova khemino hontū”tiādinā nayena mettakathaṃ kathetumāraddho.
atk-s0501a:1183_11: Evañhi mettā bhāvetabbā “sabbe sattā sukhino hontū”ti vā,
atk-s0501a:1185_2: tāva saṅkhepena mettābhāvanaṃ dassetvā idāni vitthāratopi taṃ dassetuṃ “ye kecī”ti gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0501a:1185_3: Atha vā yasmā puthuttārammaṇe paricitaṃ cittaṃ na ādikeneva ekatte saṇṭhāti ārammaṇappabhedaṃ pana anugantvā anugantvā kamena saṇṭhāti,
atk-s0501a:1185_4: tasmā tassa tasathāvarādidukatikappabhede ārammaṇe anugantvā anugantvā saṇṭhānatthampi “ye kecī”ti gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0501a:1185_5: Atha vā yasmā yassa yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vibhūtaṃ hoti,
atk-s0501a:1185_7: tasmā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yassa yaṃ vibhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1185_8: tassa tattha cittaṃ saṇṭhāpetukāmo tasathāvarādidukatikārammaṇabhedadīpakaṃ “ye kecī”ti imaṃ gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0501a:1186_0: Ettha hi tasathāvaradukaṃ diṭṭhādiṭṭhadukaṃ dūrasantikadukaṃ bhūtasambhavesidukanti cattāro duke,
atk-s0501a:1186_1: dīghādīhi ca chahi padehi majjhimapadassa tīsu aṇukapadassa ca dvīsu tikesu atthasambhavato dīgharassamajjhimatikaṃ
atk-s0501a:1186_2: mahantāṇukamajjhimatikaṃ thūlāṇukamajjhimatikanti tayo tike ca dīpeti.
atk-s0501a:1187_0: Evaṃ “ye keci pāṇabhūtatthī”ti iminā vacanena dukatikehi saṅgahetabbe sabbasatte ekato dassetvā idāni
atk-s0501a:1187_1: sabbepi te tasā vā thāvarā va navasesāti iminā dukena saṅgahetvā dasseti.
atk-s0501a:1188_7: taṃ sabbadukatikehi sambandhitabbaṃ “ye keci pāṇabhūtatthi tasā vā thāvarā vā anavasesā,
atk-s0501a:1188_9: Evaṃ yāva bhūtā vā sambhavesī vā,
atk-s0501a:1189_0: Idāni dīgharassamajjhimāditikattayadīpakesu dīghā vātiādīsu chasu padesu dīghāti dīghattabhāvā nāgamacchagodhādayo.
atk-s0501a:1189_1: Anekabyāmasatappamāṇāpi hi mahāsamudde nāgānaṃ attabhāvā anekayojanappamāṇā ca macchagodhādīnaṃ attabhāvā honti.
atk-s0501a:1189_6: Tassa hi attabhāvo ubbedhena cattāri yojanasahassāni aṭṭha ca yojanasatāni,
atk-s0501a:1189_12: Rassakāti tāsu tāsu jātīsu vāmanādayo dīghamajjhimehi omakappamāṇā sattā.
atk-s0501a:1189_13: Aṇukāti maṃsacakkhussa agocarā dibbacakkhuvisayā udakādīsu nibbattā sukhumattabhāvā sattā ūkādayo vā.
atk-s0501a:1189_14: Apica ye tāsu tāsu jātīsu mahantamajjhimehi thūlamajjhimehi ca omakappamāṇā sattā,
atk-s0501a:1191_1: Evaṃ tīhi tikehi anavasesato satte dassetvā idāni “diṭṭhā vā ye va adiṭṭhā”tiādīhi tīhi dukehipi te saṅgahetvā dasseti.
atk-s0501a:1192_0: Tattha diṭṭhāti ye attano cakkhussa āpāthamāgatavasena diṭṭhapubbā.
atk-s0501a:1192_2: “Ye vā dūre vasanti avidūre”ti iminā pana dukena attano attabhāvassa dūre ca avidūre ca vasante satte dasseti,
atk-s0501a:1192_4: Attano hi kāye vasantā sattā avidūre,
atk-s0501a:1192_8: Attano vihāre gāme janapade dīpe cakkavāḷe vasantā avidūre,
atk-s0501a:1193_5: Appahīnabhavasaṃyojanattā āyatimpi sambhavaṃ esantānaṃ sekhaputhujjanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1193_6: Atha vā catūsu yonīsu aṇḍajajalābujā sattā yāva aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosañca na bhindanti,
atk-s0501a:1193_8: aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosañca bhinditvā bahi nikkhantā bhūtā nāma.
atk-s0501a:1193_9: Saṃsedajā opapātikā ca paṭhamacittakkhaṇe sambhavesī nāma,
atk-s0501a:1195_1: Evaṃ bhagavā “sukhino vā”tiādīhi aḍḍhateyyāhi gāthāhi nānappakārato tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ hitasukhāgamapatthanāvasena
atk-s0501a:1195_2: sattesu mettābhāvanaṃ dassetvā idāni ahitadukkhānāgamapatthanāvasenāpi taṃ dassento āha “na paro paraṃ
atk-s0501a:1196_5: gāme vā gāmakhette vā ñātimajjhe vā pūgamajjhe vātiādi.
atk-s0501a:1196_7: Kañcīti yaṃ kañci khattiyaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā gahaṭṭhaṃ vā pabbajitaṃ vā sukhitaṃ vā dukkhitaṃ vātiādi.
atk-s0501a:1196_8: Byārosanā paṭighasaññāti kāyavacīvikārehi byārosanāya ca manovikārena paṭighasaññāya ca.
atk-s0501a:1196_11: yathā ca “anupubbasikkhāya anupubbakiriyāya anupubbapaṭipadāyā”ti vattabbe “anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā”ti.
atk-s0501a:1196_12: Nāññamaññassa dukkhamiccheyyāti aññamaññassa dukkhaṃ na iccheyya.
atk-s0501a:1196_14: Na kevalaṃ “sukhino vā khemino vā hontū”tiādimanasikāravaseneva mettaṃ bhāveyya,
atk-s0501a:1196_15: kintu “ahovata yo koci parapuggalo yaṃ kañci parapuggalaṃ vañcanādīhi nikatīhi na nikubbetha,
atk-s0501a:1196_16: jātiādīhi ca navahi mānavatthūhi katthaci padese kañci parapuggalaṃ nātimaññeyya,
atk-s0501a:1196_17: aññamaññassa ca byārosanāya vā paṭighasaññāya vā dukkhaṃ na iccheyyā”ti evampi manasikaronto bhāveyyāti.
atk-s0501a:1198_1: Evaṃ ahitadukkhānāgamapatthanāvasena atthato mettābhāvanaṃ dassetvā idāni tameva upamāya dassento āha “mātā yathā niyaṃputta”nti.
atk-s0501a:1199_1: yathā mātā niyaṃ puttaṃ attani jātaṃ orasaṃ puttaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1199_3: tassa dukkhāgamappaṭibāhanatthaṃ attano āyumpi cajitvā taṃ anurakkhe,
atk-s0501a:1199_4: evampi sabbabhūtesu idaṃ mettākhyaṃ mānasaṃ bhāvaye,
atk-s0501a:1199_6: tañca aparimāṇasattārammaṇavasena ekasmiṃ vā satte anavasesapharaṇavasena aparimāṇaṃ bhāvayeti.
atk-s0501a:1201_1: Evaṃ sabbākārena mettābhāvanaṃ dassetvā idāni tasseva vaḍḍhanaṃ dassento āha “mettañca sabbalokasmī”ti.
atk-s0501a:1202_23: Mettāvihārī hi puggalo manussānaṃ piyo hoti,
atk-s0501a:1202_26: tenassa taṃ mānasaṃ vigatapaccatthikattā asapattanti vuccati.
atk-s0501a:1203_1: yadidaṃ “evampi sabbabhūtesu mānasaṃ bhāvaye aparimāṇa”nti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1203_2: tañcetaṃ aparimāṇaṃ mettaṃ mānasaṃ sabbalokasmiṃ bhāvaye vaḍḍhaye,
atk-s0501a:1203_3: vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ gamaye pāpaye. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0501a:1203_11: Evaṃ bhāventopi ca taṃ yathā asambādhaṃ averaṃ asapattañca hoti,
atk-s0501a:1203_13: Yaṃ vā taṃ bhāvanāsampadaṃ pattaṃ sabbattha okāsalokavasena asambādhaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1203_15: attani ca paresaṃ āghātavinayanena asapattaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:1203_16: Taṃ asambādhamaveramasapattaṃ aparimāṇaṃ mettaṃ mānasaṃ uddhaṃ adho tiriyañcāti tividhaparicchede sabbalokasmiṃ bhāvaye vaḍḍhayeti.
atk-s0501a:1205_1: Evaṃ mettābhāvanāya vaḍḍhanaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ bhāvanamanuyuttassa viharato iriyāpathaniyamābhāvaṃ dassento āha “tiṭṭhaṃ caraṃ…pe…
atk-s0501a:1206_1: evametaṃ mettaṃ mānasaṃ bhāvento so “nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyā”tiādīsu viya iriyāpathaniyamaṃ
atk-s0501a:1206_2: akatvā yathāsukhaṃ aññataraññatarairiyāpathabādhanavinodanaṃ karonto tiṭṭhaṃ vā caraṃ vā nisinno vā sayāno
atk-s0501a:1207_0: Atha vā evaṃ mettābhāvanāya vaḍḍhanaṃ dassetvā idāni vasībhāvaṃ dassento āha “tiṭṭhaṃ cara”nti.
atk-s0501a:1207_1: Vasippatto hi tiṭṭhaṃ vā caraṃ vā nisinno vā sayāno vā yāvatā iriyāpathena etaṃ mettājhānasatiṃ adhiṭṭhātukāmo hoti,
atk-s0501a:1207_2: atha vā tiṭṭhaṃ vā caraṃ vā…pe…
atk-s0501a:1207_3: sayāno vāti na tassa ṭhānādīni antarāyakarāni honti,
atk-s0501a:1207_4: apica kho yāvatā etaṃ mettājhānasatiṃ adhiṭṭhātukāmo hoti,
atk-s0501a:1208_4: yathā ṭhānādīsu yāvatā iriyāpathena ṭhānādīni vā anādiyitvā yāvatā etaṃ mettājhānasatiṃ adhiṭṭhātukāmo assa,
atk-s0501a:1208_5: tāvatā vigatamiddhova hutvā etaṃ satiṃ adhiṭṭheyyāti.
atk-s0501a:1209_0: Evaṃ mettābhāvanāya vasībhāvaṃ dassento “etaṃ satiṃ adhiṭṭheyyā”ti tasmiṃ mettāvihāre niyojetvā idāni
atk-s0501a:1210_1: yvāyaṃ “sukhino vā khemino vā hontū”tiādi katvā yāva “etaṃ satiṃ adhiṭṭheyyā”ti vaṇṇito mettāvihāro.
atk-s0501a:1210_2: Etaṃ catūsu dibbabrahmaariyairiyāpathavihāresu niddosattā attanopi paresampi atthakarattā ca idha ariyassa
atk-s0501a:1210_4: yato satataṃ samitaṃ abbokiṇṇaṃ tiṭṭhaṃ caraṃ nisinno vā sayāno vā yāvatāssa vigatamiddho,
atk-s0501a:1212_1: Evaṃ bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ nānappakārato mettābhāvanaṃ dassetvā idāni yasmā mettā sattārammaṇattā attadiṭṭhiyā āsannā hoti,
atk-s0501a:1212_2: tasmā diṭṭhigahananisedhanamukhena tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tadeva mettājhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ariyabhūmippattiṃ
atk-s0501a:1212_3: dassento “diṭṭhiñca anupaggammā”ti imāya gāthāya desanaṃ samāpesi.
atk-s0501a:1213_2: tato vuṭṭhāya ye tattha vitakkavicārādayo dhammā,
atk-s0501a:1213_3: te tesañca vatthādianusārena rūpadhamme pariggahetvā iminā nāmarūpaparicchedena “suddhasaṅkhārapuñjoyaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1213_4: nayidha sattūpalabbhatī”ti evaṃ diṭṭhiñca anupaggamma anupubbena lokuttarasīlena sīlavā hutvā lokuttarasīlasampayutteneva
atk-s0501a:1213_6: tato paraṃ yopāyaṃ vatthukāmesu gedho kilesakāmo appahīno hoti,
atk-s0501a:1213_7: tampi sakadāgāmianāgāmimaggehi tanubhāvena anavasesappahānena ca kāmesu gedhaṃ vineyya vinayitvā vūpasametvā
atk-s0501a:1213_8: na hi jātu gabbhaseyyaṃ puna reti ekaṃseneva puna gabbhaseyyaṃ na eti.
atk-s0501a:1213_9: Suddhāvāsesu nibbattitvā tattheva arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā parinibbātīti.
atk-s0501a:1214_0: Evaṃ bhagavā desanaṃ samāpetvā te bhikkhū āha –
atk-s0501a:1214_4: imañca suttaṃ māsassa aṭṭhasu dhammassavanadivasesu ghaṇḍiṃ ākoṭetvā ussāretha,
atk-s0501a:1214_7: tepi vo amanussā taṃ bheravārammaṇaṃ na dassessanti,
atk-s0501a:1214_9: Te “sādhū”ti bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tattha gantvā tathā akaṃsu.
atk-s0501a:1214_10: Devatāyo ca “bhadantā amhākaṃ atthakāmā hitakāmā”ti pītisomanassajātā hutvā sayameva senāsanaṃ sammajjanti,
atk-s0501a:1214_14: Tepi bhikkhū tameva mettaṃ bhāvetvā tameva ca pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā sabbe tasmiṃyeva antotemāse
atk-s0501a:1214_15: aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā mahāpavāraṇāya visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāresunti.
atk-s0501a:1229_1: navappabhedassa khuddakapāṭhassa tāva atthavaṇṇanā katā hoti.
atk-s0501a:1233_0: Vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ, pāpuṇātu ayaṃ jano”ti.
atk-s0501a:1234_4: suppatiṭṭhitabuddhīnaṃ theravaṃsappadīpānaṃ therānaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vaṃsālaṅkārabhūtena vipulavisuddhabuddhinā
atk-s0501a:1234_5: buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena therena katā ayaṃ paramatthajotikā nāma khuddakapāṭhavaṇṇanā –
